11233221.content:
Your eyes finally stopped spinning just long enough to recognize the goddess sized ass above you. The massive, perfectly sculpted orbs we're clad in tight black leggings and belonged to none other than Chelsea! Normally you took every chance to sneak a peak at her shapely booty but this time it served only to crush your hopes...and your body as she happily plopped it down on the seat smashing you further beneath her right ass cheek. As you suffered further beneath the relentless weight of Chelsea, the only comforting thought was that you were technically being crushed by the safest person possible right now. She has to find you at some point right?

Chelsea laughed and danced in her seat happily, smearing you back and forth beneath her bulldozzing buttocks oblivious of the horror she was subjecting her little friend to. "Oh Tom did you see that!? That was awesome!" She then looked down at the table seeing your food still untouched. "He's still not back?" Chelsea said slightly annoyed. She huffed lifting her ass up, adjusting slightly before SLAMMING it back down on you in frustration. She starts to finish off her plate and gets more and more worried about you.

Chelsea finally stands up, your poor body plastered flat to her ass, jiggling slightly with each movement as she peeks over the table to check the bench on what would be your side. Seeing nothing she gets worried and sits back down plopping her weight onto you. She the leans over onto her left ass cheek, lifting the right one as she peeks under the table scanning every bit of the floor.

Right ass lifts up your upper half remains stuck to it but your lower half remains stuck to the table. Your abdomin stretches painfully before recoiling back to shape, ripping your upper half off her ass and slamming it back onto the bench. This is just not your day...

Chelsea once again finds no trace of you and worriedly sits back up, rolling her meaty right ass cheek back on top of you heavily. She starts to twirl her hair nervously thinking of what she should do. She spots Sadie in the distance and raises her hand to get her attention but she is currently speaking with a customer. Chelsea leans onto her right ass cheek further increasing the wieght on your impossibly flat body. She then bounces up and hammering you relentlessly as she tried to catch Sadies eye!

Each bounce is a new experience of squashing as you get stuck to her ass for a bounce, the bench for another, sometimes both, but always a new level of heart pounding pressure.

Sadie finally notices and makes her way to Chelsea, "Oh my goodness sugar you look positively distressed! What's the matter honey?"

"I...I... Can't find my tiny friend and I'm getting really worried! I checked all over the booth and the floor but I can't find him! Can you please help me look? I'm worried something terrible may have happened to him!" Chelsea said nearly ready to tear up.

"Oh why sugar of course I'll help you find the little cutie! Don't worry I'm sure we can find him! Now um... I'm not trying to be disrespectful sugar but did you check if you may have stepped on the little bugger? Possibly..ahem...sat on him with your rump?"

Chelsea's eyes widened and she twisted in her seat, smearing you like paste, and checked the bottom of her shoes while remaining seated. She was currently facing Sadie and the two looked down curiously but found no sign of you. Said checked under her own boots but no luck either. Chelsea then stood up and looked over her shoulder while Sadie checked the bench but you were currently stuck to Chelsea's dominating ass.

"He's not on the bench either sugar." Said Sadie sadly.

Chelsea then plopped her ass back down dejectedly.

"Wait I didn't see your rump! The poor cutie might be stuck to it"

Chelsea's eyes lit up with a spark of hope as she stood again and presented her ass to Sadie. While normally you would hate to be stuck to an ass cheek this time it would be a blessing! Unfortunately though you remained stuck to the bench this time and Sadie didn't bother to check having just done so before.

"Sorry sugar..." She said sadly as Chelsea once again plopped down on your annihilated body with her powerful ass. "Don't give up though sweet pea let's check the restaurant!"
11233221.title: Ups and Downs

choices: You manage to escape the bag, and fall to the ground safely.
You manage to escape, but run into trouble making it back to Chelsea.
You're too late, and the hatch closes, sending you off to the landfill.
112332213.content:
“Check the restaurant…” Chelsea sighed dejectedly. “Yeah…sure. Maybe we can find him.” She reasoned, garnering a confident smile on the big-hearted waitress’ face.

“Tha’s the spirit, hun!” Sadie clapped her hands together. “With two of us searching, we’re sure to find yer tiny little cutie pie boyfriend!” The busty blonde excitedly pulled the depressed brunette giantess up to her feet, and soon both of the blissfully unaware girls scattered to separate corners of the restaurant to scan for any sight of you.

Of course, neither of their realized how close you had been the whole time. As soon as Chelsea had stood up, your battered, flattened body remained crushed flat to the bench, and you could do nothing but stare up mutely as your guardian and oblivious tormentor wandered out of sight, leaving you all alone. It took you a few minutes to reform, and by then it was far too late.

Reinflated back to your normal size, your shoulders slumped upon seeing Chelsea and Sadie on the total opposite side of the restaurant. You had no feasible way to reach either of your two potential towering saviors. Climbing back to the floor was a horrible idea (and a terrifying situation you didn’t want to reexperience), and you couldn’t reach the table either from this point. It seemed like you could only wait for Chelsea to return, and hope she looked at you before sitting again.

However, once more, fate threw a cruel curveball right at you, catching you horribly off guard. You hadn’t realized it (being plastered beneath Chelsea’s shapely rear end), but your giantess friend had finished her meal while you had been pounded to a pulp during the square-dancing debacle, and thusly left a good deal of trash to be cleaned up while she continued her futile search to locate you.

As such, one of the waitresses had casually strolled her way over to the table, carrying a huge black trash bag with the intent of cleaning up Chelsea’s leftovers. You froze as the massive girl drew near, taking note of how her gaze was firmly on the table, and not your one-inch tall form on the bench. As she began picking up napkins and bits of food with her gloved hands, and tossing them into the trash bag, you decided that maybe getting this girl’s attention would be a good idea.

Of course, your decision came a second too late, as the waitress’ face scrunched up, and she let out a cute sneeze, dropping a syrup coated napkin from her hand. Time seemed to slow as the napkin tumbled through the air towards you, and your body simply refused to react. The napkin crashed down onto you, burying your face into a clump of gooey syrup and hiding you beneath it.

Only a second later, the waitress picked the napkin back up, and your tiny form with it. You flailed and kicked like a madman, but the waitress was none the wiser to your struggles. She merely discarded the napkin into the dark depths of the trash bag, sending you and the napkin plummeting into a heap of trash and gross food bits, shrouded in darkness.

As soon as the napkin landed in the bag, you clawed and gripped at your squishy face, peeling it away from the syrup and freeing your mouth to scream up to the waitress high above you in one last ditch effort to save yourself from this cruel and unexpected twist in fate. At least, that was the plan, before the waitress scrapped the remains of Chelsea’s food off her plate and into the trash bag, dousing you in more syrup and congealing your body under several drippy chunks of scrambled eggs.

Your screams died out as egg and sausage remains flooded into your mouth, bringing fits of choking and gagging. Far above, the waitress simply smiled innocently as she dumped in a bit more trash, and then tied the bag shut tightly, casting you into pitch blackness. Strolling back to the kitchen, she had not a single clue in the world that a living being was trapped within the confines of the trash bag, furiously fighting to save himself from his fate.

The waitress brushed past Chelsea, who was crawling on the floor looking under tables for any sign of you and earning her fair share of confused looks. The oblivious waitress entered the kitchen, and left straight out the door at the back of the restaurant. To her surprise, the trash truck had just pulled up to the restaurant, and the girl collecting the trash hopped down from the driver’s seat.

“Huh. Just in time!” The waitress joked, handing the bag off to the garbagewoman. Turning on her heel, she strode merrily back into the restaurant, while the garbagewoman hefted the bag over her shoulder and walked around the back of her truck, raising the back hatch. A powerful and overwhelmingly disgusting stench wafted through the air, but the garbagewoman was more than used to the unpleasant scent.

Without a care in the world, she dumped the bag holding the remains of Chelsea’s meal and your trapped self into the truck, and reached up the slam the hatch closed, sealing you truly into your fate. However, while all of this had been transpiring, you had managed to grab onto Chelsea’s fork and pry yourself away from the globs of food stuck to you.

Using that same fork, you had begun to wedge the fork into the plastic bag and rub it up and down with all of your strength, slowly fraying a small hole in the side of the bag. Knowing your time was running out, you desperately scratched and clawed at the hole, trying to thrust yourself out at the last second, and escape to freedom.

What happens next?

11233222.content:
Flipping yourself slowly onto your back and groaning at the aching in your limbs after the pounding you had just received, your jaw dropped open in horror as a big, round booty filling up the sky swung into view above you. Too startled to even properly react, your throat let out a pathetic whimpering cry as the massive, dress-clad ass descended onto the bench, and pulverized you flat.

Settling down into the bench, Sadie brushed some of her hair out of her face. Beginning to sweat quite a bit, the curly-haired blonde had decided that now was a good time to take her break. Exhausting herself after the big group square dance, Sadie needed a hot minute to rest her legs and take a breather. She was so tired that she didn’t even hear the small “squish” beneath her generous rump, nor feel the one-inch tall tiny be crushed to nothing beneath her.

Due to her fairly tight dress, Sadie’s butt pressed against the fabric in an exceptionally eye-catching way. However, this also meant that you were given no leeway, and your tiny body was squashed paper-thin under her derriere, all of Sadie’s weight pressing you flat and squeezing the air out of your lungs. The pain was unexpectedly unbearable, due mostly to the uncompromising wooden bench you were trapped against, but oblivious Sadie was clearly not going to give you any breaks.

Carrying her own drink with her, the blissfully unaware waitress sipped on her glass and observed the restaurant. She still gave a friendly wave to every guest who passed by, flashing her heart-warming smile to anyone who met her gaze. Every so often, she adjusted her position on the bench to get more comfortable, unaware that each time she shifted her butt, her thick ass would grind you against the wooden bench, adhering your body even more to her curvy booty.

To make matters worse, the hard bench wasn’t doing any favors for the sweat beginning to pool around Sadie’s body, particularly in her lower regions. Her dress was soon damp with sweat, and the slightly smelly and incredibly sticky substance began to coat your body in a sheen of sweat. Though you tried in vain to fight it, you found the squishy nature of your own body eagerly gluing itself to Sadie’s butt, like a little sticker on the back of her dress.

Sure enough, after twenty minutes of relaxing, Sadie stood back up to get to work, and you went with her, firmly plastered to the back of her dress. Totally unaware of your presence, Sadie strolled happily back into the kitchen, her cute butt swaying back and forth as she walked. A slight jiggle in her flesh with each step, your body was bounced disorientingly up and down as the oblivious waitress walked. You couldn’t even see a thing, face firmly slammed into her plush backside.

Sadie’s plump cheeks drew the eyes of all she skipped by, whether they appreciated the view or were jealous of the excitable blonde’s blessed curves. Sadly, not a single sole seemed to notice your presence on her ass, tiny body crushed into a less than one-inch blob on her butt, like an odd discoloration. Worst of all was Chelsea, who was still searching the restaurant in a panic for you but didn’t so much as glance in Sadie’s direction even once.

As she was no longer crushing you beneath her, you began to focus on reforming as soon as possible, intending to pop free from Sadie’s dress and tumble down to the floor. Unfortunately, fate continued to screw with you, and Sadie’s boss assigned her to the receptionist desk out front. Heeding her duty with a blissful smile and boundless enthusiasm, Sadie ran to the front of the restaurant and slammed herself down into the seat, squashing you once more.

Once again buried under the full weight of the energetic giantess, you could only mentally whimper, your attempt to reform and escape all but ruined. In fact, there was not a thing you could do but suffer in the increasingly hot and sweaty prison Sadie was trapping you in, pressed between the hard seat and her gigantic ass. With each passing second, you felt your skin begin to stick itself more and more to the fabric of her dress.

Hours passed by, and Chelsea was still scouring every inch of the restaurant for you, aided by a few other waitresses and helpful patrons. Saddened by her inability to help, Sadie could only sit patiently at the front desk and greet new guests. The seat was beginning to feel uncomfortable to her, and she couldn’t help but notice the growing swamp of sweat around her ass, much to her embarrassment.

Finally, her shift was ending, so Sadie stood up and walked into the employee-only room to grab her personal belongings. Swinging her purse over her shoulder, Sadie casually strolled to the front door of the restaurant, deciding to simply change back into more normal clothes at home.

By this point, your body had almost fully engrained itself into the fabric of the dress. After nearly five hours of heat, sweat, and pressure exerted onto your squishy body, your extremely flattened form had just about bonded with her dress. You were now, unless someone miraculously spotted your tan, blobby form on the back of Sadie’s dress soon, potentially a permanent addition to her outfit.

Just as she was about to grab the door handle, Chelsea stepped over to her. Your good friend’s hair was a mess, her hands were covered in dirt and dust, and it was clear her eyes had been a bit teary. Sadie felt her heart break upon taking in Chelsea’s pitiful appearance.

“Ya…ain’t able to find ‘em, huh?” Sadie inquired, already knowing the answer.

Chelsea sighed, fighting to manage a smile. “No. He’s been missing before, but…this time feels like my fault. This was all supposed to be a fun day out, and…”

Sadie embraced Chelsea in a large, comforting hug, and allowed the distraught giantess to bury her head in Sadie’s chest. “There, there, darlin’. If yer lil boyfriend is as tough as he looks…I reckon ya might see ‘em soon!”

Chelsea pulled her head back, blushed, and gave Sadie a small smile. “Thank you. That really means a lot.”

Sadie grinned, her angelic face shining. “Sure thang gal! See ya ‘round!” She said, before turning on her heel and pushing through the exit door. For one brief moment, Chelsea’s gaze happened to linger on Sadie’s prodigious butt for a few seconds. Chelsea watched Sadie’s ass as the blonde waitress left the restaurant, the door swinging shut behind her.

Breathing in the cool air of the evening, Sadie headed over to her car, eager to get back to her apartment, shower, and run her admittedly quite sweaty and dirty dress through the wash cycle. You continued your efforts to reform, even as Sadie walked along, her thick glutes rubbing against your body through her dress. You knew it was useless, but you still had to try something to get out of this horribly humiliating situation before it became even worse.

What happens next?

"Wanna race in the big pool? I'll totally win!"
"I'd be down for some hot tub action. NO bubble jets though!"
Before you answer, Chelsea slips on a puddle, and you go flying from her hand!
112332223.content:
Sadie’s hand had just touched the handle of the driver’s side door of her car, when a loud voice cried out from behind her. Looking over her shoulder, Sadie gazed in amusement and confusion as Chelsea bounded over to her side, frantically waving her arms and yelling her name over and over. Smiling politely, Sadie paused before entering her car.

“Wha’s the matta’ darlin?” Sadie inquired as Chelsea screeched to a halt and panted deeply to catch her breath.

Chelsea heaved out a reply. “I…I think…Tom…is crushed to your ass!”

“Tom?” Sadie titled her head. “Who might that be? Yer lil tiny boyfriend?”

Too flustered to correct her, Chelsea nodded. “I saw him…I think I saw him…plastered to your dress!”

Sadie glanced over her shoulder at her prodigious rear end, unable to see the full scope of her amply sized posterior. Grabbing her cheeks quite scandalously, Sadie attempted to get a better look at her bubble butt, but only succeeding in squishing your smeared body even tighter into her plump booty.

Chelsea, acting brashly and running on pure adrenaline, smacked Sadie’s hand away and knelt behind her. For her part, the happy-go-lucky waitress stood perfectly still, not wanting to upset the girl shoe hoped would be her new friend. She bit back the urge to laugh and wiggle away as Chelsea ran her fingers across the tan smudge on Sadie’s dress, her sensitive ass particularly ticklish.

Finally, Chelsea’s sharp fingernail caught on the one part of your flattened blob of a body that wasn’t fully engrained into the fabric of Sadie’s dress, thanks in full to your ceaseless efforts to reform. Because of that, Chelsea was able to forcibly rip you clean off of Sadie’s dress, leaving you as a crumpled tan clump in her sweaty palm. At least you were free from the dress, a fact that you praised the heavens for. Chelsea truly was your guardian angel.

Chelsea stood up and gave Sadie a genuine smile of pure joy. “I got him back…” She sighed, thankful for her successful rescue mission.

Sadie blushed brightly and began to blubber, apologizing profusely for hurting you. Chelsea dismissed her concerns with a tight hug, slipping you gently into her purse for safekeeping. After calming Sadie down, Chelsea parted ways with the friendly waitress, enduring one more misguided cheer from the blonde Southern belle about Chelsea being reunited with her cutie boyfriend once more.

Sliding into her car, Chelsea spoke aloud. “I’m so sorry for this shitty day, Tom. This was supposed to be a nice meal, and it’s all ruined now.” Your giantess dormmate exhaled deeply. “I’m taking you back to my room to reform, and sleep for the night. Tomorrow morning, we’re hitting up the school’s pool for some relaxation. Sound good?”

Obviously, you couldn’t respond, and Chelsea knew that, but it did sound good. Allowing exhaustion to overtake you, you slipped into a deep and peaceful slumber, knowing you’d be safe in your titanic friend’s hands. Already, you were looking forward to what would hopefully be a great day at the pool come morning, as long as cruel fate didn’t rear its ugly head once more.

***

Sure enough, you woke up around ten o’clock the next morning, rested and rejuvenated, not to mention fully reformed. You were asleep on a small pillow on Chelsea’s bedside table, a thin strip of satin cloth serving as a blanket. Standing up and stretching, you noted your brunette dormmate dressed in casual leggings and tank top fixing a plate of waffles by the counter.

Turning to you, Chelsea smiled warmly and plopped down onto her bed. Tearing off a few chunks of delicious waffles, Chelsea handed them to you on a small napkin, and you eagerly dug into your meal. Neither you nor Chelsea said a word while eating, and you could tell your kindhearted dormmate was still shaken up about the previous day. Even though she had no right to take the blame for any of the events that had transpired at “Sally’s Southern Delights”, Chelsea was still distraught.

You wanted to make her feel a bit happier, but didn’t quite know how, so you merely sat and ate your meal in silence. Afterwards, Chelsea brushed her teeth and freshened up in the bathroom, and gathered some pool supplies in a small string bag. Stopping at your tiny-sized dorm outside of her door, you changed into some bright red swim trunks, then hopped back up into Chelsea’s palm.

The towering brunette began walking down the sidewalk to Middletown University’s student-only pool, basking in the warm sunlight and gentle breeze. You rode in her open palm, gripping her thumb to stabilize yourself. Peering up at her, you noticed her occasionally glance down at you, and then feverishly snap her attention somewhere else, as if to avoid your eye contact.

“Look…Chelsea…” You began. “I want you to know I don’t hate you or anything like that for what happened yesterday. I mean, I got myself into that mess, and you were even the one who saved me! If anything, I wouldn’t be here if it wasn’t for you!”

Chelsea’s cheeks deepened in color, and she met eyes with you. “W-well, someone has to save your tiny little butt from a big girl’s butt!” She laughed, and you laughed along with her. After a moment, she smiled at you sincerely. “Thanks though, that means a lot. And you know I’ll always keep you safe, anytime you’re squished or trapped somewhere.

You grinned mischievously. “Assuming it isn’t you who’s doing the squishing and trapping.”

Another shade deeper in her cheeks. “Wha…Tom! You little jerk!” Chelsea feigned being hurt by your joke, and then quickly flicked you in the stomach, knocking you onto your back.

“Argh! Ah, I’ve been killed!” You cried theatrically, rolling back and forth on your dormmate’s palm. Rolling her eyes, Chelsea continued walking towards the pool, not doing a very good job at hiding a smile derived from your antics.

After a bit more travel, Chelsea made it to the indoor pool, and pushed open the door to the small lobby. Giving a small wave and a flash of her student ID to the receptionist, Chelsea pushed into the girl’s locker room. Immediately, she grabbed your head and your feet with her hands, flattened you out, stretched your body, and wrapped you around her wrist like a make-shift wrist band. Of course, you had expected this, as it was often how Chelsea smuggled you into potentially troublesome areas.

Snuggly wrapped around her wrist, you could merely hang there and wait patiently while your giantess friend found a good space in the locker room, changed out of her street clothes and into her swimsuit, locked up her belongings, and then strolled out into the main pool area. Once there, she untied you from her wrist and you started to reform in her hand.

Middletown University had spared no expense when it came to their student-accessible pool area. A huge, rectangular pool took up most of the space in the center of the room, buoys and racing lines set up to divide the water into lanes for swim practice and competitions. A smaller, square-shaped pool was on the left side of the room, and it was meant for simple relaxation. To the right was a lone hot tub, complete with bubble jets and whirlpool functionality.

Finished reforming, you gazed up at Chelsea…and then gazed further and further down. Your beautiful dormmate had changed into a tight, deep blue two-piece bikini. The top snuggly hugged her quite large breasts, though the revealing nature of the bikini left little to the imagination. Her giant boobs jiggled with her slightest movement. Further below, the equally sexy bikini bottoms left most of her toned ass bare, the subtle swaying of her ass absolutely mesmerizing.

Noting your flagrant display of perversion, Chelsea smirked and flicked you over onto your back again. She began casually walking alongside the big pool, and posed a question to you. “Alright, ya little perv, we’re the only ones in here so far. Let’s hope it stays that way for a while. What do you want to do first?”

You considered your giantess dormmate’s question, scanned the pool area again, and then answered her.

What do you say?
112332223.title: Visiting the Pool

choices: Taking a quick breath, the girl sucks you right into her mouth.
Too slow on your dive, you plunge right into the girl's cleavage.
You mostly miss the girl, but her kicking feet smack you into the air.
1123322232.content:
“Wanna race in the big pool?” You flashed Chelsea a lopsided grin. “I’ll totally win!”

Chelsea scoffed and smiled, competitive eyes flashing. “Oh? Then you’re on, squirt!”

You paled. “What? Chelsea, I was actually kidd-”

Your brunette giantess dormmate cut you off with an enthusiastic shout of joy as she dashed to the side of the large rectangular pool in the center of the room, leapt into the air, and splashed down into the water. Your own screams died as water rushed into your open mouth, the impulsive action of your best friend totally catching you off guard.

Dragged under the water by the sheer magnitude of displacement from Chelsea’s titanic body, your spun head-over-heels, brushing against the toned stomach of your giantess friend. Trying to resurface, you slapped into the underside of her breasts, smacking against her squishy flesh. Thankfully, your just barely avoided being sucked up into her cleavage from beneath, and rose over and around her tits, surfacing.

Choking on some water still in your mouth, you glared at Chelsea, who smiled sheepishly. “What? Not ready for that?” She asked, snorting. You rolled your eyes.

“I can’t actually beat you Chelsea, obviously!” You explained, gesturing to your small size. “How are we going to race?”

Chelsea tapped her chin in mock thoughtfulness. Clearly, she had already concocted some sort of plan. “Well…what if I do a few back and forth laps. Say…fifteen. Meanwhile, you only have to do one. If I finish before you, then I win. If you finish first, you win.”

“Win what?” You inquired. You weren’t exactly confident in your skills, but it did seem to be a fairly measured competition.

“We’ll decide later. Free dinner, or something. Loser pays.” Chelsea reasoned. The towering brunette rolled her shoulders and placed her feet against the wall. “Ready?”

Sighing, you mustered up a confident smirk. “You bet! You’re going down!”

Chelsea laughed. “Dork.” With one final teasing remark, she rocketed off from the wall, tearing down the lane. In the lane beside her, you burst into action, spinning your arms and pumping your legs as fast as they could carry you. You’d long since perfected your swimming technique after many tumultuous encounters with giantesses in pools, bathtubs, and the ocean. Now, you could rely on years of strength and endurance training to keep a strong, steady pace.

Ten minutes passed, and you crossed the halfway point of the lengthy pool lane. Everytime Chelsea passed by in the adjacent lane, sizable waves of water jostled and swayed you about, which you had to say was a bit unfair. However, it wasn’t as if Chelsea could control the effects of her comparatively gigantic body on the water around you. Really, the fault lied with you for choosing a lane so close to her.

A few minutes later, and Chelsea slowed her pace. Stopping your swimming to catch your breath, you watched her heft herself out of the pool, prying onto the tiled floor and climbing out. You valiantly and futilely tried to not stare at her perfectly round ass, squeezed tight by her revealing, soaked bikini. You had no idea what she was doing, and soon resumed swimming.

Though muffled by the water rushing past your ears, you heard Chelsea call out. “Gosh…I only have three more laps left. I’d sure hate for Tom to only be HALFWAY!” She laughed, and you mentally groaned. She would rub in her victory. “Maybe I’ll take a break…I get a drink. I’m thirsty after so much WINNING!”

You fought the urge to trash talk her back, knowing she’d never hear your puny voice all the way from outside the pool. You could only watch from the far corner of your peripheral vision as Chelsea strolled away, arrogantly humming a happy tune. She turned the corner in the back of the pool room, where a water fountain was installed.

At the exact moment Chelsea disappeared around the corner, the female locker room door swung open. Abundant swell of her chest barely fitting into her swimsuit, a black-haired girl walked into the main pool area, followed by nine equally curvy and attractive girls. Each girl was wearing a skintight red one-piece swimsuit that clung to their bodies, rode up their asses, and revealed a surprising amount of cleavage. “Middletown” was written across their chests, the letters skewed and stretched from the giantesses’ bountiful breasts.

The black-haired girl cleared her throat. “Alright girls! Big swim meet tomorrow, so we’re running laps today. Everyone take a lane, and I’ll moderate.”

“Yes Captain Hannah!” The girls cried in unison. Smiling and joking amongst themselves, the girls took their places at the end of the large pool, crouching into low stances. At the sound of Hannah blowing her whistle, each girl launched into the pool and took off through the water. Focused in the zone, each girl powered forward at breakneck speed and perfect form. Hannah smiled with pride.

Rounding the corner, Chelsea wiped her mouth. “Why did a whistle just…” She began, before gasping out in utter surprise. She watched in terror as the swim team tore through the pool, knowing full well you were still there. Running across the room to reach Hannah in a desperate dash to save you, your brunette best friend slipped on a barely noticeable puddle and went flying, sprawling out and banging her head against the metal guardrail of the smaller pool.

Eyes widening in panic, Hannah carefully crossed to Chelsea’s side, spotting the cut of blood on the brunette’s forehead. Helping her gently to her feet, Hannah led Chelsea out of the pool area towards the closest nurse station. Delirious from her head injury, Chelsea only meekly allowed Hannah to escort her, the memory of you seemingly slipping from her mind with the rest of the trickle of blood.

Back in the pool, you had remained totally oblivious to all that was going on, until the rumbling clap of nine girls splashing into the pool simultaneously got your attention. Turning around in horror, you let out a shrill cry as a brown-haired girl sped towards you like a bullet. The rocking and waving waters preventing you from paddling away to safety, you dove down, hoping to avoid the girl by going under her, seeing it as your only chance.

What happens next?

1123322233.content:
Part of you saw the allure of the striped lanes in the largest pool, for a split second the idea of swimming some laps for exercise flew through your mind. But just as quickly as it came, it went, as you realized that swimming one single lap at your size would be likely swimming across an entire ocean to a normal person. And while you were in reasonably good shape you knew that was simply unfathomable.

"I'd be down for some hot tub action. NO bubble jets though!" You say jokingly up to Chelsea from your position on her palm.

"Whaaat, what ever do you mean by no bubble jets, Tom?" Chelsea responded pretending to be clueless before continuing, "It's not like some simple water could do you any harm, could it?"

Laughing at Chelsea's coy tone you doubled down on the jokes and responded, "Oh you're right, it's always a pleasure to be have your entire body swept away by the equivalent of a raging river and thrown all willy-nilly under the water! But hey, I'd probably end up being slammed into your butt or boobs somehow anyway so at least it would be a soft landing."

"Oh you'd like that you creep" Chelsea laughed while responding. She then started walking towards the hot tub area where thankfully nobody was currently located. It would just be you and her with some alone time to relax. A few seconds later you two reached the tub and Chelsea dipped a toe in. "Oh man its pretty hot, awesome" she said out loud to both you and herself before starting to submerge the rest of her body. Before she got all the way in however, she reached out near the side of the tub towards a device that looked similar to the handicap-accessible chairs that regular sized pools had next to them.

As it turns out this was exactly that, but for tiny guys like you. It was small platform attached to a metal arm that could be moved at will by a normal sized girl and used to dip into the hot tub. It wasn't perfect, it didn't have seats or a guard rail or anything, but it was a heck of a lot better than being forced to float around in the hot water! Chelsea moved the device until it just barely dipped half an inch or so into the water before looking down at you, smiling, and placing you on it. The warm water felt great on you, as you still felt a number of aches due to the ass-pounding from the diner incident. Meanwhile Chelsea slid herself the rest of the way into the water, her massive body displacing significantly more water than your tiny form, sending a small wave of hot water over you. Luckily it passed quickly and the water settled back down as you shot a fake-angry look up at your giantess friend.

"Whoops, sorry about that, Tom." Chelsea laughed and then closed her eyes, settling in for some deep relaxation. You did the same and decided to strike up some light conversation.

"So Chelsea, you know why they don't just have an entirely separate pool for us tiny guys instead of these mechanisms to join the girls' things? I mean there's no way it could cost much to build." You say, genuinely curious about the idea.

With her eyes still closed, Chelsea responded, "Actually they tried that a couple of years back. Some of the older girls on the volleyball team were talking about it. They essentially made what looked like a big bathtub in the corner of this pool area," she pointed towards a now empty corner. "Apparently it was a big hit and the guys back then loved it."

Now confused, you asked, "If it was such a big success, then why did they get rid of it?"

"I was just getting to that part. You see, while most everyone at Middletown was aware of this men's only swimming section, we also used to, and still do, grant usage of our facilities to members of opposing sports teams. You know, as an act of good sportsmanship and whatnot." Chelsea elaborated. You gulped, knowing where this story was going already. She continued, "So one day a member of the other team's girls' softball team decided to go to the pool and saw what she thought was a personal bath for athletes..."

"Oh no don't tell me..." you uttered.

"Yep, hopped right into the tub without taking even a single glance. The way my teammates described it was like watching a natural disaster. Dozens of tiny guys were launched up and out of the tub by the water she overflowed, splattering onto the tile below... and those were the lucky ones. Tens more men were sucked downward by the force of her entry, the water sending them flying towards her body, either smacking into her or even getting lodged into the top and bottom of her bikini."

"That's horrible, did they rescue everyone at least?" you said.

"Well, luckily she was told of her mistake immediately and hopped out. Some of the girls on my team helped her scour her bathing suit and according to them they pulled out something like 13 guys from her bikini bottom alone." You breathed a sigh of relief before Chelsea continued, "the only issue was they should have found 14... as it turns out the star player of our men's basketball team at the time had found himself all the way up her..."

"NO WAY" you interjected, pangs of suffering and sympathy shot through your body as you empathized with this poor guy's story. However part of you forgot entirely that your school actually had men's sports still in light of your physical size. But I guess as long as the sport wasn't Co-Ed then there wasn't a reason why it shouldn't still work. Chelsea interrupted your brief thought,

"Yes way, and she didn't even find him until she used the bathroom later that day. But it was once she had already taken the bus back to her college. He didn't return until late the next day and missed the following basketball game, our team got creamed." Chelsea continued in a downtrodden tone, she was a big proponent of sports in general, and it was a shame to even hear of a game decided by such a cruel twist of fate.

"That's so terrible" you responded slightly bummed as well.

"It really is, isn't it? So the school decided for the pool area it would be better to spread the tiny guys out throughout the whole place rather than keep you all concentrated. That way one mistake wouldn't endanger quite so many at once."

You nodded in understanding before briefly considering why the school had not just applied that same mentality to the rest of the campus. Men's paths on the sidewalk, men's specific seating sections at rallies or sports games, all of these things consistently led to large numbers of guys being squashed by a stray foot or ass. But you figured that was a fight for another day, as despite the riveting story by Chelsea you were still focused on relaxing.

Both of you sat for a moment once more before...

Hey! That's my friend Abbie! She wanted to meet you. I'll call her over."

11233222331.content:
Absentmindedly moving your hands back and forth through the simmering yet exceptionally stress-reliving water, you sighed deeply. All of your pains inflicted from Sadie’s abundant rear washed away in the soothing waters of the hot tub, and it appeared as if it was doing wonders on Chelsea as well. You noted her pleased smile and lightly flushed cheeks and tried vigorously NOT to notice her impressively sized chest.

Breaking the silence, you posed a question. “Any more stories you can tell me about the school?” You inquired, drawing an intrigued eye from the brunette giantess. “Your social media feeds keep you much more informed than I am.”

“Well, that’s fair.” Chelsea conceded. “Stories about what, though? My life isn’t particularly exciting outside of volleyball and the constant misadventures I get into with you.”

You bowed theatrically. “Glad I spice up your life Chelsea. I aim to please.”

Your beautiful dormmate stuck out her tongue mockingly. “Dork.” Stretching her arms out in front of her, the titanic girl arched her back and groaned in satisfaction, knocking the kinks out of her stiff joints. “Yeah, I have some stories about this school, if that interests you. They might be a bit rough, but…”

“Rough?”

“Uh, yeah.” Chelsea spared you a sympathetic smile. “Despite all the policies in place here, Middletown’s got a rough track record with keeping tinies safe. I mean, you had to have heard about the living quarters for tinies before the school implemented the custom-designed box dorms, right?”

“I haven’t, no.” You shook your head. Though you feared an unfortunate end to this tale, and your deepest sympathies went out to all your fellow tiny brethren, you were hooked.

Chelsea caught your intrigued stare, smiled, and continued. “From what I heard, tinies used to live in doll houses. Like, actual, legitimate doll houses they bought from toy stores or received as donations. Any tiny without a doll house was given, like, a tissue box or a shoe box.”

“Are you serious? No way a college like this could get away with that!”

“It was only for a year, or less, even! You bet people complained once it became common knowledge. Before then though, doll houses, tissue boxes, and shoe boxes were the norm, and to make matters more complicated, Middletown enforced a policy where the tiny had to sleep in their assigned dormmate’s room, not right outside the door.

“As one would reasonably expect, this was disastrous. I heard all about it from a friend. Some girls were creeped out by the doll houses in their rooms, and sold them off to pawn shops, having no idea their tiny dormmate was still inside! Other girls had their families with them on moving day, and I heard nearly twenty tinies were unknowingly stolen by curious little sisters confusing them for real dolls!”

“Geez, it must’ve been a mess!” You exclaimed, rubbing your chin. Grimacing, you continued. “Sure am glad I got here when I did.”

Chelsea nodded. “Yeah, but they might’ve been the luckiest tinies. I’ve heard rumors of tinies who got squished into their tissue boxes by oblivious dormmate’s filling the box, then used to…well…clean their noses later on. The tinies in shoe boxes…you can probably guess, but the school had a lot of trouble finding every single tiny-shaped insole or gum stain across campus.”

“This makes me appreciate those custom dorms they give us now a WHOLE lot more!” You laughed, though mostly from nervousness. You couldn’t imagine what the first batch of tinies at Middletown had to go through. How many precautions nowadays weren’t in place back then?

Dwelling on this thought for a moment, your concentration was broken upon noting Chelsea’s concerned expression. Seeing that you were looking at her, Chelsea sighed. “Talking about old times also reminded me of an even worse story an old friend told me about. It happened three years ago, I think.”

“Go on.” You urged, dread building up inside of you.

“There was this girl, her name was Lani, and it was her freshman year. Word is that she had a habit with pranking tinies, but one day a sorority sister dared her a hundred dollars to do something really bad to a tiny on campus. A bit of a thrill seeker, Lani took up the challenge, and ambushed her tiny physics professor after class one day.

“From there, I’m told she squished him flat, stretched him out into a wide disc, carried him off to a different class room, and fitted his squishy body over the seat cushion of the professor’s chair when she was out. His tan body blended in with the cushion, which was already tan, so not a soul could tell the difference other than Lani, who eagerly collected her hundred dollars from the sorority sister.”

You smacked your forehead in disappointment. “And, let me guess, when the teacher returned…”

“Yep.” Chelsea nodded glumly. “Plopped down right onto the poor guy without a second thought. My old friend told me the tiny suffered under the teacher’s ass for five days straight, each second further gluing him onto the cushion. To make matters more cruel, Lani chose a teacher named Miss Ivy, who the tiny actually had a crush on. She practically forced him to be buried under the ass of the woman he liked for a week!”

You frowned deeply, recalling a few similar incidents in your own life. The cruelty of others never ceased to both surprise and depress you. Looking at Chelsea, you spoke. “Lani eventually freed him, right?”

Chelsea stared back at you, straight faced. “No. This is where the story takes a turn for the worst. After a week, Miss Ivy accidentally spilled fruit punch all over the cushion, and the squished professor, after class one day. The punch stained the cushion and the poor tiny’s skin, and thinking it was simply an old cushion, Miss Ivy lifted it off of the chair and threw it right into the trash.”

“WHAT?” You cried loudly, shocking even Chelsea.

“And Lani was standing there the whole time. Knowing she couldn’t tell Miss Ivy about the flatted tiny wrapped around her seat cushion without indicting herself of the crime, she kept quiet and watched as Miss Ivy tossed him away into the garbage. MY friend told me she sat there, with a damn smile on her face, as a environment club student bagged up the trash, and hauled it out to the school dumpster.” Chelsea paused. “No one ever saw him again.”

You seethed, your face burning bright red. “What punishment did Lani get for this? Someone throw her in the trash.”

Chelsea laughed without and true feeling. “I wish. No…she didn’t get in trouble at all. There was no hard evidence to connect her to the crime. Plus, I think her mom’s a major donor for Middletown, so it’d take serious clout to accuse her of anything.

“Worse, I heard she felt a bit of a high doing something like that and getting away with it. She’s a senior now, and from what I know, she’s been connected to nearly fifteen tiny disappearances, and probably more no one knows about. She’s pretty much untouchable, and all tinies instinctually stay far, far away from her. Though, I guess she just finds defiance like a challenge. Probably excites her.”

“Okay!” You threw up your hands. “Can we drop the subject. I can’t be responsible for my actions if you keep riling we up.”

Chelsea stifled a chuckle. “Yeah, you go stud! Beat her up, will ya!” She grinned, and you instantly felt a bit foolish. What could someone your size truly do to a giantess? “But, I’m sorry Tom. Didn’t mean to get so dark. Let me think of some more lighthearted stories…I’ve gotta have some.”

While Chelsea mused, your attention was drawn to some motion out of the corner of your eye. Looking over your best friend’s shoulder, you noted another girl enter the pool area. Short, cropped blonde hair with a single silver streak caught your eye, almost as much as her piercingly blue eyes and creamy white skin. Her curves were nothing to sneeze at either, impressive rack and rear end held tight by a frilly red two-piece that left little to the imagination.

Noting your distant gaze, Chelsea looked over her shoulder at the new girl. After a moment, she opened her mouth to speak.

What does she say?

11233222332.content:
Chelsea’s eyes closed, and she breathed out a deep sigh of relief and satisfaction as the heated water washed over her. Taking her cue, you closed your own eyes and relaxed your stiff limbs, still sore from the pounding of Sadie’s ass yesterday. Hopping into the hot tub had been a brilliant idea, and you felt your worries washing away. It truly seemed as if today, unlike the fiasco yesterday, was going to be a great day.

Your eyes lazily fluttered open as you heard a faint splashing noise grow louder and louder from somewhere behind you. Vaguely curious, you arched your head back to see what was causing the noise. Just then, you heard a few beeping sounds and a loud click, and then the engines of the bubble jets in the hot tub slowly began whirring to life.

Darting straight up in a panic, began to jump to your feet and yell over to Chelsea, when your body was cast in shadow. Glancing up again, your view was completely blocked out by two unbelievably humongous butt cheeks wrapped up by only the flimsiest of bikini bottoms, the red fabric of the swimsuit practically flossing the surprise giantess’s meaty cheeks. Tracing the cheeks down, similarly thick thighs supported two powerful legs carrying the girl into the tub.

It was clear what had happened by now, and that you were way too late to stop it from happening. Whoever this girl was, she had clearly walked into the pool area while you and Chelsea were zoned out, saw the hot tub mostly empty save Chelsea, and decided to make herself out home. To further compound the chaos of the situation, she had switched on the bubble jets too!

With no room to move, the girl’s left hand slapped right into you as she sat down in the hot tub, butter smooth skin slapping you across the face and sending you sprawling backwards. Tumbling off of your special podium seat, you plunged right into the searing water of the hot tub, around the middle of the tub. Already, you could feel the water beginning to churn and spin around from the bubble jets kicking in.

As the girl submerged herself into the tub, her gigantic jiggly ass crashed onto the thin platform for tinies, her gratuitously sexy weight snapping the platform off of the metallic arm. Letting out a cute squeal, the girl grabbed the now broken platform, blushed sheepishly, and tossed it out of the tub, hoping no one had seen her break the contraption (and your only real way out of the hot tub on your own).

Unfortunately for both her and you, Chelsea was roused from her deeply relaxed state by the sound of the plastic seat cracking in half, and she eased herself up into a sitting position, displacing a huge wave of water. Of course, that wave hit you right as you surfaced in the middle of the tub and tried to shout her name, bubbly liquid filling your mouth and dunking you back down. The water was picking up speed now, and your tiny body floated helplessly along with it.

Chelsea’s eyes widened in a panic as she noted the girl now sitting happily beside her, and the bubbly water all around her. Not to mention, the broken seat and your disappearance.

“Oh god…” She said softly. The unexpected intruder flashed her a brilliantly cheery smile, not picking up on Chelsea’s clear uneasiness.

“Hey there! My name’s Melody!” The new girl grinned from ear-to-ear, like an innocent child. Her luscious, strawberry red locks framed a tanned, youthful face bursting with energy, green eyes sparkling with delight. Even Chelsea (flustered as she was) couldn’t help but notice the sheer magnitude of Melody’s curves, from her huge boobs that dwarfed Chelsea’s own breasts, to her significant bubble butt and big thighs. She also took note of the painfully immodest red two-piece the girl’s abundant proportions were squeezed into, hardly more than scraps of fabric.

Taking a deep breath, Chelsea looked Melody in the eye. “Hi, I’m Chelsea. Nice to meet you. Did you happen to see anyone else when you got in the hot tub? A tiny, maybe?”

Melody bit her lip and twirled a lengthy strand of her wavy hair. “A cute little tiny? Nope! Just you!” She glanced behind her. “Though my big booty may have snapped that little plastic thingy…hope that wasn’t important.”

“It might’ve been. My friend was sitting on that.” Chelsea explained, speaking slowly and clearly. Melody was evidently far from the brightest bulb in the box, so your dormmate knew she needed to be clear and concise around such an obvious ditz.
Melody pouted in an absurdly cute way. “Aw, no way! I’m such a dumb klutz! Always messing stuff up…”

“It’s fine. “Chelsea waved her concern away. “If you could just stand up and turn around real quick, he may be plastered to your…er…your ass.”

Melody blushed brightly stood up hastily, water splashing everywhere. “Sure, sure, of course! Please help him!” In a hasty rush, the airheaded redhead shoved her ass into Chelsea’s face, knocking the brunette’s head backwards and stuffing her dripping wet butt cheeks into her face. Chelsea quickly pushed Melody off of her, eliciting an apology from the red head.

While this was going on, the bubble jets had kicked into full intensity, and your body was tossed helplessly around the hot tub, banging into the tiled walls of the tub, and colliding constantly with Chelsea and Melody.
