Meanwhile, your giantess friend simply wiggled her toes invitingly and motioned for you to begin.

As you approached her feet, Chelsea sighed deeply. “Aah! This is going to be so relaxing! I’m super exhausted, and my feet could use a good massage. I might even doze off.”

You wrinkled your nose in not-so-subtle disgust as every fiber of your being was assaulted by the undeniably offensive stench of sweat coming from Chelsea’s moist, dirt-marked feet. Groaning in determination, you pressed on, until you stood right by the heel of Chelsea’s left foot. Knowing you had to get this over sooner rather than later, you pressed your hands against her flesh and began massing her.

It wasn’t easy to do, as Chelsea’s skin was fairly firm after years and years of sports practice, but you soon found a rhythm for kneading her skin between your tiny hands. Your efforts were miniscule yet clearly effective, as you could see Chelsea’s smile deepen. In fact, you swore you could also see a faint blush in her cheeks, but more apparent was the copious sweat and grime now coating your hands and arms.

Suddenly, Chelsea’s foot twisted, and her big toe snapped down, clenching tight onto your neck. Your head was crushed flat, and your startled cry instantly muffled as your face was shoved into the grimy space between Chelsea’s tanned big toe and second toe. You flailed your arms and legs, beating against her taut sole in protest.

Your struggled only elicited a giggle from your mischievous tormentor. “Ooh, this feels especially nice Tom! I like the whole ‘pounding my foot’ thing you’re doing, but don’t wear yourself out. You still have my other foot, and I’m far from…*YAWN*…feeling satisfied.”

After a moment, Chelsea released her big toe’s grip on you, letting you drop back down to the carpet. As you reformed, you felt slightly intimated by Chelsea’s now propped-up foot hanging above you, and you struggled to wipe the dirt from your face. You knew Chelsea was just playfully rubbing her victory in the wager in your face, and you were determined to face her challenge head on.

You massaged her foot for a few more minutes before the curvy brunette let out a loud yawn. Curiously, you peered up at her face, and noticed her eyes closed and face set in a peacefully neutral expression. Had she really fallen asleep so easily?

A second thought grew from this first question: If Chelsea was asleep, surely you could sneak away from your punishment with her being none-the-wiser. Of course, you felt a bit of a guilty twinge in your heart from even thinking this, but it was absolutely a tempting choice to abandon this smelly, admittedly gross masseuse duty.

What happens next?
11331.title: Holding Up Your End of the Bargain

choices: Negatively
Positively
113312.content:
You decided that since she was asleep, there's no harm in it. Plus, you could really use a break from her horrid smelling feet. You start carefully walking away from her as she seems to be in a deep sleep.

You were a good distance away and thought you were home free only to hear her yawn. You went to turn back and act like you never left but you were too far away. "And just where do you think you're going? We had a deal remember?" Chelsea said, her face showing a mixture of anger and annoyance.

"W-well I was just going to get some water, honest I wasn't trying to escape." It was a weak lie and you knew she probably saw clean through it, but at least you could say you tried.

"Oh really? Well why didn't you just say so? I have the perfect drink for you. It's home grown." You looked at her with confusion but then it clicked.

"Chelsea come on you don't mean your foot sweat do you? Please come on isn't that a bit much?" You didn't like where this was going.

"Come on it's only fair. You do it and all is forgiven." She made a good point. You did try and back out of the wager, you would feel the same if you were her.

"Alright, how many licks?" You asked hoping the number would be low.

"Hm, let's say 5." You hung your head and walked over. You smelled the pungent odor coming from her feet. You couldn't believe you were about lick her sweat and dirt coated feet 5 times. You stuck your tongue out and dragged it across the sole. You may not like it, but if there's one thing you could do it was shock her.

So on your 3rd lick, you made a point to give her foot an extra big lick and the next two followed suit. Your tongue felt like it would melt off and the taste of her feet now soaked your mouth. You went to look at her reaction but were quickly met with her already damp sock trapping you against her foot.

You heard her laughing from above. "Good job Thomas, but I think your punishment should go a bit further. That and I knew you'd never agree to this part of it." You struggled to get out but it was no use.

"HEY LET ME OUT!!!! CHELSEA SCOTT WHEN I GET OUT I'M GONNA-" You were cut off as she placed her foot down into the carpet, silencing and smothering you.

"You talk too much." She clearly was just having fun at your expense and probably was just resting her foot gently as you weren't necessarily squished but that didn't provide much help when you are being soaked in your best friends foot sweat.

It stayed this way for about 5 minutes before she took you out and you inhaled the fresh air like it was your first time. "Never...do that...again." You said through gasps. Her laughing stopped and she went into an awkward smile.

"I'm sorry Thomas, are you OK? Oh geez look I think I got carried away, we still have 3 days I'm sure I can make it up to you somehow." She went into full on concern mode for you clearly regretting her actions.

How do you react?

1. Negatively, you think it's best to try and avoid her for the moment.

2. Positively, she seems concerned and like she said, 3 days to make up for it.
113312.title: You try to sneak away, only for Chelsea to wake...

choices: To be friends again
You to leave me alone
1133121.content:
You almost wanted to lash out, "You THINK you got carried away? I'm gonna be coughing up foot sweat and dirt all night." But you kept those thoughts bottled up and said, "I think...I think I just need to get some rest you know? Could you please get the door?" You wished you could get it yourself, the more free you could be the better.

"Yeah lemme just carry you so you don't have to walk." Chelsea said going down to pick you up but you quickly backed away.

"No no that's fine, I'm just fine on my own thank you." Chelsea clearly didn't like where this was going but decided to open the door anyway and waited for you to walk out.

You were slower than usual thanks to recent events but you eventually made it and waved good bye. As soon as you got in your house, you took an immediate shower. "If I ever touch another foot again it'll be too soon." You thought scrubbing away at your self. You probably went over board washing your hair and body multiple times but you made reason of it, after all, you were covered in foot sweat.

Next came brushing your teeth, the water in the shower can only wash the taste out so much. This wasn't as easy as just washing your body, the taste really seemed to linger.

For the rest of the day you just tried watching TV and left your phone on silent. "I can talk to her...some other time. Just not now."

The next morning you absent mindedly checked your phone and saw a bunch of texts from Chelsea, 13 to be exact. They mostly said "Are you OK?" or "I'm really sorry" and one said "Are you gonna come to my game this Sunday?" You got rather mad at that last one. You weren't quite sure but some part of you wanted to completely burn that bridge, but you settled by saying "I'll see and yeah I'm all good."

"Do I wanna go to your game!?! So what? So you can throw me in your shoe? Use me as a sweat rag? Well she can find another friend. Cause I refuse." Of course you didn't say this. To her at least, but to yourself as you ranted like a mad man.

"Alright but now the hard part? How do I avoid her?" This led to a fair amount of planning. One thing was for sure, no unnecessary trips. "I'll spend my time inside and only venture out for food. This will only be temporary anyway, I'm sure I'll be over this soon."

You're plan was actually perfect, you never crossed paths with Chelsea. That didn't stop her from trying to reach out to you though. She knocked on your door and you answered, really hoping it was anybody else. "Hey Chelea, what brings you here?"

She chuckled kinda nervously. "Well I live right next to you haha. But um no I rented some really dumb movies and bought some junk food. Come on let's go watch em, it'll be fun." This was a common thing y'all did. It was practically a ritual. Anytime either of y'all were having a bad day, y'all would sit around and watch terrible movies and eat. And it was never made a rule but you never declined, cause you know, best friends.

You really weren't in the mood though and it hurt in a way to say it but you replied with, "No thank you, I actually uh got a busy day tomorrow. I'm trying to get a head start on some school work. I really would but, grades ya know."

"Yeah, I understand...hey maybe I could-" You closed the door before she could finish. You already knew she would ask to help you out on school work, there was no school work though. Plus you had no other excuses left. "Or not..." You heard her say before she walked off.

The next day was complete smooth sailing no interruptions, just binge watching some shows you needed to catch up on. The next day was game day. You tried to go to all her games but there was always a fear of being sat on or crushed or what have you. This never really stopped you of course cause that's living in fear, something you hated.

You were almost back to your dorm, ramen in hand, when you heard Chelsea call out your name. "Thomas! There you are, I've been looking for you." You looked around, the door was too far away to make an inconspicuous exit, and no one else was paying attention to the situation for you to make any sort of "help me" gesture. "Anyway, you coming to my game tonight? I talked to our coach and she said you could chill on the outside of my bag, no fear of getting crushed plus you get the best seat in the house to watch me win, all free of charge."

"Well I'd love to but-" You weres cut off by her snatching you up. Oh god, this isn't good. You thought as she carried you to who knows where. You were placed down and released to see that you were on her bed, in between her legs as she sat criss cross style to prevent you from running. "Look Thomas, I'm sorry for what I did, really I am. And I know you're trying to avoid me till you cool off but I'm not waiting for however long that may be. So what do I have to do to make you my friend again? And I'm not leaving till I get a genuine answer, the game be damned."

You were shocked to say the least. What did you want? Was she really gonna miss the game for me? Ah this is so confusing. "I want____."
1133121.title: Negatively

choices: Chelsea's team
Opposing team
11331211.content:
"I want to be friends again it's just...I'm scared I think. Maybe I just don't trust you. It's hard to put my finger on." Chelsea looked down at you. She knew it was probably fear. The issue was, you had never been truly scared before. You always bounced back undeterred.

"Listen, I think you are scared and don't know if you can trust me anymore but I promise you I still am your best friend. I know trust is hard to build but I'm willing to do whatever it takes." She seemed sincere but you were having doubts.

"Whatever it takes? What if I asked you to skip out on tonight's game?" You thought she would try and deflect the request or flat out say no but instead she took out her phone and started typing. She showed you it and it was a quick explanation of why she wouldn't be there.

"Just say the word." She said. You were convinced of her sincerity now.

"No don't go that far but I'm...touched that you'd go to such extremes for me. Also, I rather not find myself inside one of their socks tomorrow after they lose without you haha." Y'all laughed at the joke and shared a smile for what seemed like the first time.

"So, are we cool?" She asked not quite knowing what your answer would be. Just a few moments ago she kinda kidnapped you.

"We are cool yeah but, I'm not forgiving you just yet at least completely. Now come on, I wanna watch you win." That's all she had to hear as she hugged you against her breasts and headed out, with you in hand.

As y'all were walking you had an idea. "Let's put some win win incentives on the line. If you win, I massage your clean feet. If you lose, I get to sleep between your boobs." You said putting an emphasis on clean. She laughed at that and agreed, either way would be fun.

---------------------------

You went through the game with 0 incidents. You were actually very surprised and impressed. The coach joked with you about how you were the x factor they were gonna throw in at the last second, it was quite a fun experience.

That didn't matter now though, the game was coming down to the wire, it was 2-2 with both teams tied at 13. Chelsea's team had made a solid comeback but now needed to finish. Who ends up winning?
11331211.title: To be friends again

choices: Amy/Jessica find some way to cause mayhem during the bus ride.
The bus ride goes smoothly, and the trio begin their weekend of fun.
113313.content:
You shoved the guilty thoughts from your mind, chastising yourself for even thinking of them in the first place. Berating yourself further, you dived headfirst into proving to Chelsea that she’d receive the best damn massage of her entire life, your own safety and cleanliness be damned. Whether she was asleep or not, you were not going to take advantage of your friendship and her trust in your like that.

Dutifully, your kept diligently at your task, massaging every single speck of skin on Chelsea’s left and right foot. Your rubbed your hands along her heels, kneaded the flesh of her soles, and wedged yourself in between her toes to clean out any leftover gunk. Chelsea slept peacefully the entire time, only occasionally eliciting a soft, satisfied moan. You even started to enjoy the ability to make your titanic best friend so relaxed and happy.

Three hours passed by, and Chelsea finally stirred awake. Hands numb, you were in the middle of your third round of massaging the sole of her right foot. As she shook awake, you dropped from her foot and took a few steps back to allow the brunette giantess space to stretch and reorient herself. Blinking sleepy eyes, Chelsea gazed down at you, and then at her feet, which practically shimmered with purity and sterile sanctity.

“Geez Tom…my feet feel amazing!” Chelsea beamed. “Damn man, you work wonders!” She flashed you a coy grin. “Can we make wagers like this more often?”

You shrugged, your entire body sore. “Eh…let’s keep it infrequent. For my sanity.”

Your gigantic dormmate noted your body in fine detail and crinkled her nose. “OH, god! Tom, I’m super sorry!” She said, no doubt referring to your hands and feet, caked in dirt and grime, and your clothes soaked with sweat, both yours and Chelsea’s. A faint stench permeated your entire being.

“Comes with the job.” You confidently replied. “A masseuse is a thankless profession.”

Chelsea smiled warmly. “Well then…thank you.” She delicately picked you up and carried you into the bathroom. She filled up the sink with water and closed the drain to prevent any accidents. Letting you down on the counter, she dabbed a bit of soap into the watery pool. “Clean up a bit, and we’ll talk about thanking you.”

Eyes widening in both confusion and anticipation, you could only watch Chelsea smirk gleefully and walk away, leaving you alone in the bathroom to clean up. Stripping out of your gross clothes, you hopped into the makeshift sink pool in cannonball style.

Five minutes later, there was a knock at Chelsea’s door, and she opened it to find an out of breath Amy, glasses askew and dirt marks on her beautiful face.

“Amy?” Chelsea frowned. “Did you trip and fall in the grass outside?” Amy’s cheeks flushed, and Chelsea knew she had found her answer.

“I…w-was just coming over…t-to make sure you were ready. We leave in thirty minutes.” Amy explained, setting her glasses down and trying to smooth out her wrinkled blouse and skirt.

“Ready for…” Chelsea titled her head, and then gasped. “Oh god! That is today, isn’t it? I totally spaced and didn’t even remind Tom! Damn, I was hoping for more quiet time with him. I’ll…uh…throw some stuff together real quick.” Turning from Amy, Chelsea began rummaging around in her drawers for some clothes and other necessities. Amy focused her gaze on the bathroom.

Looking over her shoulder to Chelsea, Amy spoke. “C-can I…wash up real quick?”

“Totally.” Chelsea answered, head buried in her cabinet of swimsuits and lingerie. Taking her cue, Amy pushed open the bathroom door and strolled inside, a bit surprised by the filled sink and clout of bubbles. Thinking nothing else of it, the massive blonde dumped her hands into the water, cupping them.

In the middle of finishing your quick bath, you hadn’t even seen Amy enter through the haze of bubbles, and so let out a muffled scream when her hands suddenly plunged into the sink on either side of you. Panicking, you had no idea which way to swim, and found yourself hoisted into the air as Amy raised her palms and splashed the warm water right into her face.

Flung from her hand, you slapped against her cheek, thankfully crashing into her smooth skin back first. In only a moment later, Amy grabbed up a towel and rubbed her face, dragging off the dirt particles and drying and sweat and water left. Sadly, this only flattened your squishy body out, like a sticker on her cheek, rather than peel you free.

Still as oblivious as ever, Amy unplugged the drain and left the bathroom. You could only dully think about how you would’ve been sent straight down into the sewers by the walking disaster known as Amy if she hadn’t swept you up onto her cheek. It was a weird sensation to stare out from her face, see what she saw, and yet be one-hundred percent invisible to her.

You got a full view of Chelsea’s perfect ass as she finished bending over to stuff some belongings into a small suitcase, and then she stood up. Looking at Amy, she seemed poised to say something before locking eyes with you and breaking into laughter. Amy pouted, thinking she was making fun of her.

Grabbing up her glasses, Amy slid them back on and frowned. “What? What’s so funny? I cleaned off the dirt!”

Chelsea giggled. “You…may have…added something else!”

Amy furrowed her brow, glanced in the closest mirror, and spotted you. Narrowing her eyes, she scratched you off her cheek with her fingernail. Chelsea continued to laugh, until Amy curled back her finger, and flicked you into the trash can. That stopped Chelsea’s fit of enjoyment.

“What, no! Amy! That was Tom!” Chelsea exclaimed, rushing over to dig you out.

Amy paled. “It was? Oh no, Tom, I’m so sorry!” She cried.

***

Thirty minutes later, and Chelsea stood beside Amy out in the parking lot of the dorm building, waiting for the bus to arrive. You were safely in Chelsea’s palm, though still a bit rattled from the whirlwind of the past half hour.

Chelsea had filled you in that Middletown was offering a weekend stay at a beach resort roughly five hours away, and that the bus ride down was today. The student expenses covered the bus ride, hotel room for three days, and any on-site amenities (like the spa and private beach). Tinies, as long as their giantess dormmate had paid to attend, were allowed to ride for free, and so nearly each girl had their miniscule dormmate with them.

After digging you out of the trash, Chelsea had gathered some of your spare clothes per your instructions and slipped them into a small pocket on her suitcase. You caught the briefest glimpse of several scandalous swimsuits and couldn’t help but feel a bit excited to spend a whole weekend with Chelsea at a beach resort.

Or at least…you would’ve been excited if not for the fact that Chelsea’s assigned roommates were the worst possible candidates. Having been given an exuberant suite at the hotel, Middletown wanted to group up the girls. Each suite had three beds, so each group had three girls. And, of course, Chelsea’s first roommate was none other than Amy.

Standing to your right, Amy eagerly rocked on her heels, ready for some fun in the sun. Her jiggly breasts nearly spilled from her low-cut blouse, and you could just barely make out the head of her tiny dormmate Eric poking from between her tits. For some ungodly reason, Amy had decided tucked between her boobs was the best place for the poor boy, and you just knew she’d forget about him in minutes.

That left the other roommate as…

“Hey, you two! Ready for a great weekend!” A fake-sounding voice happily called out. Chelsea turned to look, and you saw the fear-inducing, black-haired giantess stroll merrily down the sidewalk, rolling suitcase in hand. Her tight tube top and curve-hugging short shorts left absolutely nothing to the imagination.

“Sup, Jessica?” Chelsea said. “You sound more…enthusiastic…than normal.”

Jessica feigned surprise. “What? I’m always stoked for some fun with friends!” She chomped on her gum loudly. “And hello to you too, cutie!” She bent down to look at you in Chelsea’s hand, an innocent grin on her face.

However, you caught the cruel glint in her eye, even if no one else around you did. You also watched her luscious lips smack together, working her gum into overtime. You knew beyond a shadow of a doubt that that gum was actually her tiny dormmate Jack, but there wasn’t much you could do about it to stop her.

The bus finally pulled up a minute later, and everyone piled on. Aside from Chelsea, Amy, and Jessica, there were about fifteen other girls heading to the resort for the weekend. Eyeing the cuties despite yourself, you remained cautiously optimistic that maybe, just maybe, this weekend would turn out alright after all.

What happens next?
113313.title: Weekend Excursion

choices: You get to the destination but nearly all of you are sticking to Chelsea's ass
You get to the destination and luckily you all brush off easily
The bus breaks down on the way there! (or writer's choice)
1133131.content:
As more and more girls flooded their way onto the bus you couldn't believe how many beauties would be going on this trip. If being this tiny had any positives then one of them would certainly be possessing the ability to stare at girls without them noticing. Well, at least, without most of them noticing. You suddenly felt a light jab in your back as Chelsea poked you with her index finger, saying "Take a picture, it'll last longer ya creep" before laughing.

"Sorry but can ya blame a guy?" you responded in the cheesiest manner you could, eliciting only an eyeroll from your dormmate. Looking to your side you saw the two empty seats finished of the group of three they were all divided in, perfect for Chelsea, Amy, and Jessica to sit together. As she was still standing in the aisle, Jessica caught your attention and could have sworn you could have seen the gears in her evil genius brain turning. You gulped, knowing she would certainly come up with some sadistic method of crushing either you, her dormmate Jack, or any other guy on this bus. Just then she said,

"Oh no! I forgot my sunscreen back in my dorm! And I'm supposed to be supervising this trip so I can't leave the bus! Is there any way you could run and grab it for me, Amy? I promise we won't leave without you!" Jessica's words seemed suspect already as she was treating this excursion like a grade school field trip. In reality it was just a regular bus taking a group of students to a destination.

None the wiser to this scheme, Amy responded, "Yeah totally! Be back in a jiff! Just hold Eric for me!" Amy fished Eric out of her massive cleavage with some effort and dropped him into Jessica's awaiting palm. She only smiled at the boy before saying, "Thanks a million!" in a transparent tone of niceness.

As soon as Amy exited the bus, Jessica raised her voice so the entire bus could hear her. "Okay, everyone! As the Dean's daughter I have been instructed to make sure a few things go smoothly for this trip. The first of which being the seating arrangement for the bus ride there and back. Sadly, you cannot ride with your respective tiny roomie, they all must share one chair while we sit in the rest!"

A number of groans and questions came flying at her, from Chelsea and yourself included, but she dismissed them all by saying, "I know, I know, it sucks! But it's some safety guideline we have to follow and if we don't the whole trip could be canceled!" The truth was that all of this was a flat out lie, but none of the girls wanted to rock the boat and possibly compromise their free vacation. "So if you would please pass your guy my way and I'll place them next to me that would be very helpful!" Even Chelsea seemed incredibly skeptical of the situation, but she wasn't one to break rules, so she reluctantly passed you to this tormentor. Jessica shot you the quickest wink before placing you and Eric on the seat next to her. Guy after guy was passed back until you all had quickly formed a large crowd, fitting rather nicely on the fabric cushion of the bus seat. In all the commotion it seemed like most of the other girls had stopped questioning this procedure, even the guys next to you laid down and began to relax. Finally, Jessica, who had been looming over the crowd of you for the duration of this ordeal moved to sit down. Swinging her ass over the seat elicited a fair number of screams from the guys around you. But as you prepared for the inevitable crushing, Jessica peered behind her and said,

"Oh relax guys! I'm keeping you guys safe, I wouldn't ever sit on you!" Her friendly demeanor frightened you even worse than her usual maliciousness, but she stayed true to her word and plopped her ass in the next seat over, right beside Chelsea. Now even you were confused as you didn't understand the direction Jessica's plan was going in.

Just then, you heard from the front of the bus, "I got your sunscreen, Jessica! Here ya go!" and your eyes went wide with fear. Amy hadn't heard a single word of Jessica's announcement to the bus, and looking around you saw that every other seat was filled... Peering down the aisle as best as you could you saw the bouncing curves of this excited girl, a sight that elicited equal parts arousal and panic for the guys who saw it with you.

"Great, thanks so much! Take a seat and we'll hit the road!" Jessica shouted back before addressing the bus driver, "We're all good, thanks for waiting! Lets roll!" The bus driver responded with a simple thumbs up before closing the door and revving the engine to start moving. The bus lurched forward and Amy lost her balance for a split second, recovering before totally falling to the ground somehow. You saw her look around for an empty seat, not finding a single one until, inevitably, she came across the boys' seat. Smiling giddily she walked the rest of the way before arriving at the seat.

You always assumed that someone who was so into respecting the lives of tiny guys would at the bare minimum look where she stepped and sat, but Amy proved to you time and time again that this assumption was false. Once again she didn't spare a single glance downward as she handed Jessica her sunscreen and swung her absolutely enormous ass above the 40 or so guys in a mob on the seat. Amy's skirt was so minuscule you honestly thought it might fit you, and as you saw the planet-sized orbs of pale ass flesh looming over your entire field of vision, you wondered why she even wore it at all. At this exact moment some girls on the bus finally took notice of what was about to happen, Chelsea included. A handful of girls screamed out "Amy!" but it was far too late.

*whump*

Amy plopped her ass firmly into what she thought was her seat, her cheeks taking a few full seconds to stop wobbling. Instantly she was accosted by a number of girls near her who witnessed the mass squashing occur. Being the closest, Chelsea got through to her the quickest, saying,

"Amy! All of the guys in the bus were in that seat! You just accidentally crushed every one of them! Stand up, quick!" Amy's face went absolutely ghost white as she then recognized that the massive squishing sound she had just heard was not only the seat. She was too flabbergasted to speak, as despite how often Amy found herself in situations like this, she never stopped feeling horrible about inflicting pain on tiny guys.

Deep down below you and 39 other guys around you felt nothing but warm, slightly sweaty ass meat above and rough fabric below. She had completely wiped out dozens of men without even noticing, and you could only pray she would stand up. Just then you heard some muffled talking above, and felt some weight to begin to be lifted off of you! However, this victory was short lived, as you immediately felt the full force of her weight slam back down once again.

Back above, Jessica had physically blocked Amy's attempt to stand up, to the confusion and outrage of many other girls on the bus. Lying through her teeth once again, she said,

"I'm so sorry, everyone. I should have warned Amy the guys were sitting here, this is all my fault, not hers. But... the bus is already moving and it is illegal to stand up in a moving vehicle... so Amy has to stay where she is." Jessica feigned a morose sincerity that seemed to be winning over most of the girls. Amy herself sunk into an even greater sadness. Now not only was she crushing the daylights out of the entire group of guys on the trip, but she was forbidden to stop!

On the outside Jessica looked quite sad as well, but on the inside she was absolutely reeling with happiness at how well her plan had worked out. Not only had she accomplished her physical torture of all of the guys, but she had also successfully mentally tormented Amy. It was truly a win-win for this malevolent girl.

How does the rest of the journey go?
1133131.title: Is This Seat Taken?

choices: Chelsea cooks up a meal for you, and then begins to serve it to you.
While cooking, Chelsea trips and falls backwards, crushing you under her ass.
While dazed you fall off the bed, only to end up flattened under Chelsea's heel.
*Writer's Choice*
11332.content:
The Westland player’s leg shot forward in a powerful arc, connecting with the ball and propelling it straight towards the goal, but at a slight angle. However, anticipating the angled shot, the Lakefield goalie leapt in the right direction to catch the ball, and the soccer ball bounced harmlessly off of her chest and away from the goal, securing the win for Lakefield.

You jumped onto your feet and bounced up and down on the plush mattress, pumping your fists in the air and shouting for joy. Though you weren’t normally that into sports, you found yourself wrapped up in the hype excitement of the close match. Chelsea slapped the ground in quick frustration, but soon looked back at your jubilant dance and couldn’t help but crack a smile.

Of course, that smile soon morphed into a jaw opened in mute horror as you stared back at your giantess dormmate with prideful mischief. Chelsea remembered the promised consequence of the wager she had made with you, and so did you. Since she had lost, she now had to dress up in a maid outfit and cook dinner for you.

Before you even opened your mouth, Chelsea cut you off. “DON’T even say it. I know I lost, and I don’t back down.” Fighting down a growing blush in her cheeks, Chelsea stood up. “One of my best friends owns a maid outfit, and I’ll go get it now.”

“What, really?” You balked, not actually expecting the situation to escalate quite this quickly.

“Yes, now! I’m getting this over with AND serving you the best damn dinner you’ve ever had.” Chelsea declared, her competitive spirit shining through her mounting embarrassment. Heading out of her room, you now found yourself alone, with nothing to do but wile away the time until your brunette friend returned in her…less than appropriate outfit. Admittedly, you were pretty excited.

***

After knocking on her good friend’s door for a few moments, the dorm room door swung open. Inside was Sydney, or Syd (as she was known among friends). With shining blonde hair and a blindingly pink (and shockingly revealing) tank top and micro shorts, Sydney was the definition of pep and boundless enthusiasm. She was as hyperactive as girls came and could cheer up anyone with her infinite happiness and love.

Screaming like a coward, you dove behind the nearest item on the desk, which happened to be fancy looking wristwatch probably misplaced by a student. Peeking your head over the watch, your skin crawled as the steps grew closer and closer, your heartbeat racing. You slapped your hands over your mouth to stop from screaming again as the door to the office swung open ever-so-slowly, and a massive figure crept inside.

“Y aquí estamos.” The figure spoke in a thickly Hispanic, feminine accent. Approaching the middle of the room, you noted the figure was wearing a stylish black hoodie over their head. However, only a second later, the figure threw back their hood. “Maldita sea! I didn’t think it was going to be this easy!”

The girl laughed, shaking out her lengthy, black hair. Despite your fear, your horrified brain still took stock of how disarmingly gorgeous the girl was. Her deeply tanned skin was flawless, and her brilliantly black eyes demanded your full gaze. Her luxuriously shapely lips, coated in mesmerizing dark purple lipstick curled into a grin.

“Bethany wasn’t kidding about the loot in here though. Esto es Loco!” The girl laughed again, taking a sleek string bag off her back and zipping it open. “Confidential files too? Sounds like prime blackmail material to me! Time to make a killing!” She joked, rolling her shoulders and flexing her hands. On one hand, you could just faintly make out the intricate tattoo design of a dragon.

You took a few futile deep breaths and peered at the giantess, who was clearly Estella, as she began shoving items of value into her bag. Quite obviously, Estella had eagerly betrayed her friendship with Bethany to rob the place blind, and no doubt result in Bethany’s firing and potential expulsion from the college for failing to keep the office guarded properly.

You knew you couldn’t let this happen, but how could you, a one-inch tall tiny, possibly hope to stop a clearly morally bankrupt giantess from having her way with the spoils of the guard office? You needed a plan.

What happens next?
11332221.title: The Night Watch (Part Two)

choices: You fell down to the floor...and into Chelsea's sneakers!
You're stuck to a part of Chelsea's uniform...but which? (Bra, Thong, Shorts)
You're left behind after Chelsea changes...and the rest of the team shows up!
115.content:
“I guess we could just watch a movie, if you’ve got something good.” You suggested, shrugging your shoulders. “I’m down to just chill out today. I don’t have anything planned.”

“Dude, I’ve got Netflix.” Chelsea rolled her eyes. “There is always something to watch.”

“Fair enough. Are you okay with just laying around?”

Chelsea nodded. “Yeah, that’s fine.” She responded, reaching for the TV remote on her bedside table and turning on the television. Booting up Netflix, she threw on the first action movie to appear on the screen, and reclined against the back of her bed, head sinking into her soft pillow. You wiggled a bit against your own pillow, the sole of Chelsea’s foot, and began watching the movie.

As was want to happen during Netflix binging session, the hours flew by in the blink of an eye, and soon it was nearly three in the afternoon. A few movies had come and gone, and you and Chelsea had enjoyed some light snacking throughout the afternoon. Of course, Chelsea had accidentally squished you under her foot when she stood up to grab snacks (having forgotten her sole was your resting pillow), but she had apologized with a sheepish grin.

It was around this time that Chelsea’s phone buzzed, and she lazily looked it over to see who had texted her. Brow furrowing, the brunette giantess sat up in bed, knees bending and feet dragging up closer to her. You flopped backwards as you lost your back support, and you glanced over at your titanic friend. By her expression, she looked lost in thought, but she soon noticed you looking at her.

She shot you an apologetic look. “Sorry Tom, we’re gonna have to cut this lazy day short. Vanessa just texted me that her and the other girls want to have a mock volleyball in thirty minutes.”

You were confused. “You already had practice this morning, right?”

“Yeah, but we’ve got a huge game coming up against this rich preppy school with an elite volleyball team. It’s in a few days, and Vanessa and the other girls are pretty worried about it. They said that more practice would help them feel better prepared.”

“I suppose that makes sense.”

Chelsea hopped up out of bed and began walking around her room, grabbing up her purse and a big gym bag, no doubt stuffed with her volleyball gear. For you part, you tried valiantly (and failed horribly) not to stare at Chelsea’s gargantuan, shapely rear end sway side-to-side as she walked around.

“So…” Chelsea began. “…I’ll leave Netflix on if you just want to stay here and chill until I get back. Or, of course, you can always crawl under the door and go back to your room whenever. I’ll leave the chips and soda out too. Sorry to leave on such short notice. I wasn’t expecting this change in plans, but I’m always down to practice volleyball, and help the other girls out.”

“I’m not offended. I know how much this means to you.” You conceded. Chelsea paused, and you swore you saw the slightest hint of a blush in her cheeks.

“How chivalrous of you, Tom.” Chelsea joked, zipping open her gym bag. She began rummaging through her belongings, tossing out various items and throwing in others. Her attention on you was lost, and she was solely focused on the task at hand, and the occasional text on her phone from another teammate.

Chelsea frowned. “Don’t need this, don’t need this, need this…but not this.” Chelsea carelessly threw a black shirt over her head behind her. Shamefully staring intently at your best friend’s gorgeous derriere, you didn’t even notice the shirt’s trajectory until it had fallen right onto you, burying you beneath the folds of the fabric.

No less than a moment later, Chelsea slapped her forehead. “Whoops, that was my uniform. I DO need that.” The brunette blindly reached behind her, feeling for her shirt without turning around. Her hand clenched around the uniform, not feeling the tiny, one-inch tall man pinched between her shirt and her thumb, and then tossed the uniform back into her bag.

Your cry was muffled by the slightly rank fabric pressed firmly into your face as Chelsea roughly threw you into her gym bag. Thrashing about wildly, you crawled blindly in the dark in an attempt to slip out from the shirt and alert your giantess dormmate to her mistake. Seeing a crack of light, you slid down the smooth fabric of the uniform and popped out from within the shirt.

Turning to face Chelsea, you opened your mouth to yell up to her, when the words died in your throat. The last thing you saw was Chelsea’s face looking down at her phone, and a skimpy black thong falling down into the bag, slapping against your body and pressing you flat. Oblivious to what she had done, Chelsea then zipped up her bag, and hoisted it over her shoulder.

Still engrossed in texting her teammates, Chelsea didn’t even spare a glance backwards towards her bed as she opened the door. “See ya later, Tom!” The giantess called, stepping out of her room and closing the door. Blissfully unaware, and thinking her tiny little friend still safe in her room, Chelsea jogged out to her car, hopped in, and drove off towards the campus gymnasium.

Inside of her bag, there was nothing you could do but wait. You were trapped in her bag along with her black sports bra, undershirt, uniform shirt, skintight short shorts, and micro thong. You remembered Chelsea mentioning once how she wore thongs during volleyball because they didn’t restrict her movement, but it still made you immensely uncomfortable to be so close to one. Chelsea’s sporty (and frankly rancid) sneakers were also in the bag.

Upon reaching the gymnasium, Chelsea entered the female locker room and noted that she was the first member of their team to arrive. Not wasting a second, the brunette tossed her bag onto the bench and stripped out of her day clothes, tossing the V-neck, leggings, and undergarments into a separate bag. Stark naked, Chelsea zipped open her bag with a smile, always eager to play some volleyball (as it was her passion).

You had planned to get Chelsea’s attention as soon as she unzipped the bag, but by tossing it so casually onto the bench, your precarious stance on top of the pile of clothes had been disrupted, and you fell backwards with a scream, slipping underneath the titaness’ uniform shirt. Thusly, you were no where in sight when Chelsea unzipped her bag.

Going through the motions like any other day, Chelsea took out her sneakers and dropped them to the floor, and then dumped the rest of her clothes into a fairly disorganized pile on the bench. Shoving the now-empty gym bag and the bag holding her day clothes into a locker, Chelsea turned back to her volleyball outfit and began getting dressed.

Where are you?
115.title: Sudden Change of Plans

choices: Amazingly, Chelsea plays better than she ever has
Poorly, she can't take her mind off of you and doesn't practice well
writer's choice
1151.content:
Your world was in complete chaos as it was flipped around by Chelsea's unconscious motions. Without even noticing she had done it your friend and dorm-mate had completely changed the course of your day. And after spending the past twenty minutes or so sitting in a zipped up prison with some of the world's smelliest prison mates you were praying for the moment you would be released. However, it seemed you should have made your prayers more specific as the first glimpse of daylight you had gotten that day came as you were tumbling through the air. Smacking first into the wooden bench beneath you, you briefly were grateful that you were not stuck to it. However as you fell further and further downwards you somehow managed to orient yourself correctly to scan your surroundings. Part of you wished that you didn't, however, as you saw that instead of the ground beneath you was the empty, well worn-in athletic sneakers of your good friend. You didn't even have a chance to scream before you plummeted down and smacked into the nearly flattened insole back-first. You felt your body flatten immediately from the force of the fall, adhering itself to the evidently well-worn insole. Panicking you struggled to move and free yourself but found it impossible. You would need a few minutes to get yourself unstuck from this jam. Steeling your resolve and focusing all your efforts on reforming, you took a deep breath to prepare yourself and immediately regretted it. The horrid smell that you had been suffering through in the bag now permeated your entire surroundings, surely seeping into your body as well. You whimpered and looked upwards, praying that Chelsea would notice you.

Far above you, Chelsea was smiling and humming to herself slightly as she grabbed each piece of her uniform and put it on. You couldn't help but ogle the ludicrously beautiful girl changing right above you, completely unaware of your presence. You watched as she slid her tiny black thong up her tanned thighs before yanking it up and in between her perfectly toned ass cheeks. Grimacing slightly at the sight, you recalled the number of times in your life that you've either gotten tangled in a thong, or worse, had to BECOME a thong like that. But still it didn't do much to ruin the breathtaking sight above you. Chelsea then proceeded to slide each piece of gear on, ending with her socks last. Turning around she dropped her meaty ass onto the bench above you before reaching into her bag.

"Oh man, I forgot to pack a fresh pair of socks? Damn it, well I guess these ones from this morning can't be too bad and I don't really have another choice." Chelsea said out loud above you. Your heart went cold as you remembered the terrible smell of Chelsea's feet just this morning, that combined with the already caked in scent of her sneakers might truly kill you. You watched her slide the still slightly damp socks over her feet and lower calves before then reaching down to pick up the sneaker that was currently housing you. You cursed your inability to reform quicker, but by some miracle of luck Chelsea looked into the opening of her shoe right at you! Her eyes went wide as she recognized clearly the face and body of her tiny friend standing out against the gray and grimy surface of her insole.

"Wha... what the heck! How did you get here Tom? I thought you were back in the room!" Chelsea said, raising you up further towards her face to inspect you. Immediately she grimaced as she was hit with a wave of her own stale foot sweat, courtesy of her sneaker, and she lowered the shoe back down to her waist.

Thanks to you being flattened onto your back you had just managed to reform your ability to talk even though you were not quite free, so you could respond, "You scooped me up and threw me in your bag! Then when you dumped me out I landed right in here! Get me the heck out of here your shoes really stink you know!" You said all of this in a rather lighthearted tone as you knew all of this was an honest mistake, and Chelsea was a nice enough person to actually help you out.

"Yeah I can't argue with you there, dude, I don't even know how you handle being my friend sometimes being forced to be at the same height as these piggies after some exercise." Chelsea lifted her foot and wiggled her toes jokingly before placing it back on the ground. "Now let's get you out of there." Chelsea reached into her shoe with her thumb and forefinger, trying her best to grasp you. She felt the damp surface of her insole and recoiled slightly before pressing down. Expecting to pick you up immediately she pressed her fingers down extra hard and pinched them together. However, tragically her aim was just a bit off as she managed to undo all reforming progress you had made and slammed you back down into the insole. Pulling her hand out she assumed she had grabbed you and lifted her hand up.

"Alright Tom there we go..." she said as she opened her fingers to find nothing. "Huh?" She said aloud before looking back down and seeing you mashed even further than before. "Oh god I'm sorry Tom I'm usually way better at rescuing you! I guess I underestimated how sweaty my shoes were and missed you!" She said down to you. Unfortunately Chelsea had once again eliminated your ability to talk with her oversight and now you were fully stuck once more. At that moment a bang on the locker room door rung out and it swung open violently. Chelsea turned her head away from you for a moment and saw her coach standing in the doorway.

"Ah Chelsea I was hoping you would be early as usual. Put on your shoes and come out here I want to talk strategy with you." She said in a stern yet still somewhat nice voice. Chelsea gulped, now sweating nervously. She hated knowing that she was causing you harm, but at the same time she really hated disappointing people. This quality always made her excel in school and beyond, but sometimes it ended up with her going above and beyond what a normal person should be expected to do for another. Sadly for you, it seemed like this quality of hers had sealed your fate as she looked down at you with a resigned look.

"Oh no, Tom, I... don't know how to tell you this but I kind of have to head out there right now. I can't let the coach down! I know this is gonna be terrible for you but I really don't have any other option. I'll get you out right after practice, I owe you big time for this!" You didn't even have the ability to argue against this ridiculous conclusion as Chelsea then dropped you onto the ground, mouthing "sorry" one more before sliding her foot in.

Immediately you felt the crushing weight of Chelsea's huge foot press down onto you, her heel coming to rest right on top of you. Every time you found yourself in a situation like this you prayed that just once you wouldn't retain your sense of smell, but whatever sick god that created the shrinking virus must have loved watching you suffer as you kept this sense every single time. Her massive, socked foot squished you down further, amplifying the heat and smell of sweat around you. You couldn't believe Chelsea was really putting you through this, but at the same time you knew what an overachiever she was so in all honesty it didn't really surprise you. She laced up her shoes tightly, grimacing at how much pressure she knew she was putting onto you. But in her mind there wasn't any other option at the moment!

Slipping the other shoe on and lacing it up as well, Chelsea threw all of her belongings in a nearby locker before walking out towards the gymnasium. She took her first few steps gingerly before realizing that if she was going to practice hard she wouldn't be able to take it easy on herself or you, sadly. Thinking the word sorry to herself one more time she began to jog, slamming her foot into the hardwood floor over and over. After a few steps she realized something she would never tell you in a million years because she actually respected you as a person, but nevertheless she believed it: you were actually one hell of a comfy insole under her heel. She shook off the thought of the surprising amount of support you gave her and focused all of her attention on the upcoming practice.

How do things go?
1151.title: The Volleyball Team's Number One Supporter

choices: Coach thinks you should be worn during the next game to 'learn your lesson'
Chelsea got lectured but soon frees you
Chelsea got lectured but can't pull you off her insole
11511.content:
You couldn't tell from under her heel but Chelsea was doing even better than normal having resolved to ignore you for the practice. The sweat that was already in the sock combined with new sweat and drenched you and the insole of the worn shoes you were in, you could feel the rapid movements she was making and even a few jumps that slammed you into the squishy surface even farther.You could tell you were being smeared out by her foot grinding you every so often, and she wasn't holding back in her practice either,

Chelsea however was killing it in the practice matches, she could have probably been playing by herself and still executed the strategies with how she was moving. The fact that she was smashing you barely registered while she was in the zone, and your support was helping her reach even farther than normal. The coach wasn't the only one that noticed either and basically all of the girls were wondering what was different today, Chelsea of course didn't have an answer for them as she wasn't about to admit to them that you were in her shoe. Still she was sweating up a storm and at least her left shoe wasn't having near as much of a problem with it since you were down there unintentionally licking all of it up. The two hour practice was ending and she was eager to remove her shoes so that you could be set free but before she could enter the locker room with the other girls the coach pulled her aside and into her office.

"Chelsea, I noticed you moving real good out there today but..." She hesitated "You aren't taking anything are you?" Chelsea was shocked, so shocked in fact that she needed to prove herself.

"no no no coach, nothing is like that I just had a little uhh, my roommate you see he... I'm not going to be able to explain this just look" She slipped her shoe off to find you spread out around her heel area and she winced but here eyes pleaded with you to help her with the situation. She flipped you around to see the coach, an athletic woman in her mid thirties with short brown hair she blinked at you a little confused. "You see he uh, he agreed to be in my shoe during practice as uh um, an apology for seeing me naked?" The coach looked back at you completely decimated by Chelsea's foot.

"Is that true at all?" She was addressing you, you knew if you didn't answer Chelsea could be kicked off of the team for intentional harm. You mustered all of your strength to speak, even after all you had gone through today you couldn't just let your friend loose her passion.

"Yes, She didn't want too but I had to learn my lesson. After today I'll be much more careful." The coach clearly didn't beleave either of you but something else was going on in her head.

"Chelsea dear could you put your shoe back on, the smell is starting to get to me." You wanted to protest but Chelsea didn't even think about the order from her coach and slipped her foot right back over you. There was more conversation being had and then Chelsea was stomping out of the office soon after. Alone in the locker room Chelsea finally had the chance to talk to you.
11511.title: Amazing Support

choices: Chelsea, quick shower
Members from the volleyball team who want to test you out
115111.content:
"WHAT!?!" You screamed up at her. "Nope no way, not doing it." You said wanting to get out of her shoe.

"Oh come on please, my coach will think something is up if you're not in my shoe." Chelsea pleaded. She didn't want to dissapoint her coach.

"Chelsea, you are my best friend but god your feet reek." She then started to give you puppy dog eyes. "No, nope not this time..." You tried to keep a stern face but you couldn't keep it going forever. "Alright, let's say I maybe consider doing this as a favor to you. What do I get??"

She tried a weak smile, she already owed you for today. "The knowledge that you helped your best friend?" You shook your head no. With a huff she replied, "Alright, any and all home work for 2 weeks."

You smiled, "Much better. But you don't get to be upset about it, I'm the one who has to be under your feet, again." You both laughed a bit about that part. She took you out of her shoe and placed you in a side pocket on her bag, that way you didn't have to smell ALL her sweat.


The next few days weren't that eventful. You just had to be in her shoe come game time so practice was a one time thing. The most that happened was occasional teasing on both of your parts. You'd joke about bringing her extra work just to mess with her and she'd talk about not showering and or wearing dirty socks. Of course y'all were both just joking. You didn't want to stress her or overwork her, and she was planning to make the experience as...pleasant as possible.

Game day officially came and it was your turn to hold up your end of the bargain. "Should've made it 3 weeks." You said walking out the door. In reality, nothing is on par with being just a human insole.

Once y'all got to the court, she slipped her shoe off and dropped you in. "Sorry again but the As in your grade book should make up for it." She then put in her socked foot and got a feel for your tiny body before starting her warmups.

The clean sock and foot did make it so the shoe wasn't as bad as the first time and the stomping pressure while not exactly a massage, was bearable, but the issue cane from the shoe itself. She never washed it. It stung your nose with dried sweat and things of the sort.

As the game went on, more and more sweat poured from her feet. It didn't just disappear as it absorbed into you and some even got in your mouth. You just wanted this to end.

You couldn't even tell the score of the game or who was winning as her foot muffled the sound, but if you could, you would've know that they were crushing their opponent. Thanks in large part to Chelsea's amazing performance. She knew this might be the last time she gets you like this so she went all out, taking advantage of your support.

By the time the game ended, any preparations done to her feet and socks had warn off. It was now back to square one and you were trapped in this smelly, sweaty prison.

Once the game was over, she got named MVP. She celebrated all the way back to her dorm where she removed you and placed you on the counter. "OH THAT WAS GREAT!!!! I TOTALLY KICKED ASS OUT THERE!!" You chuckled at her enthusiasm. It was adorable, even if you were covered in foot sweat.

"I'm glad I could help, but if that's all-" She cut you off.

"Dude! Let's celebrate! Come on, just me and you!" You couldn't turn this down. Not because you liked the idea no, but it wasn't really a question. So you went along with it.

"Alright but take a shower first, I'm gonna wash off at my place then I'll be back." You shook your head at her in a playful way and walked off.

After taking your shower, you walked outside and saw a tall looming figure over you. Who was it?
115111.title: Being a human insole

choices: She takes a shower, now's your chance
She's feeling gassy
You try and get out doing anything possible
1152.content:
You were dazed and confused as you tried to figure out where you exactly were. Just then, you're yanked upwards and look up to see where you're headed. "OH GOD CHELSEA!!! STOP!!!" Your crys fell on deaf ears as you got sucked into her massive ass, trapped by her thong.

Her ass held firm around you. You had been in similar situations, being sat on of course, but you could not recall ever being so close to Chelsea's butt hole. The worst was when you sunk over and she wasn't wearing pants and sat on you. Luckily, you fell off and she was none the wiser. "God it smells so bad. Oh crap she's got practice, this is gonna suck!" You had no real way of moving around as you were smothered by her globes of flesh.

Chelsea finished getting dressed and started her warm up, she knew she had to go all out this week. And she was feeling good today so no holding back. Not great news for you.

As she started running, her massive butt cheeks began grinding against you. Each step worse than the last. Once warm ups were over, practice really started.

Unfortunately, tinies are super absorbent so you had to soak up all her butt sweat which was disgusting. And just to breathe at times you had to swallow some, and butt sweat isn't tasty per say.

The worst cane when she went to get in her stance. You were pressed hard and deep into her ass, having to do all you could to stay away from her ass hole or risk being caught in it, and since she was so tall, the put her at the hitter position. This meant I'd go from being presses deep within her ass to getting crushed instantly. I made fun of the position names on more than one occasion, so this was fitting.

Finally practice was over after all the torture you endured. "Chelsea will never let me live this down," you thought to yourself but at least it was over. "I'm beat, I think I'm gonna leave all this on. Dorm isn't too far anyhow." She said from above.

This was the worst possible news, you were gonna have to spend however longer in her thong till she gets back to the dorm. To her it felt like her sweat was drying up, but you were absorbing it and any left behind smelled like stale sweat, which it was. Eventually she gets back to her dorm but then what?
1152.title: Being a Thong

choices: Vanessa shakes her head, disregards her suspicion, and goes back to changing.
Vanessa realizes what you are, and she's amused.
Vanessa realizes what you are, and she's pissed.
1153.content:
As your luck would have it, you had landed first on the bench after Chelsea had dumped her belongings out of her gym bag. Smacking face first into the wooden bench, you barely had a second to groan before her shirt, shorts, bra, and thong fell down on top of you, squishing you flat and completely hiding you from view. Your paper thin body groaned under the weight, and your slim chance at being noticed by your titanic dormmate was once again back to zero.

With no idea that anything was out of the ordinary, Chelsea pulled her thong up her legs and hooked her sports bra over her chest. With a slight bit of effort, the brunette beauty managed to wiggle her exceptionally tight short shorts into place and slipped her arms and head through her uniform. She then took a second to tie her hair back into a ponytail for good measure.

Unfortunately, though you were now a visible, flat sticker on the bench, your own tan complexion blended in with the brown wooden bench just enough to pass Chelsea’s cursory gaze, and you went unnoticed. As you slowly reinflated back to normal, you could only watch sadly as your massive friend turned on her heel and strolled out of the locker room, leaving you all alone.

Dusting yourself off, you surveyed your surroundings and realized that you didn’t exactly have any sort of plan in place as to what you wanted to do next. Obviously, heading out into the gym to meet up with Chelsea would be a recipe for disaster, and staying out in the open here on the bench seemed dangerous as well. Your best bet was most likely trying to crawl into Chelsea’s locker (which was thankfully on floor level), and wait for practice to end.

At least, that was your plan before the door to the locker room swung open without warning, and a cacophony of giggly female voices flooded into the room. Your blood ran cold and your body froze up in paralyzed fear, dreadfully knowing what would come next. Slowly tearing your gaze away from the sanctity of Chelsea’s locker, you looked behind you as nearly fifteen girls casually entered the locker room.

The first girl, a busty twenty-something with an award winning smile and enrapturing, shoulder length hair dyed bright purple caught your immediate attention. This was due to both her incredible appearance, and her left hand, which was holding a bundle of clothes and was curling back with each passing step the titaness took. Like an idiot, you didn’t see the warning signs until a moment too late.

The purple haired girl’s hand finished arcing back, and then swung forward at rocket speed, the clothes in her hand propelling in your direction. Your scream, far too quiet and insignificant to reach the ears of the giantess volleyball team, died as soon as the hurling ball of clothes impacted against you. A bra cup the size of a mountain decked you right in the gut, sending you flying onto the floor.

And of course, your horrible luck didn’t end there. The purple haired girl’s thong, shorts, and shirt remained on the bench where she had aimed her throw, but her bra tipped over the edge and toppled right down to the tiled floor alongside you. You could only cry out in a confused panic as the left bra cup crashed down, entrapping you beneath it and casting you in darkness.

From outside your makeshift cave, you could make out a muffled laugh, presumably from the purple haired girl, and the resounding quakes of her approaching footsteps. You raced blindly towards the edge of the bra cup, frantically trying to grip the edge and heft it into the air, just enough to escape. The sickeningly sweat smell of the giantess’s intimate aroma flooded your nostrils and threatened to knock you right into blissful unconsciousness.

Unexpectedly, the wall of the cup actually began to lift up, and in your moment of confused happiness, you hesitated your escape. Sealing your own doom, you realized that the girl herself was picking up her bra, and not you. Before you could react, the cup tilted backwards, and you fell onto your butt, rolling down the steep incline before coming to a stop at the deepest part of the sports bra cup.

You looked up in terror at the purple haired giantess, her gorgeous face locked straight ahead (presumably towards another girl she was conversing with), and not down at the poor tiny trapped in the mammoth sized cup of the bra she was about to put on. You cupped your hands to your mouth and cried up to her, but unfortunately at the exact moment the girl laughed melodiously, her own joy drowning out your sorrow.

“What, really?” The purple haired girl exclaimed. “That’s fantastic!” She set her bra down on the bench, cups pointed down, and began undressing.

“Well, I’m sure that she was embarrassed.” The unseen girl conversing with her giggled. “But, how can you not laugh at someone actually slipping on a banana peel and crashing into a trash can? That stuff, like, only happens in movies!” Both her and the purple haired girl laughed again, and then a moment passed. “Do you really think we can win this weekend, Vanessa?”

The purple haired girl shrugged, unhooking her casual, frilly bra and letting it fall to the floor. Apparently, she was Vanessa, the girl who had scheduled this impromptu practice with Chelsea. “Who knows? I sure hope so, but we need more practice. I wish we had something to motivate us to win.”

Now topless, Vanessa leaned over for her sports bra, still locking her eyes at her friend. You had given up screaming, and were fruitlessly trying to scale the slippery sides of the sports bra, to no avail. As the ground around you shook, you felt yourself rise into the air, and tilt forward. Sensing your chance, you ran at full sprint for the edge of the cup, your avenue of escape slowly filling up with Vanessa’s gargantuan, tanned breast.

At the last possible second, you tumbled out from over the edge of the bra cup right as Vanessa squeezed her tit inside, and you fell back to the bench, landing on the hard wood with a soft squelch. Reforming after a few seconds, you took full stock of exactly where you were, and the mass of curvy giantesses in various states of undress all around you.

That moment was all it took for Vanessa’s friend, having finished changing, to plop down onto the bench in order to better slip on her sneakers. Her sizable but firm butt pulverized you beneath her, tight short shorts offering no respite. Your squishy body was flattened in a comical, spread-eagle position, facing outwards. You struggled to move or even twitch, but it was no use.

Coming to today’s date on your planner you groaned upon seeing “Participate in Amy’s protest” written down. You had forgotten entirely that a week before she approached you in the dining hall and asked for you to join in and support her fight for the rights of tiny men. No matter how many times you had told her that your treatment wasn’t all that bad, it seemed like the message never got through to her. Even the school administration had gotten used to the ruckus she would stir up every once in a while, usually allowing these protests to take place as long as they didn’t get out of hand. Normally you would have been happy to meet someone who cared so deeply for you, but Amy, well, had some interesting quirks that you discovered the first time you encountered her. Your mind couldn’t help but drift back to that fateful day…

*Flashback commence*

You met Amy on the first day of school at orientation, and from that moment on her entire identity perplexed you. It was during the welcome speech that the Dean gave every year to incoming freshman, and you as well as a large group of other tiny men were sitting on one sectioned off part of the stadium benches. As the Dean continued on with her somewhat boring speech, all of the sudden a loud voice boomed out from a megaphone to the side of the stage.

“Less height shouldn’t mean less rights! Equality for all no matter the size!” The voice repeated this somewhat clunky phrase over and over again as it got closer to the crowd. Finally, the source of the noise appeared and it was a girl you could only describe as nearly cartoonishly proportioned. The entire audience was staring at the spectacle, as she walked towards the crowd wearing a pair of shorts that must have been two sizes too small for her, as well as a revealing crop top. Her somewhat pale, jiggly flesh spilled out of every visible opening in her clothes, and her blonde hair framed her cute face perfectly. She wore a pair of large, frameless glasses that for some reason it felt like she didn’t even need. In short, she looked more like a porn star pretending to be a nerd than an actual political activist.

Now you and all of the other students expected the response to this intrusion to be more or less total rejection, however to everyone’s surprise the Dean actually responded to her in a respectful manner. “Now it seems like we have a future politician among us! This is the kind of enthusiasm we like to see at Middletown University! Take a seat for now and we can talk face to face after the orientation, does that sound good, Miss…”

“Baker, uhh, Amy Baker.” It seemed like the girl didn’t expect this response as well she seemed slightly flustered before the Dean continued,

“It’s a pleasure to meet you, Miss Baker, I applaud your commitment to a cause! Now please take a seat if you would be so kind.” Amy was utterly flabbergasted, expecting a much more aggressive response than she had received, and for that reason she couldn’t come up with anything else to say. With the conversation concluded, the Dean returned to her speech. Walking back towards the stands Amy scanned the benches but couldn’t find a single open seat among the girls. Until she came to one that was finally empty, or at least it seemed to be…

You and the crowd of tiny guys around you watched with fear as this curvaceous activist walked directly towards you. Not entirely sure what was happening, you looked to the girls sitting to your left and right only to see both of them on their phones, not paying a lick of attention to what was happening. Now can you please let me go outside I have a lot of work to catch up on."

Amy's face showed her beautiful smile once more, happy to hear that he had forgiven her. Quickly she nodded and began walking towards her dorm room floor. In an instant her massive foot loomed over you briefly before luckily slamming down inches away from you, leaving you unharmed for once. Turning around you saw Amy walking away and noticed that she had never even put on pants since waking up from her nap and by god, if you thought you had seen some great asses in your day you now realized that none could even hold a candle to the sheer enormity of Amy's. “Oh Tom!” Amy beamed, her beautiful face radiating innocent joy. “Yeah! Kinda like a…ya know…a protest stand! Like, to spread awareness about tinies on our campus! I want everyone to know how dangerous life at this university can be, and the new rules need to be put in place!” Amy rambled, her genuine enthusiasm for the college tinies was infectious. Despite her ditzy nature, she truly cared about all tinies, and she could be quite the persuasive public speaker.

“What was your idea for the stand? I’d love to help.” You inquired, lowering your guard. Amy’s eyes sparkled, and she leapt back to her feet. Turning to rummage in a drawer behind her, you balked at her juicy bubble butt jiggle to-and-fro as she pulled out what appeared to be a bikini top, a matching pair of socks, and a pack of gum.

Setting the objects she had retrieved down in front of you, Amy patiently looked at you, and expectant expression on her face. Inside the left cup of the bikini top was the squashed face of a tiny, and inside the right cup was the tiny’s crotch. “Amy…what the hell! These are all tinies!” You cried up to her, flabbergasted. Amy nodded, with a concerned look on her face.

“Yep, exactly.” The gigantic blonde pointed to each object in turn. “Frank from down the hall volunteered to be squished and molded into the bikini top. The twins, Ricardo and Marco, are smeared into the sole of the left and right sock, respectively. And, the entire chess club agreed to be shaped into these sticks of gum in this pack.”

“Wh…what? Volunteered? Agreed? What is going on?” You could barely speak, and Amy’s neutral expression honestly terrified you.

“It’s for the protest stand. My display is going to be about how easy it can be to identify a tiny in crisis if a giantess simply pays attention.” Amy explained. “Too many guys can spend days, or even weeks crushed or smushed in some terrible spot, because a girl hasn’t been trained to notice him. So, I asked my good, tiny friends for volunteers for this display. They’re doing their part, serving as visual aids for any student who comes by.”

“B-but…what happens if…”

“Speaking of which, Tom, you volunteered to!” Amy giggled, raising her fist above your body. “Thanks again for pitching in to make a difference!” She exclaimed, her voice drowning out your own petrified scream as Amy brought her fist down onto your body, demolishing your tiny frame and pancaking you flat in an instant. In one brief moment, Amy had sealed your fate. You were a part of this now, and you couldn’t do a thing about it.

Beginning to hum a little tune to herself, Amy carefully peeled your clothes off of you, leaving you stark naked. You mentally blushed bright red, though Amy seemed oblivious to this as she pinned your head beneath her slightly sweaty toes and yanked hard on your legs, stretching your body long and thin.

Once you were a desirable length, Amy pinched your arms and legs and stretched them even further away from your body. This sadly wasn’t your first time being turned into a thong, which is how you recognized the shape Amy had formed you into. When you were younger, one of your sister’s friends (who had always picked on you) had thought it would be funny to turn you into a thong and slip you into your sister’s underwear drawer. Not only did you find it unfunny, but also painfully humiliating and embarrassing. This time, however, Amy had clearly stretched you out to a fairly large size, clearly intended to be able to support sizable derrieres. Rubbing her finger back and forth as you mentally screamed, Amy succeeded in scrubbing your lips into a blurry smudge, rendering you incapable of speech.

“Whew! That was harder than I thought!” Amy wiped sweat from her brow. “You make a convincing bikini thong, Tom. Even more so now that I wiped away your mouth and took off your clothes. I did keep your eyes though, because I want the other students to be able to spot you and the rest of the guys. This is a learning exercise after all.”

Her flawed and quite problematic reasoning finished, Amy scooped you and all of the other tinies-turned-objects into one big plastic bag, wiggled some exceptionally tight leggings up her thick thighs, slipped on some flip-flops, and headed back outside. You could do nothing but be jostled back and forth in her bag as she walked, completely at her mercy, and wishing you had simply booked it from her room when you had had the chance earlier.

Dumping the contents of her plastic bag onto the table, you and every other volunteer tiny spilled out onto the table. Amy set up a huge sign that read “FREE! ANYONE WELCOME TO COME!”. She then spent a good ten minutes arranging every tiny on the table in terms of category. Several, like you, had been molded into articles of clothing. Still other tinies were stuck flat inside a textbook, wrapped around the eraser of a pencil, flattened to the back of leggings, stretched out into a hair band, and countless other surprising iterations of the same idea.

Though you couldn’t fault Amy for the decent idea, her execution was horrible, and you felt an incredible sense of impending dread reading her sign again. Out of the corner of your eye, you could see Amy sitting on a stool behind the table, anxiously waiting for her first visitor. Her trademark nerd glasses were perfectly in place, and she had even remembered to not bring her phone, to stop herself from getting distracted.

Unfortunately, disaster still struck, as Amy suddenly jumped to her feet and ran off back towards the dorm building. She had been hit by the unexpected urge to relieve herself in the bathroom, and couldn’t control it. Still, she reasoned it would only take her a minute or two to use the toilet, and then she’d be back at her protest stand to educate her fellow peers on how to spot tinies in need.

Regardless, it wasn’t long before a sizable crowd of giantesses had noticed the wide table crammed with random objects, and the giant sign hanging above it. Approaching the table with curiosity, the girls gathered around on all sides, their towering frames casting shadows over the poor, terrified tinies trapped or otherwise molded and squished by Amy. Each one of them prayed desperately for Amy to return, but to no avail. Amy was in the middle a pretty debilitating stomach cramp while relieving herself.

All around you, girls began snatching up various objects that caught their attention. You began to scream mentally over and over, willing your body to reform, but to no success. To your left, a busty redhead grabbed tiny molded into a bra and the tiny shaped like a hairband. To your right, a toned athlete began trying on the socks with the tiny twins smeared into the soles. Behind you, a cheery sorority girl held out the pack of gum made up of the squished chess club members, and each sorority sister around her unknowingly crammed one of the tinies into their mouths and began chewing.

Just then, a smooth hand pressed down on your thong-shaped body, and you mentally tensed up in a panic. Straining your squished eyes to see through the shadowy figure, your attempts at identifying the girl grabbing you ended as she spoke.
