124.content:
“We’ll protest in the form of an occupation!” Amy declared, confidence exuding from her usually airheaded voice. “We’ll go sit at their desks, so they can’t work!” She explained, proudly thrusting out her abundant chest. “They have to listen to us then. Tiny rights matter, and I’ll help make the voice of all our campus tinies loud and clear!”

Everyone gathered at Amy’s feet cried out and cheered in excitement, pumping their fists in the air shouting “Tiny rights matter” over and over. You smiled, admitting to yourself that the atmosphere was certainly intoxicating, and Amy could be quite persuasive and driven when she wasn’t unknowingly harming every tiny within a fifteen-foot radius. Still, you couldn’t help but feel a smidgen of fear looking up at her towering form.

Leading the way, Amy strode down the sidewalk, surprisingly keeping her pace slow to allow her gathered protesters to keep up with her. You noted a few tinies that you recognized from back at the dorm where you lived, including Nathan and his brother Henry. The ran right alongside Amy’s gigantic sneakers, yelling the protestation mantra until their throats were sore.

After a short walk, Amy held the door open for one of the technology campus buildings, and you and the other tinies entered. Most classes were still in session, but were going to dismiss soon, so Amy wanted everyone in position in one of the currently vacant classes before the next wave of students arrived. As such, Amy propped open the first door on her right, flicked on the lights, and motioned everyone to enter.

Once inside the room, Amy took a seat near one of the windows, plopping her butt down into the chair. Smiling at her gathered activists, she cleared her throat. “Alright guys! This is our moment to take a stand. I’m so incredibly honored that you’ve let me join you guys in organizing the fight for your rights.

“As this is an occupation…” Amy continued. “…you just need to climb up into one of the empty seats in this room, and hold your ground, no matter what. When the students arrive in ten minutes, they won’t be able to sit down until we move, which means they can’t hold their class! Someone will HAVE to recognize us then.”

Amy’s explanation was followed by another round of cheers, and all of the gathered tinies split off to ascend their nearest chairs. Thankfully, the chairs in this room were made of leather, so it was easy to scale the leg and make it up onto the plush cushion seat, as opposed to the metal or slick plastic chairs in other lecture rooms. Each comfortable chair was positioned in front of a small desk with a laptop computer (as this was a computer applications class).

After making it up onto your chair, you sat patiently, waiting for Amy’s plan to come to fruition. To your left sat Nathan, and to your right was Henry, who both looked ecstatic to be a part of this movement. Honestly, you couldn’t believe that Amy had managed to wrangle this crowd of tinies, or that she had actually crafted a decent plan and hadn’t ruined it yet by squishing any tinies herself.

After about five minutes, the door to the classroom swung open, and a woman who appeared to be in her thirties casually walked in. She smiled politely upon noticing Amy. “Oh, hello there Amy. You’re early today. Mind if I turn these lights off for the presentation today?”

It was at this moment that everything came crashing down. You realized, with surprised dread, that Amy had chosen to protest in her own class, thus ensuring her presence wasn’t odd or out of place. To make matters worse, the ditzy giantess already had her head buried in her phone, giggling at some social media post, and only gave a vague head nod to her teacher’s question. Almost instantaneously, Amy’s planned protest had slipped from her mind.

Taking her nod as approval, the teacher flicked the lights back off and strolled to the front of her class, unable to see the thirty or so gathered tinies sitting in the chairs belonging to her students. Only the low glow of each laptop screen illuminated the room. A rising sense of fear welled up within you, and you glanced nervously to Nathan and Henry, who still seemed fully confident their occupation was going to be a success.

After another five minute or so, the door swung open again, and the students began piling into class. This was also, of course, the exact moment that hell truly broke loose. As the first girl walked over to her seat and flung her backpack over the back of the chair, her eyes were firmly on the laptop screen. Blissfully unaware, the girl settled into her seat, absolutely decimating some poor tiny beneath her shapely derriere.

Before any of the tiny protesters could properly react, the teacher flicked a switch on her desk, and loud rock music began to play. The teacher of this class, Miss Erin, had always been a bit of a fun-loving gal, and so she always started class with high energy music as her students walked in (yet another fairly crucial detail that Amy had failed to properly consider due to her absentminded nature).

It was also now that you began to realize how stupid of a plan that this occupation was in the first place. How did Amy actually expect a bunch of one-inch tall squishy tinies to take up the seats in a class room? The giantesses of Middletown University were unfathomably massive in comparison, and would hardly notice the extra presence on their seat (especially with the loud music, plush cushions, and distracting laptop monitors.

Every tiny began screaming and jumping up and down to get noticed, but to no avail. The room was simply too dark, and the music too loud. More girls entered the class, and more and more of Amy’s tiny protestors vanished under the ample rear ends of the naïve, innocent college girls. To your right, Henry gave you a pitiful look before being squashed flat under the ass of a girl wearing a short skirt. Her skirt fell gently around her after sitting, hiding Henry from view.

To your left, Nathan ran and leapt off of his chair right as another girl sat down, crashing onto the floor and squishing his legs flat. Before he could reform, a half-chewed ball of gum slipped from the girl’s lips and splattered onto the floor, slamming down onto Nathan and burying him in saliva-coated gooeyness.

“Shit…” the girl murmured, drawing a tissue from her purse. With the careless attitude of a girl who simply had no way to know better, she ripped the gum and Nathan from the floor, balled the tissue up in her fist, and tossed the tissue into the nearest trash can. You could only watch helplessly from your chair as Nathan’s cruel fate unfolded, and your attention soon whipped back to Amy.

Amy sat about two rows away from you, and she was smiling happily at her phone, rapidly tapping her foot to the beat of the music. She was fully oblivious to what was befalling her gathered followers all around her. Tinies were being sat on, and those that tried to climb down the chairs found themselves stepped on or kicked around. You NEEDED to get to Amy, and fast, as she was the only one who could speak up to the class and save every other tiny by revealing what had transpired. You could try to salvage the situation yourself, but that seemed too risky…

While you were pondering this, another girl walked into the class and honed in on your seat. Jamming out to the music and skipping to the beat, the girl’s humongous ass jiggled up and down with each step, her fleshy rear barely contained in her skintight booty shorts. As oblivious to your presence as the rest of the girls in class, the brown-haired, happy-go-lucky girl dropped her open backpack to the floor by the chair and pulled her chair back to sit down.

You tripped onto your face as the giantess whose seat you were in pulled back the chair. Rolling over and crying out in startled horror, your vision filled up with her colossal butt, creamy white cheeks poking out from the bottom of her booty shorts. Surging to your feet, you pumped your legs and ran for the edge of the chair, desperate to escape the meteoric impact of her jello-like ass. After all, you had a mission.

“I’m sorry little guy, but I’m going have to get rid of the evidence!” Professor Erin whispered, a glimmer of pity in her eyes but a grimace of determination on her lips. Professor Erin paled and looked her student in the eyes, stammering for a response. “N-no one, dear…just reading an email aloud…heh heh.”

“Ah, okay. Yeah, I like to talk to myself when I work.” The girl nodded, and was instantly absorbed back into her phone, tapping her foot along with the music, and totally oblivious to the butchered lump of a tiny being crushed over and over under her sole.

Returning her attention to you, Erin dug through her drawer of personal belongings before retrieving a small red notebook that appeared to be a journal of some sort. Flipping through the pages, she located an empty page marked simply with the day’s date. Wincing in anticipation, Professor Erin slammed your into the page of her book back first, startled face facing outward.

Grinding your body up and down with one hand, Professor Erin spent nearly five minutes ironing your squishy body into the paper, until finally you were quite thoroughly stuck. Afterwards, the attractive yet currently quite frightening teacher scribbled on the borders around you “This is just a cute sticker, nothing more”. Her plan was to force herself to forget about you, and forging a fake description would trick her brain into misremembering what had occurred.

Forced to stare straight upwards, nearly glued to the paper of her journal, you could only mutely watch Professor Erin flash you one final look of remorse before slamming her journal shut. The heavy notebook collapsed onto you, slamming you even flatter than you already felt, and casting you into darkness. The continuous pressure exerted kept you flat and unable to reform or move, and you could only numbly feel the journal being lifted and slipped back into the drawer.

Many hours passed as the rest of the day dragged on, Professor Erin teaching her classes happily and shoving memories of you far from her mind. Once Amy left after the first class, her catastrophic blunder completely forgotten, any chance of you being rescued went fully down the drain. The same held true for the other poor tinies abused by the oblivious class. Some students were found quickly, others left behind on the floor or the seats, but still others stayed crushed and stuck for days.

As the sky darkened for the evening, Erin gathered her belongings, including the notebook you were imprinted into, and left the class. Humming a little song, she crossed the parking lot, slid into her car, and drove back in the direction of her house, a modest one floor home twenty minutes from campus. A block from home, she picked up her six-year-old daughter Ellie from daycare, and the two giantesses walked into their house.

It wasn’t until after dinner that Erin finally retrieve her notebook and flipped it open onto the kitchen table, intending to pencil in the days activities, like a diary. She audible gasped as she thumbed to the page she had thoroughly rubbed you into, and found you staring back at her, the bright lights stinging your eyes after so many hours in darkness. Truthfully, she had nearly forgotten about you already, but seeing your terrified face brought all the memories back.

Scrambling up onto her mommy’s lap, Ellie peered down at the journal, her young, childish smile diminishing into a frown. Even at her young age, the girl dwarfed you completely, towering above you. Tentatively poking and prodding at your body, Ellie looked to her mom.

“That sticker is not very cute mommy.” She pouted. “It should be smiling!”

Professor Erin affectionately rubbed her daughter’s head, and then her eyes twinkled with the slightest hint of an idea dawning. Reaching down to you, she pinched your lips and forcibly curled your squishy face from a shocked open mouth into a wide, seemingly inconspicuous smile. You were powerless to fight against her manipulating you in such a way.

Giggling, Ellie clapped her hands. “Yay! It’s happy now!” Eyes widening, the curious six-year-old pointed to a cabinet by the table. “Can I draw on the sticker? Make it really really pretty? Please mommy?”

Erin returned her daughter’s smile. “Of course, sweetie.” Standing up, Erin helped her daughter onto the table for easier access, and retrieved a box of markers and other craft supplies from the cabinet. Returning to Ellie, she sat down and let her daughter get to work, amused at how creative her precious girl was. In fact, her thoughts were filled only by love for her daughter, and not at the cruel twist of fate befalling you.

For the next thirty minutes, Ellie had free reign to vandalize and abuse your poor body, and you could only take it all with your frozen smile. The terrifying six-year-old ripped your clothes clean off, deciding to draw an outfit of her own onto you. That outfit ended up being a bright pink dress scribbled into your skin and the surrounding page with a pink marker and red highlights.

Getting into it, Ellie stuck her tongue out in what would normally be a cute gesture of childlike concentration as she traced red blushes in your cheeks, black eye shadow, and bright yellow hair all over your head. In just half and hour, Ellie had stripped you naked and defiled your squishy body, clothing you in intangible marker and colored pencil stains that would surely smudge your skin for weeks after this ordeal was through.

Finished with her drawing, Erin kissed her daughter lovingly on the cheek, complimented her art skills, and slammed the notebook shut, placing it back into her bag. Carrying her daughter up to bed, the two of them changed into comfy sleeping clothes and went to bed, their art project all but forgotten immediately. All you could do was lament your fate, and pray for some sort of salvation.

Nothing had changed in the morning, and you realized the depths of your horrible situation as Professor Erin flipped open the journal to a fresh new page before her first class. Glancing at you, the gorgeous teacher merely smiled fondly, picturing her angelic child happily scribbling away, and then flipped the page over, burying you under the weight of her hand as she wrote in the date for the day.

This, sadly, was your standard routine for the next week and a half. Trapped in the notebook, you felt your skin pretty much fuse with the paper from the constant crushing pressure, especially as Erin buried more and more pages atop you as the days passed by. You couldn’t move, speak, reform, or do anything at all but lay there with your damn smile and girlish makeup. Erin’s methodical erasure of her encounter with you had been effective, and she didn’t remember you in the slightest anymore.

About ten days after your horribly misconstrued punishment and imprisonment, Erin left her diary laying out while her students were taking a test. Lo and behold, Amy herself was the first to skip up to the front of the class, proudly clutching her test against her abundant chest, absentmindedly crumpling and folding the paper.

Reaching Professor Erin’s desk, Amy handed her the paper. “Here’s my test! I finished much earlier than I…oh gosh, how’d it get all crumpled?” Amy inquired, genuinely confused. She didn’t notice the ink smudges on her white blouse either, nor was she likely to any time soon.

Professor Erin sighed. “Amy, you know I can’t grade this. That little auto-checking machine only accepts flattened papers. This test is really folded and rumpled.”

Amy’s face fell. “What? But I tried so hard!”

Erin laughed melodically. “You didn’t fail, Amy. Take this test back, grab some scrap paper, and write your answers again, and don't mess up the paper this time.” After her explanation, Professor Erin stood up. “I’ll be in the bathroom, should only take a minute. Just place the test on my desk if you finish copying your answers before I get back.”

Strolling away, Erin passed by Amy, who was left to stand awkwardly by her teacher’s desk. Amy didn’t have any scrap paper on her, so she was still in a bit of a panic. Adjusting her trademark nerd glasses, Amy’s roaming gaze fell on the rather plain looking notebook lying open on Professor Erin’s desk, and grinned enthusiastically.

“Nice! A spare journal! Can’t hurt to borrow a page from this.” Amy reasoned, grabbing up her teacher’s diary, ripping out a page, setting the notebook back down, and returning to her seat. She plopped back down into her seat (and quite mercilessly slammed a poor tiny ingrained into the seat cushion for the past ten days with her amply sized ass) clicked her pen, and gazed down at her paper.

What does she see?
1242123.title: Bookkeeping

choices: The marker stains had washed off! Does Amy see/recognize you?
Amy clumsily wears you inside out...
12421232.content:
"Wow! How adorable! It's a little Rapunzel sticker! That is just too cute!" You silently screamed realizing you weren't recognized in the slightest by this air headed ditz. Your body was so squished from being trapped in Professor Erin's notebook for so long, you were stuck motionless against Amy's scrap paper as she started copying her answers from one sheet to the other. You couldn't even blink at Amy to give her any indication you were a living being, it was an enormous struggle just to move your eyes at all in an attempt to look around the classroom. There wasn't much to see however as you noticed Amy was the last student in the room, probably due to her incredibly short attention span, and she seemed eager to finish up as quickly as possible.

Finally done copying the large number of answers onto the fresh sheet of paper, Amy proudly held her new test in front of her. You saw Amy's eyes lock onto you and you saw her smile immediately flip into a concerned frown. "Aww man, there's no way I can turn in a test with a silly sticker like this on it! I'll have to cover it up..." Amy sighed sadly as you saw her bend over and begin rummaging through her bag. With an "Aha!" Amy withdrew a small white bottle which she proceeded to pull a tiny paint brush from. Your eyes strained to read the lettering on the tiny bottle as Amy dauntingly hovered the small brush carefully over your flattened form. You panicked reading the distinct letters of White-Out and you winced feeling like this really was the end. Amy held her tongue out in concentration, making sure not to spill a single drop onto the test answers below as she hovered the chemical a mere inch from your face. Amy truly had the chance to blot you out from existence, blending you in with the paper for all eternity.

Just as the brush met the page above your head however, Amy stopped. Her look of concentration faded into an expression of discontent as she sighed in defeat. Jutting her lower lip out, Amy whispered out "This sticker is just way too cute...I used to be crazy about the Princesses when I was a little girl! Little me would've loved something like this, there's no way I could erase it!" Amy tossed her white bottle back into her book bag before glancing down at you in thought. You saw a warm smile spread across her face as she had a new idea on how to free the tiny decoration. Hovering her finger directly over you, Amy began harshly scratching at your flattened head in an attempt to peel you off. It seemed to be working, as your squishy body crumpled against the painful prodding, separating slowly from the paper below. After a minute of hard work, Amy had successfully peeled you from the paper and now held you carefully in her large, warm palm. "Hooray!! I saved you, Rapunzel!" Bringing you against her lips for a quick victory kiss, you wanted to cry tears of joy due to Amy's finally helpful, albeit oblivious, actions. Thanks to her childish affection towards you, ten days of boring torture squashed and carried around in Professor Erin's notebook were finally over. Finishing her thought however, your stomach dropped as Amy declared, "Now you get to come home with me!" casting you away, your flat sticker body floated down into her backpack before resting softly at the bottom.

Amy gave you a cutesy wave before you saw her excited face disappear as she zipped up her bag, slowly sealing you away as the zipper blocked out all the classroom's light. Your world lurched strongly as Amy carelessly slung her book bag over her shoulder, throwing you and the other loose items around wildly as she skipped back up to Professor Erin's desk, depositing her test down before prancing out of the room. Amy passed by Professor Erin in the hallway, only shouting out a "Thanks for the paper, Professor E!" as she zipped out of the building. Only raising a perplexed eyebrow in response, Professor Erin simply muttered, "You're...welcome?" before shrugging and returning to the classroom to start grading. You trembled in the swinging bag as you realized the one person who could possibly recognize you had no idea you had been whisked off by this clueless ditz.

Amy bounced across campus, much to your dismay, as she made her way back to her dorm. You were constantly jumbled and rammed into all of Amy's loose books and supplies but you were defenseless in doing anything about it. Walking into her room, Amy tossed her bag down at the foot of her small desk with a solid thump before resigning to let herself relax for a few hours before getting some studying done. You lay in absolute darkness, only being taunted by the muffled sounds of Amy watching TV or talking on the phone for hours. Finally though, you felt your prison stir as Amy sat down at her desk and unzipped her bag. Your eyes slowly adjusted to the rooms bright light, the first thing you saw being Amy's beautiful face as she pulled her books out and deposited them on the desk. You felt yourself going along with a particularly small notebook as Amy set you down and glanced at what she had just withdrawn. Her glossy eyes soon locked onto you and you saw them liven up with sparkles as she grinned seeing you once again! "Oh my I almost forgot about you my little Princess!" Amy's bright smile was complimented by relentless giggles as she saw what you were plastered onto.

Amy had been taking a fashion class, and while she wasn't the best at measurements, she made up for it with being a talented artist. It just so happened you were crushed right against a page of her sketchbook which had inconveniently been flipped open to a page where Amy had been doodling and designing a cute pair of frilly panties. Amy stopped her giggling and instead looked down at you with desire and wonder, falling in love with the idea of some Princess themed undies to match her royal bod. Setting her design into motion, Amy peeled you from the page and deposited you in her back pocket before searching about for what panties she could attach you to. You had no idea what was going on in the slightest, you were left to suffer in confusion against Amy's swaying booty as she moved around the room. Following the design in her book, Amy was looking for something pink and frilly to match your painted on dress. Searching for almost an hour, Amy dug through her drawers and even dirty laundry in focus, "I know I have something just perfect for this project, but where are they!?!" Stamping her foot in a huff, Amy seemed ready to give up but needed to take a bathroom break first. Entering the girls room and pulling her pants down, Amy began to relieve herself before looking down between her legs. Seeing the exact pair she had been looking for, Amy mentally cheered while also giggling at her complete cluelessness. Just happy to have the pair she needed, Amy snaked her undies off her legs. Returning to her room, now commando, Amy plopped herself into her desk chair, crushing you against her ample ass painfully, before reaching behind her and withdrawing your freshly flattened body.

It was only then you lay eyes on the panties before you, seeing the pair laying limp on the desk coated in a design of dozens of small hearts. A small patch was just pure pink on the back of the panties, seemingly rubbed raw of the cutesy hearts from weeks of being grinded between Amy's powerful cheeks. You gulped, praying you were not about to somehow end up suffering the same fate. Amy took notice of the gap however and hovered you above it, lining up her dream design and making sure you'd make a good fit. Amy flashing a smile at you, confirmed your doom, as you were brought up before her pink lips. "Let's see if I can wake up any remaining glue..." Amy murmured before letting her tongue hang out before you. Amy turned your back to her before pressing you firmly into her soaking tongue, coating you in a layer of hot saliva. Not wanting any of it to dry, Amy quickly smacked you down onto the panties, cementing you firmly right in the position she had designed. Admiring her handiwork, you were studied carefully while you couldn't help but notice the warm musk that drifted into your senses from the freshly worn panties. Satisfied immensely with her product, Amy began trying to form you as deeply into the fibers as she could. Dropping her largest textbook atop you, Amy still noticed a slight fringe of your body hung loose. "I'm going to need something heavier..." Amy mused before another great idea struck her. Laying you on the hard floor, Amy hovered her dirty sole atop you belting out, "Sorry, Princess! It's for the best!" before pressing down with as much force as she could. Amy did a few cute hops atop you before checking her progress and noted you were totally pasted into her adorable panties.

Squealing in delight, Amy couldn't wait another second to model herself, slipping you up her thick legs before you felt yourself pulled taut against her booty. Taking just a few short steps to the mirror, you already felt yourself being chewed together into her moist crack as Amy walked, a harsh smell looming deeper within. Gazing at herself, Amy had already lost your tiny form against her derriere. "Where'd my little Princess go? Oh....wait...." Amy blushed realizing her mistake. Pulling you out from her crack, Amy looked over her shoulder at you and admired her stellar craftsmanship. Feeling incredible pride in her work, Amy clapped her hands and jumped about energetically, unwarily torturing you as your body heaved up and down tied to the motion of Amy's jiggling cheeks.

Waltzing back over to her desk, Amy face-palmed realizing this distraction had cost her over two hours of studying. Leaving you trapped to cushion her as she studied into the night, your panties were soon peeled off and tossed into Amy's laundry basket. As days passed, Amy smothered you in her weeks dirty socks and panties before finally washing you. After Amy washed you, and excited to wear her unique pair...
12421232.title: Victim of Fashion, Being Amy's Princess

choices: Amy decides to turn you in, and the teacher hangs you up for all to see!
Months later, Amy rips the fabric and you're free again, but as a Princess doll!
124212321.content:
You sat in Amy's laundry basket for a week, slowly being buried under layer after layer of her dirty laundry as the week progressed. Finally though, the basket was full and you felt yourself thrown upwards as Amy hoisted your container up, carrying the stinky clothes to the dorm's laundry machines. Filling up the washing machine, Amy slowly deposited each article down below letting them land with a thud against the metal. Your panty prison was the last item to go in causing Amy to shriek happily as she was reminded you even existed.

Honestly the bombshell babe was a sight for sore eyes, any human contact beat being trapped under dirty clothes. Amy's eyes practically looked through you however, as you knew her affectionate gaze wasn't for you as a person, but only as a pair of cute and comfy panties. "Alright Princess, it's time for your royal bath!" Amy wagged her finger down at you before bopping you on the nose, "Now-now, I don't want to hear any complaining, missy! My big 'ol butt made you allll stinky and you need to get clean if we're going to play anymore! Ta-ta!" Amy tossed you down into the pit of warm water and you saw her blow you a kiss before she slammed the lid to the washer shut.

After swimming in sudsy filth for an hour, Amy returned, moving her clothes in one wet lump into the dryer before hitting the 'high' setting. Amy skipped off, blissfully unaware she had just doomed her tiny friend to bake away in a spinning furnace of pain and suffering. As the dryer tumbled you around, hot air blasted in melting your already paper thin body into the very fibers of the pink panties themselves. You sobbed realizing that at this point Amy would probably have to cut your body out with scissors if she was going to save you, but you felt even the chances of that were slim to none. The hot air soon melted you into your set pose, that Amy had so carefully put you in of course, locking you into a happy smile and wave regardless of how hard to tried to twitch your face.

Folding her laundry later that evening, Amy set you aside, wanting to put you on as soon as she finished this menial task. After carefully depositing the stacks of clothing in her dresser, Amy reached for you bringing you up to her face and smothering you into her nose, inhaling deeply from you, "See that wasn't so bad! And now you're fresh and clean and ready for lots of more fun with me and my booty! Yayyyyy~!" Amy did a childish spin squeezing you tightly in her grip before she took another look down at you. Seeing Amy's grin flip into a frown, you wondered what was going through Amy's head as she carefully inspected you, rubbing a finger over your flat form inquisitively.

"Oh no...it looks like some of her ink came off in the washer, she's kind of faded now...." You prayed it was enough to get Amy to recognize you, to save you from this daunting fate as a ridiculously feminine doll stuck to equally girly undies. Right when Amy seemed to glimmer at you with a familiar stare, your hopes were obliterated as she yelled out, point blank in your face, "Well, I guess if I don't wash them, the design won't get any more faded! You're lucky you have a genius like me for an owner, Princess!" Laughing to herself at her supposed intellect, Amy let you drop onto the floor before stepping into you. You felt your body tugged upwards before rocketing deep into Amy's crack as her booty instantly consumed you. Thankfully, Amy had just showered so only a light musk penetrated your sense, but you knew the worst was far from here. "I'll keep you looking like a Princess, so I can look like a Princess!" Amy giggled shaking her ass playfully in the mirror before slipping her spandex over you.

The first day was fairly normal, you were crushed mercilessly under Amy's weight while she bumbled around campus, occasionally stepping on a tiny obliviously as she stared deeply into her phone. Nothing too bad but the grinding pressure that was exerted on you while Amy walked began to take it's toll on you. The second day, you finally got a fifteen minute break from Amy's booty's embrace as she took a short ten minute shower before quickly hoisting you back up between her cheeks. The third day, Amy checked on her cute sticker companion, noting comically how you had begun to smell a bit sweaty but that she'd spare you a wash for your sake since she loved you so much. Your heart warmed hearing that and you almost wanted to forgive Amy for doing this to you as you realized she really was just an unobservant, clueless broad who wanted to feel cute but that all faded as the days rolled on. Fours days in you experienced true hell as Amy visited a Mexican buffet, causing you to be tortured by her emissions all night while she snored above you peacefully. In the morning, Amy erupted in laughter as she watched your face stay frozen smiling even as she blew out another fart onto you.

Five days under your ditzy owner, Amy's booty had clearly broken you more than you had ever thought possible. Your body was coated in Amy's own dense unique smell, your prison constantly soaked even as Amy poured fresh sweat over you while walking across campus in the hot suns rays. Amy truly proved to you she had the 'juiciest' booty on campus over the past few days. You mentally sobbed while your face was locked into it's same goofy smile as Amy leaped into her seat for class, grinding you into the chair in an attempt to make herself comfy. Another long, arduous day progressed as Amy fought for tiny rights, totally unaware she was imprisoning one beneath her as she shouted a speech into her megaphone. You were thrown about wildly as each step Amy took caused her cheeks to jiggle relentlessly, pounding you against one another as she strolled back into her dorm room satisfied with a day well done.

Realizing she had been wearing you for five long days, you finally felt yourself slip down Amy's copious thighs before landing with a wet plop at her feet. Plugging her nose at your stench, Amy giggled at the smell she had accrued before laying you down on her desk to see how you were holding up. Amy covered her mouth in a gasp as she saw your beautiful design had actually managed to fade...even more! As it turns out, much to a ditz like Amy's surprise, grinding a sticker while marinating it in gallons of your own sweat seemed to be as effective at washing out the color as actually washing it. Amy gave up on her attempt to save you by never washing you, letting you land with a sad thud into her full dirty clothes hamper once again.

The next day Amy carried you back to the washing machine, running you through the awful process once again. Pulling you from the dryer hours later, Amy gazed down at you sadly noting, "Well Princess, it looks like you only have a couple more washes before you're just a tan figurine...this blows..." Amy sighed blowing some of her sweet breath down onto you before she perked up with one last ditch idea. Tucking you away in her backpack, Amy wanted to consult a professional for help before retiring you.

You bounced along in Amy's bag once again as she made her way to fashion and design class. As soon as class ended, Amy zipped up to the professor's desk, presenting you worriedly to her teacher. Amy explained exactly what had happened, from discovering you, to stamping you into place, to trying to save you from fading away, all while the teacher simply shook her head. "Amy," the teacher began, "Did you remember to seal your finished design?" The professor knew the answer as Amy cocked her head to the side aimlessly. "You can be kinda careless can't you, kid?" The professor asked. Amy beamed back, "It's funny you say that! I get that all the time!" The professor facepalmed before elaborating, "Listen, Amy. Go home and touch your design up. When it's perfect, iron it down with this." The professor handed Amy a thin slice of laminate plastic. "This will seal your design and give it that glossy look, good luck!" Amy happily skipped out of the classroom, but not before her teacher called out, "Oh Amy! The design really is cute, maybe you could turn those in for your final project!" Amy nodded happily before resuming her trek back home with you squeezed in her determined grip.

Pinning you down with fabric pins, Amy withdrew some fresh fabric markers and began reconstructing your lush pink dress and flowing hair. "Sorry I have to do this to you Princess, but you kind of looked like a little kid's drawing before!" You screamed at the irony of that statement as Amy colored you in, making you look much more official than ever before. You cried as the only thing that kept your hopes up was the idea that soon all the marker would have faded away, revealing you as a real human to your air-headed giantess captor. Admiring her latest art piece, Amy kissed you in satisfaction before carrying you to the ironing board.

Amy cut out a tiny piece of laminate just your size while she waited for the iron to heat up. You tried to scream, squirm, pray, anything if it meant escaping the steaming hot iron that glowed next to you ominously. Amy smiled as she lay the plastic over you. She jutted out her lower lip sympathetically as she consoled you, "Don't be scared, Princess! Just one last step and we'll truly be together..." Amy lay the scalding iron over you, "Forever!!" Amy's soft giggles rang through your mind as you passed out from the excruciating heat. You woke up a few minutes later to the scary sight of Amy's twinkling eyes a mere inch from your face as she gushed over her final product.

"Wow! The Professor was right! It's so shiny and sparkly! I really turned you into a real Princess, Princess! No need to thank me!" Amy resumed taunting you in her incessant giggling as she twirled you around in her fingers. "They're almost too cute to wear!" Amy mused before dropping you down. "NOT~!" Amy boomed before bringing you right back up to hug her wide hips.

Is this your fate?
124212321.title: Adored and Adorned by Air-Head Amy

choices: A. Your world is forever flipped
B. A bleach blonde princess
C. Your fate changes for the better
124212322.content:
Amy awoke to a gentle summer breeze rustling her hair. She sat up, letting out a cute yawn and rubbing the sleep from her eyes. "...Ah, this is nice! I slept so well last night!" Sitting on the edge of her bed, she reached for her phone out of habit, its face automatically showing her the time as she picked it up. "Wow, it's already- wait, 10:20?! Crap, no wonder I slept so well!" She quickly hoisted herself to her feet and began scrambling to get ready as quickly as she possibly could. "I was supposed to be at Intro Bio like half an hour ago, this is bad! I don't have any more absences!" Having shimmied her panties down her legs, she yanked open her underwear drawer, only to realize she had gone through all her clean pairs. All of them, except... "The dryer! Gotta hurry, aw man..."

The door to the dryer startled you when it suddenly opened, as you had done nothing but sit there silently after the last wrinkle guard cycle had ended hours ago. You were alarmed, but not terribly surprised, to discover that a trip through the dryer had dramatically worsened your situation. While you were completely unable to move before, you could still easily have been removed from the panties Amy had stuck you to (assuming she decided to take you off). But now... you felt flatter than you had ever felt before, and that was saying something considering how frequently you ended up stepped on and crushed.

The sensation of being baked so deeply into the fabric fibers was truly bizarre. It felt to you kind of like being in a swimming pool and being just about to break through the water's surface, only... you couldn't. You were stuck just below, the outside world in plain view but with a thin layer preventing you from reaching it. What's more, the drying process seemed to have melted the dye of your princess "costume" along with you, and you could no longer tell where the dress ended and your legs began. You really hoped that once you got out of here, this would all be reversible. You were going to get out of this mess... right?

Amy hastily grabbed the first pair of panties she found, not bothering to even look at them before sliding them into place. Her mind filled only with thoughts of how late she was, she dashed back over to her dresser and began looking for a skirt to wear.

You had barely even registered that you had been removed from Amy's dryer before you were slammed mercilessly back between her cheeks. Your vision went dark as her crack folded you on top of yourself, preventing you from being able to see anything until the next time she bent over. Despite this, you still had a pretty good idea of what was going on up above from Amy's panicked babbling to herself. She dashed from one corner of her room to the other, throwing on a top and running a brush through her hair, her butt cheeks pounding you senseless the entire time. Before long, it became equally difficult to ignore the scent of stale sweat wafting around you. Amy clearly hadn't showered the night before, so there had been ample time for sweat and grime to accumulate as she slept through the sweltering summer heat.

While being ground back and forth as she walked was unpleasant enough, Amy's swamp ass soon formed a miasma around you that was truly unbearable, far worse than it had been yesterday when she first put you on. At first, you chalked the difference up to her poor hygiene yesterday, but not long into Amy's frenetic trek to her class, she tripped, inadvertently showing you more details of your predicament. She fell to her hands and knees, and as she did so her ass spread open slightly, temporarily letting you see again. You had heard her talking about a skirt of some kind, so you figured you'd see that blocking off your vision, but as you looked passively ahead, you instead saw Amy's bare ass in all its glory. This was not good, you immediately realized. Not good at all. In her rush to get dressed that morning, Amy had put on her panties inside out.

As your unaware captress sat through the rest of her biology class, you tried your best to make the most of this bad situation, wanting to stay optimistic. Surely Amy would realize her mistake soon, and at the very least flip her underwear the right way around. She had to go to the bathroom eventually, and then she'd notice, right? You focused on these thoughts as Amy's biology professor rambled in the background, saying something about ecosystems that you largely didn't understand. Despite the horrible environment surrounding you, you were nearly about to drift off to sleep when, from the corner of your eye, you spotted something you really wish you hadn't seen. A large bead of sweat the size of your entire head was slowly trickling down the side of Amy's cheek from wherever ungodly place it had formed, and it didn't take a genius to work out where it was headed. You wished now more than ever that Amy had at least had the sense to place you somewhere else on the panties, rather than the very center of the back, but there was nothing you could do about it now.

Agonizingly slowly, the sweat droplet rolled right on top of your face, and for a moment, it just sat there. You realized you had been holding your breath in fear, and went to inhale, but the sweat was still right over your mouth. Your mind started racing. Oh god, were you going to die? If you were flattened so deeply, why did you still need to breathe anyway? Not wanting to risk finding out the answers to these questions, you realized there was only one thing you could do.

The taste was as horrible as you had expected. Worse, really. You wanted so desperately to spit the sweat out, but with you effectively lying on your back, there was nowhere else for it to go. You had only just choked it all down when you saw another sweat drop heading your way, and you couldn't help but cry at what fate seemed to have in store for you.

After a half hour of this torture, Amy sat up, her class having ended. You were incredibly relieved, as you had already swallowed so much butt sweat that you could feel it sloshing around in your stomach as Amy jostled you back and forth. The thought of having to go through an entire day of sweat drinking worried you, but fortunately it seemed your prayers had been answered as Amy stopped by the bathroom before her next class.

She quickly made her way into the nearest stall and pulled you down around her legs. You looked up at her, hoping to meet her gaze, but your view of her face was blocked by her phone the entire time. She was so engrossed in whatever she was looking at, in fact, that she pulled you right back into place after lazily wiping a few times, not realizing for a moment that her panties were on inside out. This action, while totally inconsequential to Amy, had sealed your doom. You rocketed right back into her oblivious ass, but to your horror, this time she wasn't fully paying attention, and pulled her panties up tighter than normal. Still thinking only of her phone, she happily walked back to class, with you now pressed almost flush with her anus. You could only hope this wouldn't be the death of you.

After hours upon hours, Amy broke the seal her butt had made around you and stepped out of you to go take a shower. After that never-ending barrage of sweat and musk, you had never been so grateful for fresh air in your life. She had unintentionally wedgied you right into ground zero, and even farted right on you a few times, though that had been thankfully infrequent. Not knowing what was next for you, you enjoyed your temporary freedom as much as you could, and after twenty minutes or so, Amy stepped out of the shower and wrapped a towel around herself. She glanced at you briefly as she scooped up her clothes to carry them to the hamper, and as she saw your face she immediately realized the mistake she had made that morning. "Oh, gosh, what happened to you, Princess? Did I wear you inside out the whole day? You're all dirty!" She brought her face in close for a moment, but recoiled at the smell. "Phew, and stinky too. I sure hope this'll come out in the wash. I can barely stand it!"

"How do you think I feel?" You tried to say, but your face remained frozen in its usual wide grin. Instead, you heard "Don't worry about me Amy, I love it in here!" come from above you, as Amy spoke for you in an embarrassing falsetto-y voice. "That's the spirit!" said Amy, in her regular voice. "I love you, my little booty princess." You flushed with embarrassment at being spoken to this way, though you weren't sure if "I love you" or "booty princess" was the more embarrassing part. As Amy playfully flicked you into her hamper, you realized you would have quite a bit of time to decide.

A few days later, Amy finally got around to doing her laundry again, but what happened then?

A. Amy puts you through the wash like normal, but her butt has done such a number on you that she doesn't want to wear you right-side out anymore...

B. Amy decides that heavy duty stains need some heavy duty cleaning, and adds bleach to your load. Whatever that means for you, it probably isn't good.

C. Just when you think your luck has run out, a miracle arrives at last. Maybe Amy finally realizes you're not just a sticker, or maybe Professor Erin feels guilty and tracks you down herself. Either way, things are looking up!
124212322.title: Inside Out

choices: The professor asks her to participate more, how will she take this?
Jessica checks her shoe to find you, and needs your help with something?
Jessica checks her shoe to find you, and keeps messing with you
You somehow manage to escape on your own eventually!
writer's choice
13.content:
Looking at your planner you see that today was a day filled with class for you, a bittersweet realization. You would have loved to hang out with Chelsea but at the same time you genuinely did enjoy the classes you were taking, the first of which was Communication 101. It was pretty basic stuff, more or less studying how people interact with each other, but you found it interesting nonetheless. The reason for this was that the professor of that class was actually a tiny guy himself! Along with the regular course material he talked a fair amount about the changes of communication that happened in society since the great shrinking epidemic. It was honestly fascinating stuff.

However as you grabbed your appropriately sized backpack and stuffed it with a notebook and a pencil you remembered the only reason you didn't enjoy the class, it was your classmate, Jessica Chamberlain. You've had the misfortune of having this brat of a girl in your class for a part of the semester now, and you wished every day that you didn't. Barring some rare exceptions, most girls you met at college were either nice or at least pretended to care about the well-being of the tiny population of men, but this girl outright did not. In her best moods she was simply unconcerned with you little guys, stepping on, sitting on, or otherwise squashing you without even bothering to look up from her phone. But when she was feeling annoyed or mischievous she posed more of a threat to you all than any woman you knew. You would admit that at the very least she wasn't bloodthirsty or anything and didn't want to kill any tiny guys, more like she just took great pleasure in messing with you all. But regardless, you tried to steer clear of her as much as you could.

Walking out of your dorm-box you closed the door behind you and began jogging in the direction of your class. You had taken up jogging as a better method to get around as your tiny stature made walking take far too long to get anywhere at a reasonable pace. And while you by no means kept up with the long strides of regular sized girls you could still make good time when you needed to. Reaching a small whole in the door of the end of the hallway you pass through it into the courtyard. Taking a second to breathe in the fresh outside air (a welcome smell after the wake-up scent of Chelsea's foot earlier) you proceed towards the section of the sidewalk marked "Tinies Only". It wasn't much more than about a foot wide section of the sidewalk marked off with paint but it got the idea across that it was a designated walking area for tiny guys, and girls should steer clear of it. You caught up with a crowd of other tiny guys, nodding and waving to a few you recognized before hustling past them. You would have stayed and chatted but then you would have likely been late for class.

About three minutes of jogging had passed and you could see the building where your lecture was to take place. You smiled, knowing that you would certainly make it on time. But suddenly, a vast shadow was cast over you and the group of men in your vicinity. You gazed upwards, praying that it was only a cloud covering the sun, but gulped with fear as you saw the unmistakable image of the sole of a designer shoe.

*squish*

"Ugh, ew, did I accidentally walk in the guys' path again? Whoopsies, I'll have to tell mom to make it, like, smaller or something because this keeps happening. Whatevs, I'm sure they'll figure it out." The snobby voice rang out from none other than the Dean's daughter, Jessica, as she didn't even bother to glance away from her phone for a second to check on the guys she had just squashed flat. Now resuming her stride Jessica could barely hear the squelching sound of a dozen or so guys flattened to her sole, one of which was you.

You felt the crisp morning air be replaced with sheer crushing pressure over and over again as Jessica casually strolled towards the class you had together. You groaned, knowing that today wasn't shaping up well if you had already run into this nightmare of a girl so early on. However, trying to stay optimistic, you realized that at the very least you would be heading towards the right class. If you weren't able to free yourself from her sole then at the very least you might be able to listen to the lecture. A few more minutes passed and you felt the stomps on your body switch from hard concrete to carpet, softening the blows on your body and also telling you that you had reached the lecture hall. With what little vision you had left you looked to your side to see a number of guys in the same situation, feeling extra bad for any of them who weren't heading to this class. Jessica took a few more steps to reach the back of the hall, somewhere she could no doubt slack off and not pay attention. You never understood why she even went to class in the first place if she wasn't going to even try to learn, but you never dared ask her that.

Reaching her seat, Jessica plopped her ass onto the chair before crossing her leg, lifting the shoe you were stuck to into the air slightly.

"Okay guys, free ride ends here! You're welcome by the way. Now you can hop off my shoe if you want, or don't, it doesn't really make a difference to me." She said somewhat quietly down to you all, but not quietly enough to avoid some disgusted stares of actually nice girls around her. Jessica looked at her shoe and didn't see anyone falling off of it, holding this position for no more than 10 seconds before saying "ugh, really? You guys are lucky im in a good mood today." She aimed her shoe for the corner of her desk and roughly scraped her sole along it, inflicting serious pain onto the guys stuck to it but at least scraping them off. She manages to get everyone off as they fall to the ground, battered yet slowly reforming... well almost everyone. You, sadly, remained slightly squashed into a divot in her sole, and as a result did not fall off in her oh-so-altruistic act of scraping her foot on her desk. However, she did not know this and she returned her sole to the ground, crushing you once more beneath it. You whimpered into the carpeted ground, from this position you could barely even hear the lecture. You could only pray that something would happen to change your luck.

How does this situation resolve?
13.title: Trek to Comm 101

choices: Phobe points you out to Jessica, who forces Phoebe to "earn her A" with you.
Phobe points you out to Jessica, but Jessica wants to use you for her lesson.
Phobe mercifully keeps quiet, and you continue to remain unnoticed by Jessica.
131.content:
“Jessica!” A stern voice yelled from the front of the class, as the tiny teacher impatiently tapped his foot against the desk. Of course, even a tiny yelling was barely perceptible to the students near the back of the class, but Jessica did manage to hear him.

“Uh, you say something tiny?” Jessica smirked, flicking a strand of her jet black hair over her shoulder carelessly. “Speak up a bit!”

“Young lady, unlike other teachers at this school, I won’t tolerate that behavior.” The teacher crossed his arms. “I WAS going to ask you to explain the homework assignment, but now I’m writing you up for sassing a teacher.”

“Um…okay?” Jessica snickered, glancing at a few girls around the room she considered friends, who laughed with her. “Good luck writing me up, squirt. You DO know who I am, right?”

“I’m well aware.” The teacher walked over to the normal sized computer and began bouncing up and down on the keyboard, no doubt attempting to mark down Jessica’s class grade. It was honestly a funny sight, and a few girls let out cute chuckles.

“Just trying to have some fun in this boring class, dude. Don’t kill my mood.” Jessica sighed, bringing her attention back to her social media feeds.

The teacher grinned. “How’s a ten percent deduction of your grade for bad behavior affect your mood?” He asked, about to submit the report he had just exhaustingly typed out. Across the room, Jessica raised her eyebrow and stood up. A few girls in the class winced and drew back. The black-haired giantess strolled towards the teacher’s desk, almost radiating a terrifying aura.

And, during all of this, you could merely cry out in mute pain every time Jessica’s foot slammed back down into the ground as she walked, over and over crushing you beneath her heel. Your squishy body began sticking to the treads in her sneaker, and you begged for the sweet relief the other poor tinies Jessica had tormented had received. Sadly, you got none.

Jessica reached the front desk and stared down at the teacher, who still felt completely in-control of the situation. “Gotta say, teach. I’m feelin’ a bit pissed off. You sure know how to make a girl mad.”

The teacher shook his head. “It’s to teach you a lesson, young lady. You can’t disrespect everyone in your life just because your ‘mommy’s little girl’. You have to…”

Jessica’s face flashed a brief glimpse of legitimate anger before she yawned nonchalantly and turned around. In one simple motion, she hoisted herself up onto the teacher’s desk, and completely buried the teacher beneath her shapely derriere. The class collectively gasped in surprise, even more so as Jessica casually twisted her butt back and forth, grinding the poor tiny teacher to a smudge under her yoga pants-clad ass.

One girl with raven-colored hair at the front of the class looked about ready to chastise Jessica, but the black-haired giantess silenced her by raising her hand. “So, looks like our teach just bounced. Don’t know where he went. BUT, as the daughter of the dean, I’ll take responsibility and teach the class today in his stead.”

Everyone was too stunned to respond, so Jessica continued. “First, looks like little squishy brought up the gradebook, and was accidentally about to subtract ten percent from my grade. That’s so silly of him.” Jessica laughed, and punched a few numbers into the computer. “There we go! PLUS ten percent!

“Secondly, our tiny squirt of a teacher left before taking attendance. Sure hope I don’t find the little pest stuck to my butt when I get back to my dorm. I think that classifies as sexual harassment and is certainly grounds for firing the squirt.

“Whatev…guess your new substitute teacher will start with attendance then. However, it’s too boring to go one-by-one through the entire room.” Jessica lazily pointed to the closest girl. “Fran, you’re up first. Pick up the nearest tiny, if you please?”

Fran frowned. “What? You mean…Phillip?” She gestured to a rather frightened tiny sitting on the desk in front of her. The pale boy froze up upon hearing his name spoken.

Jessica waved her hand dismissively. “Sure, whatever. Pick him up…and DO something with him. Like, squish him, or sit on him, or eat him.”

“What the hell?” Fran balked, and a few other girls let out startled exclamations. “I’m not hurting Phillip!”

The newly instituted substitute teacher frowned. “Oh, I’m sorry. Did you want me to fail you?” She gestured to the computer. “I could wreck your grade if I wanted to.”

Fran cried out. “My mom would kill me! Please don’t! Why are you doing this?”

“Because.” Jessica shrugged. “It’s funny, and I’m hella bored. Stop wasting my time.”

Shaking with frustration, Fran picked up Phillip, who was now kicking and screaming, and dropped him onto her chair after standing up. She then plopped back down into her chair, a firm frown on her face. Surprisingly, her frown blew up into a loud moan only a second later, and Fran hunched forward over her desk. This prompted an uproarious laugh from Jessica.

“What’s up Fran? Enjoying your tiny friend a bit much, aren’t ya?” She teased.

What had happened was that Phillip hadn’t been squished by her ass but had ended up between her butt cheeks fully intact (Fran was wearing tight-fitting leggings). Still kicking and struggling, his tiny efforts had stimulated Fran’s sensitive butt crack, prompting her to wiggle and squirm in her seat from embarrassed pleasure, grinding Phillip mercilessly.

Looking a few more seconds at the bright blush in Fran’s face, Jessica turned to the computer. “Alright…Fran and tiny number one…Phillip…are here! Who wants to be next? And hell…the more creative you get with your tiny, the more bonus points I’ll give you! Let’s call it…extra credit!” Jessica grinned, her visage the perfect picture of a pure devil of mischief.

For the next five minutes, each student in the class took their turn for “attendance”, and the humiliated tinies could only suffer on Miss Chamberlain’s strict rules. Some girls sat on their partners, some stuffed them down their cleavage, and one of Jessica’s friends eagerly swallowed her helpless tiny. One girl in the back even squished and molded the closest tiny into a stylish hair ribbon.

Finally, Jessica had circled back around to the raven-haired girl in the front who had tried to protest the black-haired giantesses cruel actions earlier. Crossing her arms smugly, Jessica grinned. “What’s up Phoebe? Eager for an F?” Jessica snorted, far too engrossed in how much fun she was having.

Phoebe shook her head. “I hate you for doing this. You’re a brat.”

Jessica stuck out her tongue and winked. “Thanks girl! Means a bunch. Enjoy your failing grade!”

Phoebe held up her hands. “Didn’t say I wouldn’t do it, but there aren’t any more tinies. You’ve already had everyone else torture the poor guys.”

Jessica tapped a finger to her chin. “Huh. Guess you fail by proxy then. Sucks to suck!” She reasoned, causing Phoebe to dejectedly swear under her breath. Jessica then leaned back, dragging her butt against the desk, and crossed her legs. The powerless tiny teacher was hardly more than a smear stain on Jessica’s yoga pants by now, firmly glued to the fabric.

"Alright class, time to start the lesson." Jessica cleared her throat. "I have no clue what this stupid class is meant to be about, so screw whatever plan our teach had for today. I'm in charge, and I've got LOADS of fantastic ideas. Most involving our ever entertaining, tiny little friends..."

While Jessica rambled, you were in an equally bad position compared to the teacher, but were now granted fresh air as Jessica crossed her legs and dangled her foot in the air. You fought against the treads of the sneaker sticking into your gummy-like body, praying to reform before Jessica put her foot back down. You might not have another chance like this for a long time.

While this was going on, Phoebe’s eyes happened to glance in your direction, and she instantly spotted your tiny, smushed body under Jessica’s sole. A glimmer in her eye, she knew this was her chance to earn back her A grade for the class by making her harmfully mischievous substitute teacher happy. Although…even from her giantess perspective, Phoebe could tell how much pain you were in, and knew Jessica would only make everything worse if she was made aware of you.

What happens next?
131.title: Jessica Chamberlain, Substitute Teacher

choices: She forgot about you
She had other plans
She's helping you get out of the class
1311.content:
Phoebe was conflicted but came to a conclusion. You would survive and her grade wouldn't be permanently deducted. She gave you a sorrowful look before saying, "Hey what's on the bottom of your shoe?"

Jessica looked and remembered how you were there. "Oh I almost forgot about you. Here, take him and earn your A." She said peeling him off and handing him to Pheobe.

Pheobe placed you down on the ground and began taking off her converse and revealed her bare foot, "Ran outta socks. Sorry little guy, but maybe you like feet." Her feet were pale and sweaty.

"Please don't-" You couldn't even get the words out of your mouth before her foot came down on top of you with an audible squelch.

"He actually doesn't feel half bad under there, it's actually kinda nice." Pheobe thought to herself. She wasn't cruel like Jessica but she started to see the appeal in it. "Hm, maybe this tiny guy and I can have some fun." She doubted he liked this but even if he didn't, accidents happen.

Jessica smiled and said, "Good job, A+ for the use of your disgusting feet, sure he's loving it haha." God she was so cruel. Pheobe walked back to her desk and got on her phone, the "roll call" had to last the whole class.

You thought Pheobe would peel you off when class ended but instead she reinserted her foot into the shoe. You began to ask yourself why?
1311.title: Phobe points you out to Jessica, who forces Pho...

choices: Phoebe doesn’t like your tone
Phoebe feels bad
13111.content:
Jessica, inspired by Phoebe’s method of torturing you, untied her right sneaker and freed her slightly sweaty foot. She was wearing cute pink ankle socks, though there was a visible buildup of dirt and dried sweat on the underside, like a dark footprint. She finally stood up and peeled the tiny teacher off her ass, keeping him in her tight fist as she restricted his ability to reform before sitting back down.

“Jessica! Put me down this instant, or I swear i’ll- mmph!” The cruel girl covered the teacher’s mouth with her thumb as she lowered him into her sneaker. The tiny man began to fight wildly when he realized what she was doing. Jessica pressed the teacher into the middle of her shoe’s insole and squished him into it with her thumb. Immediately, he was hit with the intense smell of Jessica’s athletic feet.

“I’m sorry, were you saying something?” Jessica said, putting her hand to her ear. The tiny teacher tried his best to give Jessica an earful, but his squished form couldn’t make a sound. “Hm, I thought so.” Jessica said with a smirk as she inserted her foot into her shoe. Tying her shoes tight, Jessica stood up and bounced up and down a few times, enjoying the teacher’s minuscule body squish beneath her sole with each bounce.

“Okay, listen up class!” Jessica shouted. “I’m bored, so you all can do whatever, I don’t care. Bye!” Jessica strutted right out of the lecture hall with the teacher plastered to her insole like nothing ever happened.

Now with Jessica and the teacher gone, the class of girls pulled out their phones and started chatting with each other. A few girls let their tiny captive go, but the majority didn’t bother, and some even continued to antagonize the poor tinies for fun.

One of the girl’s who didn’t bother was unfortunately Phoebe, the girl who had stepped on you barefoot and flattened you to her sweaty sole before trapping you in her shoe. You asked yourself why god was so cruel as Phoebe stood up to leave, squishing you flatter with each step as she made her way to her dorm. After being stuck to her sole for who knows who how long, Phoebe finally freed you from your smelly prison and peeled your slight slimy body from her foot, but quickly dropped you to the floor. “Ew.” Phoebe said in disgust before taking on a slightly more empathetic tone. “Sorry I stepped on you.”

You were enraged. This girl put you through hell on purpose, and now she could barely even give a sincere apology. As soon as you were able, you began shouting, “Are you kidding me!?” Phoebe’s expression turned to offense and you felt a surge of regret.
13111.title: She forgot about you

choices: Brought you to her boobs
Started using her butt to play with you
13112.content:
Her weight crashed down on top of you with every step and you learned just how sweaty her feet truly were. Not only that but her shoes had run their course and then some. You were locked in this sweaty, smelly prison with no end in sight.

The thing was that tinies are absorbent and this didn't go unnoticed on Pheobe's part. She enjoyed her walk and the feeling you gave her feet was great. Too great to give up soon.

Finally she got home and slipped both her shoes off. She inspected the shoes but after not seeing you she looked at her foot and saw you stuck to it, her sweat acting as glue. "Wow, you really must like my feet huh?" She laughed as she peeled your smushed form off.

She set you down and allowed you to reform. Before you could say a word she cut you off. "Alright I have a deal to make with you little man. I'll do your school work, help you with everything, and anything else. And in return, you're my little toy."

You were shocked. She couldn't be serious? "You are joking right?"

She rolled her eyes in annoyance. "Yes! I'm a straight A student. And it won't ALL be for me. We could do what...you want sometimes."

"And what if I say no?" You asked cautiously.

"I'd hate to do it, but my feet are missing you." She brought her foot close to you and wiggled her toes.

Not much of a choice, "Alright fine I'll do it. Just keep your end of the bargain." You said reluctantly, maybe there could be a way out of this.

"Yes! Alright first thing first, worship my feet." She propped her feet in front of you. The smell was something you couldn't get over as you pressed into the flesh. Fortunately some sweat had dried up as well. "Really worship them to. Kissing and all."

You felt sick as you puckered your lips and started kissing her feet. The foul taste tickled your lips as you heard her laughing from above.

She honestly held no cruel intentions, this was just fun. None the less, after 10 minutes you asked "So what's your...goal with me? To make me a slave or-"

She cut you off and said "No no. Just having fun, who knows, you might end up liking it. I know something you might like actually." You were curious and scared to what this could be as she______.
13112.title: Having "fun"

choices: Play a prank on her
Tell the dean
13113.content:
You’re body was smushed further into the pale, sweaty sole of Phoebe’s foot when she stood up, increasing the pressure tenfold. You couldn’t do anything but sob mentally as she began walking, each step painfully squishing your body over and over again as you were forced to smell the foot you were stuck to.

You had been trapped in shoes before, but none were quite as hellish as Phoebe’s. Her lack of socks make her feet super sweaty, which gave them an insanely powerful stench. Your body was covered in her sweat, and you weren’t sure if you would ever be able to wash the smell away. Step after step, Phoebe tortured you beneath her, crushing your body nonchalantly as she simply walked to her dorm.

After what seemed like an eternity, Phoebe finally reached her doom and slid off her converse, rubbing her sweaty feet on the carpet as she walked around. “Oh yeah.” Phoebe said to herself as she sat on her bed and lifted her foot up to her knee, revealing your battered body plastered to her sole. The giantess failed to hold back a laugh as she peeled you off, letting your paper-thin body float down and reform on the floor.

“As much as I’d love to keep stepping on you, I feel kind of bad about it. Are you okay, little guy?”

You were going to tell Phoebe off, but you considered it... the whole thing was Jessica’s fault. “I- yeah, I’m okay. You should really consider wearing socks, though.” You half-joked.

Phoebe took slight offense, but she could tell you were teasing. “Next time for sure, buddy.” She giggled. “For now though, I think we should focus on getting back at Jessica.”
13113.title: She's helping you get out of the class

choices: Get down!
Taken.
A new hope!
134.content:
You do your best to stay calm and listen to the lecture but being stuck under Jessica's foot is making it far less than easy, suddenly the immense pressure of being on the bottom of Jessica's shoe becomes overwhelming as she leans on her leg while reaching for her purse pressing you in deeper into the groove on her shoe. You feel like you're being compressed as you are pushed in from all sides, you feel your malluable body becoming more solid and unbreakable but at the cost of becoming smaller somehow. Seemingly finished with rumaging through her backpack Jessica sits back relieving the pressure on you and crosses her leg (and by extention you) over her other leg so that the sole of her shoe is up and off the ground and hanging freely off of her knee. You enjoy breathing in the relatively fresh air of the lecture hall when you suddenly slip free from the groove of Jessica's sole and fall to the ground with a inaudable thud.

Exstatic at finally being free from Jessica's sole you spring up to your feet and brush off all of the dirt particles of Jessica's shoe ready to rush to your seat and catch up on the lesson when you notice something, the normally ankle high carpet fibres are up to around your waist, you freeze in place not wanting to turn around when you hear an abnormally loud sigh.

Turning around you nearly fall to your knees numb in shock, before you is the goddess-like form of Jessica boredly scribbling in her notebook, "This can't be happening, I can't get smaller, it's not... Fair." you mumble out eyes still locked on the face miles up into air.

After a few minutes of staring up at Jessica you stop to think, you have shrunken from one inch to a quarter of an inch through being compressed into the grooves of Jessica's shoe, you look up to yell at her but stop yourself, this is Jessica, she probably woulden't help you if she could, that being said she would probably play with you if not keep you as a tinier-than-tiny slave or pet. You are four times smaller than a normal tiny and getting help from anyone else might take too long seeing as Jessica is sat in the far corner of the lecture hall, meaning she might be your only hope to get help. Suddenly Jessica looks down at one of her shoes out of boredom!

Option one) You dive for cover along the side of Jessica's colossal foot to stay out of view and stow away on or inside your new goddesses shoe, or begin climbing her.

Option two) Jessica sees you and lets out a ghasp of suprise at your size before giving you a mischevious smirk and picking you up and putting you into her purse.

Option two) Class ends and Jessica leaves and is replaced by another girl that you recognize, or not.
134.title: An even bigger problem...

choices: You accidentally start moving around.
You keep your composure but are given to Fera.
Jessica's friends come by.
1342.content:
Your heart nearly stops as you realize Jessica is staring straight at you, she tilts her head to the side with a face of confusion before picking you up.
Inbetween the two massive yet still somehow soft fingers you internally freak out as you are suspended higher and higher into the air, it isn't long however until you are face to face with the goddess herself, "Hmm, someone must've left their tiny-toy behind..."
You try your best not to move a muscle, those tiny-toys she's talking about are tiny dolls that are around a quarter of an inch tall just like you and are more popular with children.
You decide to keep still to keep the illusion of being a toy in the hopes that Jessica will just throw it away and forget about it, suddenly something clouds your view.
"You're really detailed for just being a toy, are you some kind of limited edition thing?" Jessica asks as she touches you to feel your body.

Suddenly her eyes light up, "Oh, Fera would love you, she's always looking for additions to her collection."
Fera is Jessica's 11 year old little sister, ironically the only reason you know that is because this isn't the first time you've been stuck under Jessica's shoe for an extended ammount of time.

While deep in thought you don't notice Jessica's massive fingers begin squeezing you from both sides.
1342.title: Taken.

choices: Melissa sits down to listen to a lecture eventually and you claw your way out
Melissa gets roped into a physical game for visiting parents
Another tiny guy spots you stuck to her sole and tries to help you escape!
Melissa runs into someone she knows/someone you know
Writer's Choice!
14.content:
Arriving at today's date in your planner you groaned as you read "Family Day" written in bright red with a huge circle around it. Today was the first dedicated day for parents all the students of the university to visit and check out the school. There would be games set up, information booths, meetings with the staff, you name it. It was an exciting day for much of the student body, as well as their relatives, but you weren't looking forward to it quite so much. The reason was that your mom, Melissa, could be a bit of a danger at times, to say the least.

Your mom loved you with all of her heart, that much you knew for certain, and she never once intentionally inflicted pain onto you for any reason. However, the burden you’ve had to bear for your entire life was the fact that Melissa deep down was the most oblivious, forgetful, ditz that you could imagine. You had lost track long ago of the number of times that she had stepped on you, sat on you, eaten you, or even on rare occasion used you as a tool or article of clothing by mistake. Even when she already was aware of where you were, she frequently would place you in her purse, pockets, cleavage, or any other variety of locations, and end up utterly sidetracked, leaving you there for hours anyway. It was a constant struggle to stay out of harm’s reach when you spent too much time with her, but the worst part of it all was that whenever Melissa would inevitably find you in some compromised position or another, she usually found it… funny.

You shook your head even thinking about this terribly annoying trait of your mom’s, but there was no way to change it. Upon discovering you in one of the classic sticky situations that she was so capable of inflicting upon you unwittingly, for some reason or another her first instinct was to simply laugh at it! Of course, she would always help you out of it (if it was possible) but not before getting a few hearty chuckles in. But as much as this quirk of hers bothered you, you had come to accept it over the years of your childhood and adolescence. Because the truth was that she hadn’t always been this way, when you were much younger she was actually much more painfully protective of you. Back then she wasn’t any less of a ditz than she is now, the only difference was when she would find out that she had accidentally squished you somehow, she would absolutely freak out and beat herself up incessantly over the mistake. This meant that not only would you suffer the pain of the accident itself, but then you would also be forced to console her and tell her not to be so hard on herself. It was exhausting to say the least, and if you were being honest you even preferred her laughing off her incidents with you rather than taking them to heart.

The reason for this drastic shift in outlook for Melissa came from a support group of local mothers all from your hometown that she came into contact with a number of years back. In the early years after the shrinking epidemic changed the world, the compassionate women often found themselves obsessing over the safety of their now tiny, male, friends and family members. However, as the years passed by and more knowledge of the shrinking virus was discovered (especially the nearly indestructible durability of your bodies), some tried to change the perspective on tiny guys away from something to be paranoid over, and towards something to treat more normally and even joke about. The group that your mother got involved with was named “Son Squishers” and you shuddered thinking about them. The Son Squishers were a collection of women, mostly mothers hence the name, that decided to embrace the comical aspects of life that came about naturally when regular sized girls and tiny guys interacted. They shared all kinds of stories, pictures, and videos of the ridiculous situations that they would get into with their own tiny sons and husbands in an effort to learn to laugh at those things rather than feel bad about them. You had to admit it was a commendable exercise in bringing back some form of normalcy to the world, but each and every time your mother would stop to take a quick selfie with you plastered to her ass or under her foot to post to the group, you couldn’t help but feel annoyed.

Today was going to be the first day you've seen your mom in a few months and you felt a mixture of excitement and fear as you always did.
