And almost as if it was on queue, you heard a few loud *BOOMS* that you recognized as giant knocks on your front door. Walking over you swung open the door to see none other than the giant foot that you could recognize better than any foot in the world. Covered in her favorite light blue running shoes, which you took a moment to cringe at as she had been wearing them for years now, you stepped outside to greet her. Looking up you saw that the rest of her outfit followed her running shoes' example as it consisted of athletic gear. Tight black yoga pants stretched far above you like skyscrapers and a gray long sleeve with a white puffy vest sat atop of them. While you felt no sexual feelings towards her at all, you were adult enough to admit that your mother was exceptionally attractive. She had a tremendous hourglass-shaped body along with tanned skin, brown hair, and a delicate looking face. Even at 40 years old she managed to maintain this level of beauty. You remembered countless times that your friends in high school would come over to hang out, but inevitably end up gravitating towards your mom by the end of the day. You chuckled remembering how much shit they would give you for her being a "milf" but you learned to take it in stride. After all, half of her looks passed onto you so the situation wasn't all bad.

Now staring up at your mom you saw that she was barely peering over her sizable bust back down at you.

Wait, hold on one sec!” Your mom then quickly took out her phone and angled it above her head, capturing her face, you, and your dorm in a selfie. She narrated a caption as she typed it out, “Check out my son’s college dorm, it looks just like a shoebox! Thank god my shoes aren’t in there with him, that would be like a free fumigation!” Melissa finished typing her message and sent it to the Son Squishers page as you facepalmed at the entire situation. Regaining your composure you responded,

“Hey mom! Great to see you too! But can you please cool it on all the Son Squishers stuff today? I thought we would have a nice day to bond without too much talk about funny situations between the two of us.” Melissa seemed to hear what you were saying but she responded,

“Oh honey you know I never want anything like that to happen! None of us in the club do! We can have a perfectly safe, carefree day!” You knew that your mom wasn’t lying, the vast majority of the members of the Son Squishers were just like Melissa and only found humor in squishings that happened accidentally...except for one woman. The few times your mom forced you to look at pictures in their group you couldn’t help but notice that this one lady’s photos and videos seemed to be nearly perfectly crafted to look as ridiculous as possible. Almost as if they were staged. But you shook your head out of this dark daydream and focused back up on your mom.

“You’re right! Let’s just focus on the fun day ahead! Now let's head out to the quad, I hear there are lots of activities for family members there! You can walk and I can run fast enough to keep up for the most part!" Looking down, Melissa smiled and you immediately took off running towards the exit to the hallway. Melissa flashed a beautiful smile to herself as she imagined all of the things you two would do together. For this brief moment as her mind was daydreaming of activities, that meant it wasn’t focused on you, and she lifted her left foot to begin walking along with her son. However, in a twist of horribly ironic fate this mere second of lost attention caused her to not look where she was placing her large, left foot.

*SQUISH*

Melissa froze immediately and her eyes went wide upon hearing the barely audible squishing noise. Slowly she aimed her gaze downward and hoped that she would see her son safe and sound on the ground, but as she scanned the nearby carpet there was no trace of you. You watched the carpeted ground approach and then felt nothing but crushing weight and blackness. Whimpering to yourself you prayed for this to end. Step after step crushed you into the ground as you wondered how the rest of the day would go...

If you need a charge I'd head over to The Hub. That's our campus hangout and arcade kinda place. They'll have a charging station set up there you can use!" Melissa got directions before heavily thanking Chelsea some more and heading straight towards this Hub that Chelsea described.

You groaned silently in-between squashing stomps as you saw Chelsea getting further and further from your mom as they parted ways. You loved your Mom but you couldn't deny you'd much rather be hanging out with Chelsea than ground to a pulp under your clueless Mom's favorite old sneakers. You wondered why she couldn't just pull you free and you could accompany her to The Hub, maybe even show her the way, but you knew your mom could only really stay on one track at a time. In reality you had totally slipped your mom's mind. She was just eager to answer those texts and get right back to scrolling through Son Squishers as soon as possible!

After a lengthy, and flattening, walk, Melissa finally came in front of this "Hub". Taking a step inside the dark building, Melissa was immediately overwhelmed by flashing lights and attractive game machines that instantly stole her attention. Letting out a chain of childish "Ooooo's" and "Aaaaah's" Melissa was caught up in the whole arcade atmosphere as she wandered around, you squelching against the hard floor with every step, easily drowned out by loud music blasting through the game center.

After checking out and watching some students play lots of different games, Melissa suddenly froze as she saw her ultimate game of choice. Stepping onto the game pad, you saw a neon flashing arrow rapidly approaching as Melissa stood upon her old favorite. Dance Dance Revolution. You shuddered and tried to cry out as you instantly had flashbacks of your Mom buying a similar floor mat game to play at home with her friends when you were just a small kid...

Wanting to help "Mommy" play, you had stood on the 'back arrow' and promised to jump up and hit it whenever the prompt came on screen. Your Mom happily accepted your help only to become totally absorbed into the game a minute into the next song and stomp her bare foot forcefully down onto you, mushing you onto the plastic mat like a tiny sticker. After dozens of aggressive slams from Melissa's dexterous, and slick with sweat, foot, Melissa traded off with a friend of hers due to exhaustion and you were forced to take the brunt of that woman's abuse as well! It was only hours later when your mother's friends had left that you were able to pop free and get your Mom's attention.

Gazing wide-eyed at the song list, Melissa was totally enraptured in nostalgia as she read all the old hits loaded onto this definitely years old machine. "I can't believe they have one of these, maybe this school isn't half bad! It's been years since I've gotten to play, aww man I used to be an old pro!" Melissa eagerly browsed her favorite songs and she squealed in excitement, all thoughts of charging her phone, and definitely of her tiny son, vanished from her mind. You were pounded into the arrow pads over and over, as Melissa tapped you with just enough force to trigger a response from the old machine. While Melissa could tell the age of the machine from the song choice and physical wear, you could easily tell the age from the rough scratches along the ground, not to mention the powerful stench of foot odor reeking from years of service under this school's giantesses.

You tried with all your might to force your way free from your mom's shoe, pressing with all your might against the well worn tread as if doing some kind of bench press. The last thing you wanted was to be trapped here while your mom got busy playing, you'd endured that once long ago and you weren't about to voluntarily go through it again. Tapping her chin in thought, Melissa began mindlessly swiveling her foot against the machine. The rigid plastic seemed happy to rip you from your Mom's shoe, letting you snap free as Melissa moved her foot to change songs. You quickly popped up and gazed up at your towering mother. Her giant face seemingly miles away, not to mention the loud music and dark atmosphere, you knew getting her attention was never an option. Making a run for it, you bolted to the nearest edge, the front of the machine, only to be crudely interrupted when--

"OOOH! This one!" Melissa boomed out as she slammed her foot onto the 'up arrow' excitedly. Returning her feet to the neutral position, you were left smooshed flat against the up input as Melissa stared with intense focus at the oncoming notes, a goofy, ecstatic grin plastered onto her face. "Let's see if I still got it!" you heard your mother belt out causing you to gulp in fear. You tried to pop back up just like a moment ago, but Melissa was faster, beginning to play along with the song and pounding her foot against you. This continued repeatedly as Melissa got more and more into it, the stomps quickly becoming disorienting as they left you flatter and dizzier each time. You took solace that your gummy body totally stuck out against the flashing red arrow beneath you, but honestly with how people spent every second staring at the game, you wondered if it even mattered.

It was only a couple minutes in, but a few dozen harsh steps for you, when a girl who must've worked at The Hub interrupted your mom with a tap on the shoulder. "Miss? Did you not read the sign?" Melissa muttered out a confused "Huh?" before seeing where the girl was pointed. Clear as day on the side of the machine was a posted notice reading "Machine is Delicate. Please Remove Shoes Before Use!" Melissa sheepishly apologized for her clumsiness before kicking her shoes aside, the Hub attendant blowing some air out of her face before rolling her eyes and walking off.

"This feels so much better anyways! This game always makes me work up a sweat..." Melissa spoke to herself before returning her feet to the center of the game pad. You strained your eyes to look forwards instead of up at the ceiling, making out the terrifying sight of Melissa's purple socked feet wiggling restlessly right in front of you. You could already smell the pungent aroma of Melissa's foot odor wafting it's way onto you as she flexed and shifted her feet. You saw, almost in slow motion, as your mother hovered a visibly damp socked foot over you before letting it fall onto you to resume her game. As she lifted off of you to press other arrows, you were left in a slick sheen of her fresh sweat that covered you in a cloud of humid stench.

You savored every second Melissa's feet were occupied with other buttons, but due to being the forward button, you had to endure a constant assault as her left and right feet alternated on which one got to press the tiny boy flat. Your only chance at a break would be a missed note, but Melissa hardly seemed to miss a beat, and when she did it was due to clumsily mis-stepping and missing the back arrow. You cringed at the irony that if history had repeated, you probably could've escaped this smelly beat-down under your mother's obliviously stamping feet.

Finishing with an exuberant finale, Melissa eagerly waited to see her score, only to see the giant flashing letters of "HIGH SCORE" explode onto the screen. Melissa shrieked and hopped up and down wildly, shocked she had been able to play so well despite still feeling rusty. Wiping the sweat from her brow, which cascaded down to splash menacingly next to you, Melissa turned to see she had a bit of a crowd of young girls gathered that had been in awe of your mother's fancy footwork. Blushing at the praise they showered her in, Melissa shook off their compliments saying how "Oh, that was nothing special" Nervously stepping backwards, Melissa's foot squashed you once more but this time she stood there getting her space from the small crowd.

The screen rang out, "Continue???" which prompted the tired Melissa to twist her foot around to make a decision:
142.title: Overwhelming Nostalgia

choices: Take a chance on June and yell up to her to get her attention.
Find someone else to help you rescue Zayn (Student Council, fellow tiny, etc).
Too late! June slides over on the bench, unknowingly burying you under her ass!
143.content:
Your giantess mom began strolling around campus aimlessly, long legs carrying her in a powerful stride, each footfall slamming into the concrete sidewalk and grinding you to paste beneath her. Your squishy body stuck more and more into the tread of her shoe, your visible human features smearing more and more with each step she took.

To make matters worse, you had almost completely slipped Melissa’s mind within minutes, as your titanic mother took in the sights of your campus. Eye-catching displays were set up all across the courtyards and open areas, friendly Student Council members smiled enthusiastically and handed Melissa souvenir keychains and necklaces, and the mouth-watering aroma of the cooking club’s food sample table soon had her full attention.

Approaching the table, Melissa eagerly shoveled as many free samples as she could onto her plate, much to the enjoyment of the cooking club members. She then popped a small chicken bite into her mouth and sat down on an empty bench closest to where the university’s musical team was performing a stage show for visiting parents.

Wanting to rest her feet (and unknowingly granting you the exact chance you had been waiting for), Melissa propped her feet up on the empty half of the bench and stretched out, smiling as the warm sun hit her and a cool breeze blew through her hair. Eating another chicken bite, Melissa began nodding along to the music, and wondering if this day could possibly get any better.

While you were experiencing a significantly worse day than your mother’s blissful day, now that her feet were no longer mercilessly pounding you to a pulp, you could actually begin to enjoy yourself. Focusing all of your mental fortitude on reforming as quickly as possible, you willed your gummy-like body to pry itself free from your mother’s shoe. The going was slow though, and you feared Melissa might move again before you could escape.

Just then, a voice spoke. “Oh god, dude. You are in BAD shape.” It was a boy’s voice. “Alright, okay…let me try to help you out.”

Though you couldn’t see much through your smeared and smudged eyes, you felt two hands grab your face and begin to pull on you as hard as they could. To your surprise, this drastically aided in your reforming process, and only a moment later your body popped free from Melissa’s shoe and splatted down onto the bench, still a formless blob.

However, with some expert massaging from your mystery helper, your squishy body was coaxed to regrow back into it’s normal shape in record time, and a minute later you were back to normal. Brushing yourself off and lamenting your now dirt-stained and rumpled clothing, you faced your helper.

“Thanks so much, man. You’re a life saver.” You said, appreciatively. Your helper was a tiny, like you, who appeared to be a few years older than you. He had short, black hair and brown eyes.

“No problem. The name’s Zayn.” The boy clarified, striking a confident pose. He jabbed his thumb over towards Melissa. “Is this your mom?”

“Yeah, that’s my mom.” You nodded. “I asked her to let me be more independent. Unfortunately, that meant she wanted me to free myself from the bottom of her shoe. Guess it’s hard for a giantess like her to realize how impossible escaping from certain situations can be as a tiny.”

“Tell me about it.” Zayn laughed, with a hint of pity in his voice. “You could’ve been stuck there for days, smeared so badly into the treads of her shoe that it’d take a scalpel to pry you free. You’re lucky I happened to be here.”

“Actually, why are you here? Just getting some fresh air?” You inquired.

Zayn shook his head. “Trying to hide from someone, actually. My dormmate, June. Truthfully, I nearly got pancaked beneath your mom’s butt, but I dove out of the way in time.”

You frowned. “Wait, hiding from your dormmate? Why?”

Zayn winced. “Let’s just say she’s…a bit clingy. Or, maybe ‘obsessed’ is the better word. The girl’s got crazy attachment issues, and I’m not super comfortable with how close she’s trying to get with me.”

“Sounds rough.”

“Tell me about it.” Zayn shrugged. “June’s a total hottie, but I’m not into crazy. She pushes quite a few boundaries, and I feel like I might never see the outside world again if I really let her get her hand’s on me. She’s a love-crazy psycho who cares a BIT too much about tinies.”

Before you could continue your conversation any further, you noticed a girl approaching the bench from a few yards away. She was tall, with hair flowing down past her shoulders dyed bright pink. A loose-fitting crop top drew stares from all across campus to her impressively jiggly rack, and booty shorts that practically seemed painted on were straining against her large butt. Her bare, lean stomach, alluring thighs, and cute feet clad in pink flip-flops were nothing to sneeze at either.

While you shamefully ogled the approaching girl, Zayn’s eyes widened in terror. “Oh shit, she’s coming! June’s coming! Dude, we’ve gotta run!”

You balked at his terror. “Run? Run where?”

Ignoring you, Zayn leapt from the side of the bench in one bold maneuver, hitting the ground down below. His legs impacted from the fall, and he frantically tried to reform his squished limbs. June approached even further and made eye contact with your mother. Recognizing that she was hogging the whole bench, Melissa gave June a hearty smile and moved her legs, sliding her feet back onto the ground.

Zayn could only scream as his fool-hardy plan crumbled to pieces. Melissa’s shoe, the same he had just freed you from, crashed down onto the ground, slamming him flat and burying him into the dirt. Instantaneously, his body crumpled up into a blob, squeezed between the grooves of the sole of the sneaker. He mentally whimpered, unable to so much as move a muscle.

Up on the bench, you sprinted like mad and dove out of the way right as June plopped into the now-vacant seat. Her gigantic ass clapped against the bench as she sat, sending reverberations through her flesh. The towering pink-haired giantess began twirling a strand of her hair nervously and chewing on her lip in an irresistibly attractive way. Tear stains stained her cheeks.

Noticing someone in distress, your mother gazed at her warmly. “What’s the matter dear?”

June shuddered, holding back a sob. “I…l-lost someone. Someone I l-love…a lot, and I c-can't find him...a-anywhere!”

Melissa, ever the affectionate mother-figure, slid across the bench to be closer to June, and it was at this moment where your critical mistake dawned on you. Instead of running to June’s right side and ending up on the edge of the bench, you had run to her left and were now trapped between the two massive women on the bench, with no time to rectify this mistake by jumping off like Zayn did.

Feebly holding up your arms in weak defense, your mother’s thick thigh slammed into you, dragged you backwards, and collided with June’s equally huge and fleshy thigh. The two giantesses’ thighs pulverized you flat instantly, your tiny body squished like a bug between the infallible walls of flesh. You couldn’t even twitch, let alone speak. Mentally, you groaned in frustration.

Melissa draped her arms around June, who proceeded to cry for nearly ten minutes. Your mother held her dutifully the entire time, and finally June showed signs of improving. Giving your mother a brilliantly innocent smile, and drying her tears, June was finally feeling better. Unexplainably happy at the success of her mothering, Melissa stood up, bid June farewell, and walked away.

Thankfully, due to June’s thighs being bare from her micro booty shorts, you had stuck to her thigh for a moment after your mother stood up. This left you to fall freely onto the bench a moment later, though you could still only watch in helpless pity as Melissa walked onto the next display, knowing full well the torment she was putting poor Zayn through.

Once you reformed, you realized you had no idea what you were even supposed to do in this situation. Zayn, the tiny who had selflessly helped you free, was now stuck in your same place. Your mother, oblivious to all of this, had way too big of a head start for you to catch up to her. And, a girl Zayn claimed was obsessively love-crazed with tinies was sitting on the bench mere inches from you. Truthfully, she didn’t SEEM so bad, and she could probably help you rescue Zayn. Probably…

What do you decide to do?
143.title: Rescued by Zayn

choices: "We usually cuddle for hours and hours in my room!" How will Katie get involved?
"Now I have Volleyball!" Do you join June or sit with Katie on the sidelines?
"Thomas has been motivating me to get in better shape!" Trip to the Gym?
1431.content:
You looked out off the bench into the courtyard and saw your mother happily walking off into the crowd of student body stands and sighed knowing at your size you had practically no hope of reaching her on your own without ending up squashed yourself. Seeing Melissa's booty sway with every step she took away from you, you thought about all that heavy weight bearing down on your new friend. Feeling the guilt build up over you, the motivation boiled up inside as you knew you had to repay Zayn for saving you earlier no matter what it took. With that pledge, you turned to your right to see the skyscraper of a girl, June, sitting hunched over with a solid pout as she clasped her chin in her two hands. She clearly still seemed pretty bummed out that Zayn had ditched her on this special day, but you had to get her attention if you had any hope of rescuing him. Putting Zayn's warnings aside, you reached out, pushing into her thigh in an attempt to get her to notice you.

"That jerk...he doesn't know what he's missing! Any guy would be happy to date me, I don't know why he's such a--" June's monologue was interrupted as she felt a light tap on her thigh. Peering down, June's large eyes met with yours, and you watched as her frown instantly warped into a bright smile. "Excuse me, miss-" Before you could get another word out, June's hand had swooped down as she pinched you up in her thumb and forefinger and dangled you right in front of her shining face. "Oh, my, god! A tiny! Who are you little guy?" You stammered over your words as you felt yourself being so closely watched while danging over this beautiful girls jiggly chest. "U-uh Thomas...my name's Thomas...Listen I-" Interrupted again June squealed in delight before you felt your body lurch forwards into her plump, pink lips. "You, *smack* Are *smack* Just *smack* The *smack* Cutest!" June boomed into your face as you were smothered into her moist lips."Pleased to meet you, Thomas! I'm June!!" she exclaimed a little too perkily before she winked and flashed a peace sign.

This girl really was the definition of bouncy as she was clearly wound up with too much energy from discovery of you. Wiping some of your newly soaked hair out of your eyes, you tried to hastily catch your breath before replying, "Umm thanks...Listen, June, I really need your help with something..." June's face instantly changed as her eyebrows tilted up and her bottom lip jutted out in concern. "What is it, my tiny cutie?" Ignoring June's constant advances, you proceeded, "That woman you were just talking to, that was actually my mom! I really need to get back to her somehow, do you think you could take me to her?" Hearing your request, you watched as June's eyes slowly clouded and she hunched her shoulders. "Take you to her...? Why? Don't you want to spend time with me?" Feeling the energy totally change, you quickly splayed your arms out and retorted, "Well, yea! Of course I do! It's just...I really need to get back to her right now to help a friend with something." You figured it would be best to leave out Zayn as you didn't want to get him in any more trouble considering the lengths he seemed willing to go to get away from June in the first place. June seemed mildly uplifted by your words as a bit of her pep sprung back into her before a sly grin crept over her lips. "Okay, little guy, I'll take you to your mom. On one condition of course." June said sticking her tongue out at you playfully. You gulped, of course there was always a catch. "My mom is here for Family Day and I told her I'd introduce her to my boyfriend!" June nervously chuckled as she looked to her side and continued, "Only problem is...I kind of...don't have one..." You thought you knew where this was going unfortunately. Catching you off guard again, June swooped you against her lips before holding you up in her arms in front of her. "That's where a cutie like you comes in! If you'll be my boyfriend and do as I say I'll be more than happy to take you back to your mom later! Whaddya say, little guy?!"

June's eyes sparkled expectantly as she held you in front of her. You had no idea how to respond to such an insane presumption. On the one hand, this girl was incredibly cute and had an amazing body. She seemed incredibly caring and affectionate but you figured that may be to a fault. You honestly might have struck the jack pot here yourself, the opportunity to get a smoking girlfriend and she'd take you to your mother to rescue Zayn. Still, the nagging words of Zayn rang in your head with his warning of June being obsessively attached. However, filled with determination to help your friend, you knew you only had one answer. "Of course I'll be your boyfriend, at least while your mom is here!" June shrieked in delight at your acceptance and immediately started nuzzling you into her soft, rosy cheek. "Oh thank you, thank you, thank you, thank you, Thomas! You're going to love my mom; she loves tinies too!" You were totally dizzy by June's energetic movements and barrage of cuddles and kisses and simply mumbled out a "Great...can't wait...". Not wanting to waste another second, June slipped you down into her cleavage gazing down at you affectionately before she skipped off towards where her mom was waiting for her.

June's skipping totally boggled your world as her massive breasts heaved up and down with each step. It was a particularly hot day and soon you felt a light sheen of sweat surrounding you, threatening to slip you out of June's breasts onto the harsh sidewalk below. This was nothing however since as soon as June met eyes with her mom, she jumped onto her grabbing her in a tight bear hug. You felt the life squeezed out of you as her mother's equally if not more impressive chest collided with June's, pressing you flat as could be. Giving her mother an affectionate kiss on the cheek, June withdrew from her mom as they quickly caught up. "I can't wait to introduce you to my boyfriend, Mom! He is the cutest little guy you've ever seen!" June beamed proudly at her mother before her mom responded, "Well where is he? I'd love to meet him!" June reached down in between her boobs only to quizzically feel nothing. Glancing up at her mother, June quickly spotted your legs dangling out of her mother's own cleavage instead. "Looks like he likes you already, Mom!" Retrieving you from her mother, you finally saw some light and got a first look at June's mother. "Thomas, this is my Mom, Katie" Just a couple inches taller than June, her mother looked just like her. A delicate face looked down at you warmly as you saw where you had just been retrieved from. Katie was clad in a maroon sports bra that left her lean stomach exposed, a gray pair of spandex leggings that hugged her hips in all the right places before stretching to conform to her juicy thighs, and a fresh pair of bright red converse. 'So this is where June gets her modesty from,' you thought sarcastically. Brushing a strand of her light brown hair behind her ear, Katie bent over, hovering an eye close up to your tiny form. A number of "Oooooo's and wooow's escaped her lips knocking you over and hazing you in her steamy mint breath.

"You weren't kidding he really is a cutie!" Katie spoke right in your face before you saw her eyes close and her lips pucker up as she leaned in to kiss you atop June's palm. June quickly bunched her hand into a fist withdrawing you with a spin before scolding, "Mom! You're embarrassing me!" Katie crossed her arms and quickly retorted, "I was only saying hello! Hmmmph, you never let me have any fun!" with a pout. You were honestly befuddled at the dynamic unfolding here as it seemed June and her mother were equally childish and full of energy. Unfolding her fingers, you lay mushed in June's palm as Katie looked down at you sympathetically. "Sheesh, he really looks crushed, is he going to be alright?" Taking a second to reform you soon popped right back up in June's hand. "Yup! My little Tommy always pops right back! He even told me once he likes to get squished as long as it's by a beautiful woman!" Your eyes went wide at this blatant lie as Katie soon purred along, "Mmm wow, is that true, Thomas?" You looked behind you in disbelief only to see June's stern expression nodding yes enthusiastically. You gulped, realizing the situation you were trapped in and realized you needed to stay on crazy June's good side no matter what. Your face burning with embarrassment, you responded "Uhhh, yea, just being around a couple of beautiful girls like you is heaven for me!" You tried your best to suck up to Katie, hoping it would pay off at some point down the line. You winced as both girls yelped at your response, both bending over in sync before smothering you in their lips embrace. You were totally helpless as both girls locked lips around your tiny form, pushing you back and forth against their moist, pillowy mounds. At the end of the passionate kiss, you felt yourself sucked from both angles only to be claimed by one of the girl's mouth's. Withdrawing, Katie looked at June's palm only to see it empty. "Awwww, where'd he go?" Giggling commenced as June spotted you flattened to her mother's bottom lip, moving comically with every word Katie spoke. "Check your lip, Mom!" June exclaimed before you felt a hot tongue roll out of Katie's mouth slathering you in it's wet embrace and coating you in her sweet saliva. Katie blushed apologetically removing you from her plump lip and returning you to June's care before whispering, "Well, at least he said it's like heaven to him..."

Moving on after the rough introduction you had with the two girls, Katie and June caught up on all the latest school drama. You lay patiently in June's hand while she stroked your hair with a free finger, enjoying some casual talk with her mom. "So honey, what's on the agenda on a day like today? I want to experience how you and Thomas spend a regular day!"

"Well..."
1431.title: The Start of a Wild and Dangerous Relationship

choices: "I think I need my good luck charm if we're going to win this one!"
"Why don't you take him over to the concessions, they have lots of good stuff!"
14312.content:
"Actually I have a volleyball game today! We're facing our school's rival, you don't want to miss it!" June belted out enthusiastically. Checking the time, June suddenly gasped, "Oh gosh, we're going to be late at this rate!" Depositing you back into her cleavage, June and Katie hurried off to the schools gymnasium. You jostled along with June's pace, trying to just hold yourself in place for dear life as she bounced along.

Soon enough the two girls entered into the basketball court, equipped with large bleachers and set up with a typical volleyball net separating the two sides of the court. You immediately noticed the entire girl's volleyball team was already present, along with their opponents, as both sides were stretching themselves out and warming up. "Well, that's my cue!" June waved bye to her mother as she began to set off towards the team's locker room to change into her uniform and sneakers. "Wait, June! You can't bring Thomas into the girl's room!" Katie comically called after her causing June to suddenly halt her march. Peering down at your frazzled form between her boobs, June pinched you out in her thumb and forefinger before dangling you in her large eyes view. "Oh, yea...Sorry you little pervert, only girl's allowed from this point on. But I really don't want to leave you either..." June kissed you sadly pondering what to do with her tiny boy toy while she had to focus on crushing Middletown's rival. "Well, what do you usually do with him when you have a game?" Katie asked, confused as to how June hadn't dealt with this problem before since you two had apparently been dating for a while.

Thinking of a lie quickly on the spot, June proved her resourcefulness as she explained, "Well, usually I find a place to wear him on me since he can't bear to be apart from me for even a few hours. When he wants to watch the game, he makes an excellent hair scrunchy," tossing her long pink hair back elegantly causing a wave of her sweet scent to splay around you, June continued, "But on games I need to focus hard on I tuck him somewhere on me I know I can't lose him so I don't have to worry about him falling out and getting stepped on!" Katie's eyes went wide in fascinated wonder, in awe of her daughter's smart and adorable relationship habits. June continued, "I really do think of him as the team's own little good luck charm, but since you're here today I don't mind him just being a tiny cheerleader instead!"

Giving you a goodbye kiss, June pressed you passionately into her lips, squeezing out a huge "Muah!" Handing you over to her mother, June shouted "Bye, baby! Be good! Bye, Mom! Wish me luck!" as she zoomed her way into the locker room to change. Smiling down at you affectionately, Katie stroked your head calmly before saying, "Why don't we find some seats?" You flashed her a confident thumbs up, elated you weren't spending the game living out June's dangerous lie. Squeezing you tightly in her hand, Katie began walking towards the bleachers, swaying her arms at her sides. She clearly wasn't as well-versed on how to handle tinies as you flew through the air in her mildly overzealous grip just from her casually walking. Finding a suitable spot with a good view, Katie plopped her rear end down onto the hard wooden bleacher before depositing you on her shoulder, making sure you could easily talk to her while also getting an equally great view of the court. You grabbed a few strands of her silky brown hair for safety before getting comfortable sitting on the giantess's warm skin.

You couldn't help but ogle the volleyball players, all clad in tight micro spandex shorts as they stretched their eager muscles in prep for the exciting match they had ahead of them. You even spotted Chelsea among the players, pointing her out as your good friend to Katie who raised an eyebrow at you in clear jealous suspicion for her daughter's sake. You quickly splayed your arms out correcting the misunderstanding, stating she was really more of just your dorm mate than anything she was thinking. Suddenly, bursting from the locker room energetically, June skipped out onto the court. Wearing long knee high hot pink socks with two white stripes and neon pink sneakers, June easily stuck out from the rest of the team, making her easy to spot. June pranced out onto the court quickly taking the center of attention which she was more than happy to have. Spotting you, June slyly blew you a kiss before winking and joining the rest of the team in their warm up routine. Katie snickered seeing you become flustered at the public display and laughed openly when she spotted you staring at her daughter's tight butt as she bent over to stretch her hamstrings by touching her toes.

"There's no reason to be embarrassed, sweetheart! I used to get the same looks when I was as pretty as her..." Katie sighed, a light frown staining her face. She looked at you from the corner of her eye, waiting to see if you'd take the bait. You were too busy drooling over the gorgeous college girls and absentmindedly scoffed, replying "What are you talking about? The resemblance between you two is uncanny! You look just as great as June does!" Blushing a deep beet red, you didn't realize your accidentally flirtatious mistake until Katie mumbled out, "Oh, Thomas...you shouldn't tease me like that unless you wanted to be toyed with back~!" You winced, covering your face as Katie leaned over, ready to smother you in a deep, wet kiss before the alarm suddenly sounded and she turned away shouting, "Oooo, the games starting!" You sighed, acknowledging the close call before also turning to watch the game.

The game was honestly enjoyable to watch, and not just for the eye candy. Besides needing to hold on for dear life, thanks to Katie's constant excited jumps at close calls, you enjoyed watching the fierce rival teams battle it out. The first quarter went on without a hitch as Katie got quite into cheering passionately for June, who was seemingly the team's star player thanks to her stellar teamwork with Chelsea. Making small talk about the sets, you and Katie seemed to be bonding over the tense game, united under Middletown pride.

It was only during the second quarter that things took a turn for the worse as the rival school took the lead. On a set that would tie up the game, June made a risky dive, causing her Mom to shoot up to get a better look, fully engrossed in the game. You also, were totally absorbed at watching the volley, and didn't expect such a sudden shift underneath your feet. Losing your balance, you held on for dear life as you swung by Katie's hair for dear life. Unfortunately, due to the slickness of the silky brown hair, your grip quickly gave out and you slid down Katie's back before landing in a heap on the warm bleacher cast in the large shadow of her booty as it hung above you ominously. Cheering as June tied up the game, Katie happily let herself fall back onto the bleacher, her ass crashing down onto you flattening you in it's warm embrace as Katie wiggled herself into place to get comfy. "Did you see that play, Thomas! My daughter's a little superstar!" Looking over to her right to get your response, Katie stared with confusion at her empty shoulder before looking all around the bleachers for you. "Thomas? Where'd you go, sweetie?" Struck with a slight tinge of worry at losing her little man, Katie suddenly remembered the light tug she felt on her hair as she stood up. Slowly connecting the dots, a naughty smile soon crept onto Katie's face as she rolled slightly to the right, checking under her for her missing tiny.

"Well I've got to give you credit, Tom. You saw your chance and you took it! You almost got away with it too! But you seriously didn't need such a silly distraction just to get a little closer to me, honey! Next time, all you have to do is ask!" You let out a whimper as Katie flashed you a wink before rolling back over, burying you under her jiggly butt in satisfaction. Giggling to herself at your perverse nature, Katie felt particularly sharp for uncovering your lewd scheme. Unaware you were really screaming out for any kind of savior, Katie resigned to just let you be and return to enjoying the match in front of her.

Realizing you were missing out on the game you seemed to have been enjoying, Katie had another bright idea to take a few photos for you to enjoy later. Snapping some great shots of June and Chelsea working together to fight the enemy team, Katie got super into taking photos, bouncing in her seat joyously whenever she got a particularly great pic. Wanting to truly capture this day in her memory, Katie wanted to somehow secure a photo of you enjoying yourself too. You shouted out for mercy as each bounce pummeled you more and more into Katie's gray spandex. Thinking your cries were felt and being answered, you felt Katie stand up and you smiled at the idea you would finally be saved! Angling her camera just right, Katie swooped her phone to her backside capturing you and her beaming face into one selfie.

*Click*

You heard a shutter sound go off from Katie's smart phone as she laughed and planted herself back down. You silently sobbed wondering why this giantess was playing with you so carelessly. Admiring her picture, Katie hit save on her latest pic, zooming in on your speck of a body to see your smiling face. 'Wow, June wasn't kidding, Thomas really is a unique tiny that enjoys being flattened.' Katie blushed to herself grinding her ass as deeply as she could into the bleacher hoping to prove to you she could be as much fun as her daughter was

The halftime buzzer rang out, prompting Katie to stand and run down to the court to hug her sweaty daughter. "You're doing great, sweetie! I'm so proud of you!!" June sighed, "We're losing right now, Mom..." Embracing her daughter, June looked over her mom's shoulder to see you dangling off the woman's swinging rear end. "Is that, Thomas? Mom..."
14312.title: Giving Encouragement to the Wrong Girl

choices: Katie wants to treat the team to some sweet victory ice cream!
June wants to test the limits of your luck, challenging her mom to some games!
143121.content:
Taking a glance at the score board, June frowned seeing her team had sunk behind. Walking up to her mother, who had been chatting with the team coach, June tapped her on the shoulder causing Katie to spin around, enveloping June in a monstrous bear hug. "Oh sweetie! You're doing so great! And you look amazing out there too!!" Wiggling out of her mother's grasp June tossed her hair over her shoulder before planting her hands on her hips striking a confident pose. "Oh yeah, I know I do! But no matter how gorgeous I look that still doesn't mean we aren't losing..." Seeing her child take such a sad face, Katie couldn't help but reembrace her, not minding getting her own daughter's sweat all over her if it meant cheering her up! "Mom! You're embarrassing me..." June mumbled quietly looking down to avoid making eye contact with any of the other snickering players. It was only then June spotted your tan form sticking out like a stain against her mom's gray spandex clad ass.

"Uhhh Mom, is that Thomas?" June easily knew the answer already but wanted to hear her mother's explanation for smothering her 'boyfriend' under her curvy bottom. Turning around, Katie faced her backside to her daughter, looking over her shoulder at you and explaining, "Yea...I think he got a little...you know, frustrated watching you out there and not being able to be with you. You were right, June, the little guy really is incredibly needy I mean seriously, look at this cute pic we took together!" Katie drew her phone from her bra, quickly pulling up the photo of you plastered against her monolithic booty with an expression of pure ecstasy. "I think if you look zoom close enough you can see him drooling!" Katie joked roaring in laughter. June couldn't help but agree with her mom's goofy claim, thinking, 'Wait? He really does like being squished? Gosh, I am like, the luckiest girl in the world stumbling upon a unique guy like him!' Katie's torturous laughter overhead shook you wildly as it caused her jello-like ass to wash little shockwaves across you.

June laughed watching you move with every twitch of Katie's butt, before she gasped, struck with a harsh superstitious idea. "Oh no! No wonder we're losing! You've been taking all his luck for yourself, Mom!" Katie blushed, "Well I certainly do feel like I've gotten lucky..." she whispered stroking her ass, trying to give you an affectionate rub. "Mom! I think I'm going to need him back if we're going to win this game!" Katie pouted, looking down at you while she continued stroking you with her soft hand. "Aw c'mon! Look how much fun he's having! Maybe it's best if we just leave him be!" June's beautiful face in your vision soon turned to a blur as you were thrown about wildly, instantly feeling the motion sickness as Katie threw you for a loop. Your captor shook her ass for emphasis, trying to display how much you were enjoying riding her plump booty since you weren't coming off; somehow under the impression you were holding on rather than being completely stuck into the very fibers of her pants. Despite your best efforts to reform, you couldn't budge an inch as you remained stuck to the bubbly, supportive mother. "See? Are you sure you need him??" Katie argued before June simply rolled her eyes replying, "Yea, I'm sure, Mom," as she tugged you free from her mom's carnivorous crack.

Katie stamped her foot, clearly expressing disappointment at losing her supposedly adoring fan. June winked at you secretly, making you flustered as the gorgeous girl flirted so casually, while she addressed the tantrum. "Don't fret, you'll see him right after the game!" Katie perked back up hearing this, content with making up for lost time with you later. You gulped, praying later would never come not even realizing the extreme danger you were in right now as Katie asked, "So, where do you put a tiny guy when you need to squeeze the most luck out of him?" June tilted a finger against her chin as she wondered, only able to respond, "The most luck? Hmmm, you know I can't decide!" as her heart skipped a beat thinking of all the possibilities she had to get you close to her. Placing you atop her head cutely, June sat onto a nearby bleacher, needing to retie her shoes since she had to hastily put them on earlier in fear of being late. You grabbed on for dear life as the luscious pink forest threatened to swallow you completely; The light smell of sweat that coated her being hugely overridden by the sweet fragrance in her hair that drowned you in it's angelic, sugary scent.

"Do you really need to take those off, dear? I love you but I know how stinky your feet get after working up a sweat," Katie commented plugging her nose as she caught a whiff of the athlete's feet, waving her hand in front of her face mockingly. You were practically in heaven atop the beautiful giantess removing her shoes, ignoring the teasing as she explained to her mom, "Well ya see, I've been being bothered by this tiny hole in the insole. It keeps distracting me out on the court..." June bent her head over hovering one eye into the shoe trying to peer inside the neon pink sneaker to address the problem. Katie lamented, "Well I'm not surprised they're beginning to fall apart, I bought you those shoes way back when you were in high school when you started your little workout kick! And then when that faded out you just wore them as walking shoes everyday; which I don't blame you for of course, they are mighty cute!" June simply sighed, retorting back "Yea, yea, I know they're old but they're just so damn comfy being so broken in and all. Except for this, damn--broken--insole!" June huffed realizing the hopeless situation she was in as she continued to inspect the sole. Peering down even closer, June's sudden head tilt caused you to be flung from grace out of her hair and down spiraling below!

You grabbed your head, shaking off the horrible impact you suffered before looking around where you had landed. Trying to catch your breath, you choked against the noxious humidity as it threatened to strangle you completely. Only a dim amount of light surrounded you, allowing you to faintly make out the distinct crater that was June's footprint beneath you! You saw the formerly white insole, now a deep dark gray June had slowly stained over the years, decorated with the black imprint that was a perfect replica of June's sole. Besides the ominous surroundings, far more prevalent was the toxic atmosphere, filled with a dense fog of fresh perspiration June had filled it with in just the first half of her performance, attacking you and your senses with it's overwhelming odor. You attempted to step towards the light opening at the heel of the shoe, your feet sinking into the heavily dampened fabric mesh below.

Coming to grips with the fact there was nothing she could do in the short time she had, June sighed letting her shoes topple down onto the floor carelessly, shaking you inside even deeper into the rank shoe. Katie, being the only witness to your downfall, snickered away before mentioning to her daughter, "Looks like your biggest fan has an idea for how you can get the luck out of him!" Raising an eyebrow in confusion, Katie elaborated for June by pointing down at the discarded sneakers. Looking down quizzically, June just barely made out your tan form sticking out against the dark insole she had been complaining about. You made out June's bright smile before you heard her boom out, "Aww that's my, Tommy! Always there to cheer me up and keep me going! I don't know what I'd do without him!" Her foot soon blocked out her pretty face and all the light; You witnessed the horrific sight of the bottom of June's sock as she squeezed her foot back into the shoe. Your screams for help were drowned out by the bustle of the gym as you watched her wiggling toes strain against the faded, dingy pink fabric before steam rolling over you, flattening you down into a small hole below and raining fresh sweat all over you. Tightening her laces properly, June hopped up from the bench, stomping down each foot a few times to make sure they were fit nice and snug.

Feeling her former insole problem had vanished, June hopped up and down on her toes energetically, a fresh wave of enthusiasm for winning washing over her psyche. "My luck already seems to be turning!" June shouted crediting your sacrifice to mere fate. You, on the other hand felt nothing other than a tidal wave of sweat pour over you as each jump expunged old and new sweat from her knee socks and battered insole. Choking against the foul liquid, you accidentally swallowed buckets of it crying out while the blissfully unaware of your suffering June simply skipped her way back onto the court for the third quarter. Shaking her head and rolling her eyes, Katie watched June run off, thinking to herself as she sat back on the bleachers, 'I don't know how the little dude can stand it, I was gagging from a few feet away! He really is a strangly resilient fellow!"

You lay motionless, pinned under the vast sole of the peppy athlete. June, being the team's star player, needed to play the rest of the game and wanted to impress you with her slick skills, demonstrating all her smoothest dives and highest spikes. Not feeling your meek protests through her thick socks, June occasionally purred imagining you fawning over her after she wins the game for Middletown! Racking up tons of points, June played even better than earlier, sweeping the competition with her ferocious play! Each minor step and jump flattened you further into the hell below, as you sobbed feeling June begin to sweat through her socks, fresh sweat streaming down her stomach and toned thighs either into her shoes or with a drip onto the gym floor.

Hitting the point lead needed to win, June and the rest of the team shrieked out in victory, all running into a mass victory huddle with you buried at the bottom of the spread of college girl's shoes.

Later...
143121.title: June's Secret Weapon

choices: June! Seeing you horribly beat up, she decides to nurse you back to health!
Melissa! Possibly unaware she now has two squished boys under her dirty soles!
1431211.content:
You felt your face rubbed against the coarse fabric of June's knee socks as she bounced around happily high fiving all of her team mates. Suffering in the hazardous sauna of steamy foot sweat, you wondered when June would get a chance to remove you from her stinky sneaker. June quickly chugged down a water bottle before she spotted Chelsea running up to her from across the court. Chelsea jumped into June's arms in a victory hug exclaiming, "You were amazing out there, June! Looks like all our long nights of practicing finally paid off since we got to show those jerks who's boss!". Chelsea boasted while pointing mockingly to the departing rival team. "Yea, maybe that was it but I feel like I just got lucky..." June humbly replied while scrunching her toes against her insole, attempting to affectionately pet you but only succeeding in squeezing some loose sweat out of her socks into your face.

Katie soon joined in as well, hugging Chelsea and June up into a monstrous bear hug. "Oh my god! You two were incredible out there!" Wiggling free from the overly affectionate mom super-fan, Chelsea and June smirked at each other proudly accepting the praise. "Really, it was nothing! Your daughters the real star of this show! I mean seriously, she was so on fire she was sweating buckets out there!" Chelsea joked as she saw June wringing out her headband, letting a waterfall of sweat drip between their shoes. "Hey!" June yelped, becoming flush with embarrassment, "You aren't exactly dry over there! You could've secured us the victory by taking off your shoes and sending the enemy team running!" June retorted elbowing Chelsea jokingly in her side. "Don't go making fun of my feet, June! Yours almost sweat so much they had to put up a wet floor sign on the court!" The girls all erupted in laughter as they prodded each other with depreciating jokes, all in the spirit of good fun.

"Well I think you both look picture perfect!" Katie said taking a quick candid photo before smiling and yelling to the team, "Why don't we all go get some ice cream, my treat!" The team responded a resounding yes with cheers before all setting off towards the campus's ice cream shop. You were forced to join them, underfoot, as the tired college girls all paraded across campus basking in their victory. Walking into the shop, June took a seat at a table, content with letting her teammates pick their flavors first. You were shaken wildly as the glistening girl crossed her legs, bouncing your prison in the air playfully along with a light tune playing in the shop.

Seeing her last teammate get her ice cream and exit the shop, June went up to the counter and got her cupful before resting it down on the table with a voraciously eating Katie. In between large bites of some chocolaty mess of ice cream, Katie soon mentioned, "Hey honey, don't you think Thomas would like some ice cream? It would probably be a good way for him to cool down after baking in that steam room you call a shoe!". June realized her mother was right and excused herself to the girl's room of the store.

Sitting on the closed lid of the toilet, June unlaced her tight sneakers, tugging them off with a light pop. Hit with a hot wave of her own foot stink, June held her breath while she peered into her shoe. Letting her sole rest back on the ground, you winced as you were smeared under June's heavy foot into the bathroom floor. Not seeing you inside the muggy cavern, June flipped up her foot to see the underside of her pink sock, marked with a dark sweaty imprint of her heel and toes. "Oh, there you are, baby!" June wiggled her toes causing you to flow along with the damp fabric underneath while she giggled at her silly flattened boyfriend.

Peeling you off the grungy sock, June carried you over to the sink, where she ran you under the warm water while keeping you tucked in her warm hands. Retrieving some soap from the dispenser, June gently began kneading you in her embrace while telling you all about her performance and how grateful she was to have a considerate boyfriend like you. Popping back into your normal shape, you interrupted June saying, "Listen, June...I didn't really go into your shoe on pur-" before she cut you back off continuing, "I'm just so happy to have a little guy like you in my life! You are seriously the kindest, most heart-warming, not to mention cute, little guy I have ever met!" June peppered you in a flurry of wet kisses before she gazed down at you curiously. "You were saying?" You looked into June's deep eyes as they shined lovingly down at you. It seemed June really believed you went into her shoe on purpose. Falling victim to this cute pink-haired giantess's innocent charm, you began to think that chastising her wasn't going to get you anywhere closer to your goal. If anything, you should want her to believe you suffered if it meant making her go easy on you in the future. Seeing her warm smile beaming at you, you meekly mumbled out, "It was no problem, my pleasure really..."

June squealed hearing your mini confession, "Oh that's so sweet! Bad little boyfriend's don't get ice cream, you must've heard that didn't you?" June joked waging her finger in your face. "But you're June's good little boy, aren't you Thomas?" June brought you up to her face nuzzling you against her nose in some giant form of eskimo kissing. Bringing you back out to the tables, June noted Katie had gone up to the counter to harass the server for seconds or maybe thirds leaving her alone with you for a bit longer. Pulling her cup closer, June dropped you in to the creamy treat before you could even protest.

You slid down the frozen scoop before seeing the strange color of the ice cream. "Bubblegum!!" June boomed out at you, somehow reading your mind. "Do you know why it's my favorite flavor?" June asked looking at you expectantly. "Because you...like...it?" You feebly guessed before June mocked a wrong answer buzzer. "Wrong! Because it's my favorite color, DUH!" June corrected as she swished her pink hair behind her shoulder laughing at your awful guess. Stifling her mocking laughter, June began spooning up the sweet treat into her mouth and you figured you would dig in as well. June was careful to give you space, not wanting to accidentally swallow her little lover.

Katie soon came back with a hefty additional two scoops, this time of mint chip, before she made light discussion with her daughter about the game in between guzzling down mouthfuls of her tasty treat. Feeling her fluids catching up with her, June excused herself leaving you with just a tiny glob of ice cream left to finish off. "Look after, Thomas, will you Mom?" June zipped out while Katie only mumbled a "Yea, yea, no problem" ignoring her daughters request as she focused on scooping up another large bite, drooling over it's tantalizing flavor.

Before she knew it, Katie had polished off her third cup and longingly gazed at the wall of flavors. Not wanting to embarrass herself by asking for yet another scoop, Katie huffed before crossing her arms discontently at the table. Seeing a tiny bit left in June's, Katie's eyes lit up as she thought to herself, 'I'm sure she was done with hers...I shouldn't let it go to waste!'

Feeling your cup lurch suddenly, you looked up only to be met with the sight of Katie's huge chest and her face drooling hungrily at you. Trying to run, you instantly slipped in the melted goo causing you to faceplant into what was left. Your body practically coated in the pink cream, Katie didn't see you at all as she spooned you and the remaining ice cream up in one swoop. Hanging you in front of her huge face, all you saw were Katie's plump lips as she licked them excitedly before she parted them and plunged you inside the dark cavern. You immediately were tossed about Katie's hot mouth as her tongue rolled you around, savoring your bubblegum flavor. "KATTTIEEEE!" You called but you were drowned out by Katie's pleasured moans as she squeezed the ice cream off of you, pushing you into the roof of her mouth and coating you in a thick layer of her sweet saliva.

Feeling some kind of object in her ice cream, Katie tossed it around her mouth trying to feel out what it was. She noted is was certainly very sweet with the bubblegum flavor and also soft as could be. Pushing you onto her back teeth, Katie chomped down onto it crudely, and upon feeling it easily squish, Katie smiled, immediately knowing what it was. "Oh! They even put tiny pieces of bubblegum into this flavor! That sure is a neat touch!" Katie boomed in your face as she smacked away happily. You tried to call for help or even just squirm to show her you weren't just a piece of gum, but nothing you could do was going to get past Katie's fervorous chewing. Thinking you were still stranded in June's shoe, Katie was blissfully unaware she was torturing you between her teeth as she picked up her and June's trash and tossed it away into the garbage bin.

June skipped out of the restroom only to find her mother standing by the door. "I got our trash, dear, let's go!" Katie mentioned, waltzing out of the shop contently. June figured you were in her mom's pocket or something so she followed her mom obediently and exited the shop without a second thought. The two girls enjoyed the warm suns glow on their skin as they walked across campus, satisfied with their tasty snack. Katie smacked you exuberantly as she walked, merely enjoying the soft squish between her teeth as she chatted with her daughter about her work.

Ten minutes later, you felt the grinding chews stop as you were probed more and more by Katie's curious tongue. Sucking any remaining flavor from you, Katie decided to spit you from her mouth, sending you flying before landing on the hot pavement baking in the sun. You were only left to dry for a moment however, as soon the sun was blocked out by the dirty tread of a woman's sneaker!

Who has stepped on you?
1431211.title: Treating the Team and Becoming a Treat

choices: Continue
14313.content:
"On a day like today, after classes, Thomas has been motivating me to get into the gym more!" June looked down at you with a playful wink before Katie responded to her, "Well by all means don't let me interrupt your routine! I think it would be a good idea to check out the gym facilities this school has anyways, maybe I could even join you two!". June gave her mother a soft smile, "The more the merrier I say; I've got my own locker there with a change of clothes so we can head over there right now!" June said before the girls began walking their way across campus with you bouncing along in June's hand.

You started to sweat nervously, the last thing you wanted was to join these two bubbly women in a gym full of other energized giantesses. Not that watching them exercise didn't seem incredibly tantalizing but you just knew from experience how you and a gym did not mix. You also had no idea what your role would be in 'motivating' these two but it seems Katie had the same thought as she asked the two of you, "So how exactly does the little guy support you in working out harder?" June quickly began giggling before raising a finger in explanation, "Oh there's many ways! My favorite reason is it's more time to spend together! But also since I get all dirty and stinky he lets us shower together after the workout..." June and Katie both went blush imagining getting to shower with their own little tiny and you caught Katie sneaking a yearning and jealous glance towards you while biting her lip seductively. You yourself suddenly weren't feeling too bad about any of this and started getting excited at the prospect of showering with this bombshell of a 'lover' of yours. That was until Katie purred out, "Wowwww, anything else??" and June went into a deep hmm in thought. Thinking of something she'd consider a reward, June felt the light bulb go off as she belted out, "Oh yea! The most important part is he always offers to massage anywhere I want right after the workout. He knows how much I love it so he offers me one minute of massage in exchange for one minute of working out!" Katie's mouth hung open slightly at how alluring the idea of getting a deep massage from you after a hard gym session would be, "Wow, I imagine he must be a pro at getting all the little nooks and crannies..." You looked over at Katie only to see her staring into space dreamily as she walked, rubbing her free hand into the back of her ass while practically drooling at the idea of getting a massage from you. You cringed as you pondered what fantasies exactly were running through that pretty little head of hers. "Yup! My feet get really sore not to mention sweaty after a hard run but he makes them feel good as new! There's really nothing like his massages! You should try one sometime! It's too bad there's so little of Thomas to go around!" June replied sweetly, trying to get her mother as pumped for the workout as possible.

Katie sulked silently at the realization June was right. A tiny to massage her sore glutes sounded like a god-like experience. She frowned trying to think of ways she could convince you to help her when you weren't busy with her daughter.That was until an idea clicked in her mind. With a snap of her fingers, Katie exclaimed, "How about a friendly little competition for even extra motivation!" June smiled but also furrowed an eyebrow in confusion wondering what her mother could possibly have in mind. "We try to run as long as we can, winner gets Thomas for however long they ran! This way we're motivated to run extra long since it's winner take all!" June brought her free hand not holding you to her chin in thought before bouncing in excitement "Okay! That sounds super-super fun!" You saw Katie looking at you while licking her lips once over prompting you to speak out "Hey, I'm not sure that's such a great ide-" but the girls simply squealed happily in unison cutting you off before quickening their pace to the gym in new found motivation.

The girls arrived at the Middletown gym and after June quickly changed into some cute pink running shoes they found a couple of open treadmills to begin their wager. While the girls discussed their pace and rules, June crudely dropped you down onto the display panel of her treadmill to Katie's right before she began to walk slowly as a small warm-up. Looking up, all you saw was the underside of June's chest as it cast you in a shadow of itself like a shelf. You watched it sway slightly with each tiny movement June made and while ogling the heavenly sight you didn't even notice your own mother walking up to take the treadmill directly to Katie's left! "Glad to see you're feeling better, June!" Your mother said genuinely before introducing herself to Katie and starting a small chat. "I've been having a hard time finding my son so I figured why not get my daily workout in in the meantime! Middletown's gym sure is nice too I couldn't help trying it out!" June panicked seeing your mother, worried she could spot you at any second and ruin her fun new relationship permanently. Just as you noticed your mom, and let out a shout to try and get her attention, June quickly brought her hand down with a slap against you, flattening you to the display. Melissa perked up looking around confusedly, "Did you girls hear anything? it sounded almost like someone called out for me...?" Melissa asked before June hurriedly and nervously covered up, "Hear anything? Nope, no way! I didn't hear a thing! Might've just been the gym's music!" June sweat nervously watching Melissa's reaction; However, Melissa simply shrugged with a clueless smile thinking 'Must have been my imagination! How silly!' before putting her earbuds in and focusing on her workout ahead. Nervously wiping a bead of sweat from her brow, June sighed content her cover up had been a success.

Katie took notice of June's slap however and prodded June, "Why'd you squash little Thomas like that? I was expecting him to shout us motivations while we ran!". June quickly thought of a tasty lie as she grabbed your flattened body up in her hand stretching you out into a square shape. "Oh this? Tommy loves to be my wittle towel boy while I run, he says my sweat is the only proof he needs I'm really working hard!" Katie appeared flustered at this development before she frustratedly belted out, "Hey wait, that's no fair! That's an advantage you have over me in the contest, I don't have a towel!" June rolled her eyes before replying, "I'm sure there's enough of him for us to share for these purposes..." Sighing contently, Katie giggled to herself looking down at you with determination. "Well if he needs proof I'm training harder than you, he'll be drowning in proof by the time I'm done with him!" June scoffed arrogantly before retorting, "You're going down!" With that you were lay across the side of the treadmill's hand rail in between the two girls before you watched them start into a jog. The handrail fell right at the girls hips and you were totally transfixed as you could do nothing but stare at the rhythmic sway of the girls hips as they heaved up and down with every step. You saw the girl's spandex struggling to contain their naturally curvy booties as they strained against the gyrating mounds of ass.'Maybe this won't be all that bad...' you thought feeling a sudden rush of being inches from such juicy derrieres.

Your eyes were drawn away from the gorgeous sight though as you saw Melissa running hard beside Katie. You whimpered wishing she could just save you from June's clutches as you were doing this whole thing just to get returned to her. Seeing Melissa's blue running shoes slam into the tread, you were reminded of Zayn's fate that seemed much worse than yours as your mother obliviously pounded him repeatedly under her dirty sole. You swore to yourself you'd endure anything these girls could dish out if it meant saving him as he saved you. You were torn from your thoughts however as you felt yourself sternly grabbed in a sweaty hand before you were lurched upward and rubbed across June's highly focused face before she moved her flowing bright pink hair out of the way to bring you behind her head to wipe her already perspiring neck. She was far too focused on winning the challenge to acknowledge or tease you further so she simply used you and plopped you right back between her and her mother. Before you could even collect your sense, you felt a rougher grip pull you up as you recognized Katie's bouncing chest. She used you to wipe the sweat out of her eyes before she dunked you into her cleavage to attack the flowing rivers that pooled together there. It was a snug fit underneath Katie's tightly equipped sports bra but your body dutifully absorbed all the collected moisture before you were tossed in a heap back at June. You were used back and forth bathing in the two girl's emissions dozens of times before you were strung across the display on Katie's treadmill, dripping their salty sweat you couldn't contain down your body onto the floor below. Katie's heavy breathing blasted right onto you as she ran on. Panting heavily, it was like a thick minty steam was covering your body in a dense, humid fog as you stared forward at her bouncing breasts. You saw her hair becoming a dark brown as it soaked in sweat and she occasionally had to brush a wet strand out of her eyes.

You heard Melissa's treadmill beep to a stop before you heard her exclaim a tired "Phew!" and stretched her legs. Interrupting Katie from her focus, your mom pointed at you with her warmest smile, "Do you think I could borrow that really quick? I kinda forgot mine, clumsy me!" Katie returned a kind smile before hoisting you up and depositing you right into your mom's awaiting grip.
14313.title: Supportive and Handy Boyfriend

It was safe to say you were panicking at the horrific downturn that this day had brought so quickly. Glancing upward you saw the beautiful pink-haired girl sitting inches away from you, looking out at everyone passing by. It seemed like she was still desperately searching for your new friend Zayn but as you know well its nearly impossible to find a tiny like you in the wrong circumstances. Looking back at your mother, now putting a fair bit of distance between you and her, you saw her standing at a display listening to some long-winded speech by the girl manning the table. She crossed one foot behind the other, resting it on the back of her ankle in an inadvertent sign of her boredom. And just barely you could make out a tan blotch against her otherwise white (albeit quite dirty) soles of her shoes. You shook your head in shame and frustration at yourself for allowing someone who just risked their safety to help you out of a sticky situation to fall right into it as well. As Melissa placed her foot on the ground and shifted all of her weight onto the foot now housing your friend Zayn by standing on one leg you knew you had to spring into action.

Looking up once more you desperately wanted to get the attention of this radiant girl beside you, but you couldn't help but think about the way your friend described her. If what he said was true then she very well might be the best person to rescue him... but also likely to trap him in a way that may be just as bad, if not worse. Sighing you resigned yourself to leap off the bench and make the trek without her. Taking a leap of faith you make the plunge, falling for a few seconds, before feeling your legs slam into the dirt below, squashing briefly. Praying that this girl June wouldn't stomp her feet down just as your mother did a minute before you willed your legs into slowly reforming. Sure enough the girl didn't leave her bench and you popped back into a normal human shape. Brushing yourself off you began to sprint across the concrete path towards your mom. Bobbing and weaving between the footfalls of various giantesses you just barely made it to the tiny guys' outlined section of the path. Taking a moment to recompose yourself you continued your trek. Luckily for you it seemed that Melissa was stuck listening to that same speech she had been a few minutes ago. After that minute passed you were reminded of the one silver lining that came along with the otherwise pure horror of the Son Squishers club, and that was the fact that it sometimes caused Melissa to remember you when she otherwise would not. The reason was that she would be staring right at a picture of your current predicament up until the moment she sent it to the other club members, and this was usually enough to remind her to free you promptly. Melissa whipped around quickly, forcing you to cling to a finger as to not be thrown clear off of her palm. When you gained your bearings you saw a woman approaching quickly, walking up with a beautiful smile on her face. She seemed familiar from a distance, but as she got closer you finally recognized her. Truthfully, you had never seen this woman in person before, but you knew full well this the most prolific poster in the Son Squishers club, Erin Meyers.

The number of times you had been exposed to the posts in the Son Squishers club in the past you couldn't help but notice that every post by this particular woman could only be described as "too perfect". The predicaments she often got in with her son, Pete, combined with the nearly professional quality of her photos were so absurd that you long suspected them to be staged. Despite the fear this hunch struck in you, you couldn't help but be taken aback by the beauty of this woman. She must have been somewhere around the same age as your own mom if you had to guess, and had maintained her good looks just as well. Melissa blushed and held you up before responding, "Oh shucks I guess it was alright, nothing close to yours always are though! Speaking of which, where is Pete at?" You furrowed your brows in confusion at Erin's compliment as you were quite literally just a tan smear on your mom's shoe at that point, but then she continued, "and I'm not quite sure where Pete is, I met up with him earlier but we must have gotten separated somehow!" Strangely, Erin seemed to pause for a few seconds with this fully formed bubble in front of her face, and you could have sworn it looked like she was trying to have both of you notice it.
